Summary: Had an amazing time staying at the hotel- the lobby is so charming and staff is so nice from the first interaction to the last. I was placed in a Surf Inspired room-Bilabong and omgosh this hotel is nothing like any other hotel I've ever stayed at. I loved that each room was it's own theme and had its own charm. Mine had a window facing the ocean which was unreal!  It's literal steps from a beach entrance, with a cute bench to take in the morning sun and waves or to recharge midday.  The Rooftop (restaurant on the top level of the hotel) is a MUST- sunset is not to be missed (and if it's a colder day they supply blankets), staff is very attentive and menu is delicious. Also, a great spot for lunch/brunch. The hotel is dog friendly so be prepared to say hi to a pup or two (or
Room tip: Stairways are a bit tight and elevator can be slow if busy
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Charming hotel, hospitality centric staff and dramatic sunset memories. Looking forward to going back to make some more!
Summary: The room was clean, a bit snug, but comfortable.  The bed was in need of a mattress update. The staff was fantastic and made our stay so enjoyable.  The Rooftop is an outstanding experience at sunset!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great relaxing atmosphere and charm for those who desire a great change of pace!
Summary: Great ‚Äúold world‚Äù charm, friendly staff was great!  We also loved being so close to the beach!  Also we loved the morning coffee and snacks, and the grand fireplace.  Although we didn‚Äôt take advantage of the deck at the top with a beautiful view and good food this time, it definitely would be something to consider next time!   And, of course, there‚Äôs so much to see and do around about!  Hope to come back soon!
Room tip: We found out about this place through ‚ÄúTravelzoo‚Äù.  Since we come from such a distance, and did...
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us! Please come back and visit us again!

Summary: I would give La Casa Del Camino 10 stars if that were an option. I celebrated my 50th birthday with a fairly large group from all over the place. From check in to check out it was an amazing experience. The staff were beyond exceptional all the way from housekeeping to hosting the party up at the Rooftop Lounge. The manager Phelton is a great guy and makes everyone feel like family. I appreciate how management and staff went above and beyond to make this a memorable celebration. Do not hesitate to make this your go to place while visiting Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Hope you had the BEST BIRTHDAY EVER!!!! Thank you so much for staying with us, we loved having you all here and hope you get to come back soon. It was my absolute pleasure to take care of you!!

Summary Heading: Birthday Celebration with Friends and Family
Summary: We had an excellent time at La Casa del Camino! The hotel itself is nicely decorated with a comfortable atmosphere and a relaxed ‚Äòhomey‚Äô vibe. Hotel GM Phelton and staff were all smiles at all times and went above and beyond to accommodate our fairly large group celebrating a 50th birthday. A special shout-out to the rooftop staff for their efforts in giving the birthday boy and guests an amazing celebration. A definite recommend from this group!
Manager Response: Thank you thank you! Such a lovely group and we loved having you! Will let the rooftop know how amazing they were as well! Come back soon!

Summary: We had the best time and the staff were exceptional making our stay enjoyable. Our room was great. I don‚Äôt believe our stay anywhere else would have been anywhere as near as accommodating. They went well above and beyond for our group. They event made a point to learn our names and give special recognition for our events.
Manager Response: So happy to hear we made your stay so enjoyable and hope you had great anniversary! We want to make sure we take the best care of our guest :)

Summary: Really enjoyed the Hotel especially the Rooftop Bar! Monica, the waitress, was especially helpful, efficient and fun! Rooms were nice. All the staff was very helpful and efficient. Maid service was excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us, please come back and visit!

Summary: Wonderful accommodations in ideal location in Laguna Beach. Hotel is charming and staff are superb.  Special commendation and our thanks to Gonzalo, who worked a kind of magic in assisting with a,number of reservation modifications made necessary due to circumstances beyond our control. Looking forward to our next visit!
Manager Response: So glad you had a great stay and that Gonzo was able to take care of you! See you next trip!

Summary Heading: Heart-Filled Staff @ a Fab Historic Hotel
Summary: The best way I can describe the goodness of the staff that work here is to quote Charles Kuralt: "There are a lot of people who are doing wonderful things, quietly, with no motive of greed, or hostility toward other people, or delusions of superiority." ~ These folks are a close knit team, who love & respect this amazing historic & beautiful hotel. Hillary know all the stories, Gonzalo checks in with you through his heart to make sure you are doing just fine, Felton is your go-to for all your needs, Steviejo will direct you to some yummy cafes, Marfilia has your room in tip-top shape, Melody & Tanya greet you with smiles & Jake will serve you the best coconut shrimp on the Rooftop. I was upgraded to a Surfer Room & was in awe of the stories of the unique personalities that have
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words and I'll make sure each and everyone of our amazing colleagues know how much of an impact they made. Truly a special place and happy to hear you loved us!

Summary: Will stay here again. Great location. Very friendly, helpful staff. Good rooftop restaurant overlooking the ocean. (Expect some of what you might expect from an older boutique hotel, ie. smaller rooms, not as noise proof & air tight as newer construction)
Manager Response: Very much appreciate you and thank you for staying with us!

Summary: Stayed one night mid December. The hotel was beautifully decorated for the holidays.  We arrived a little before check in, but they were able to accommodate us and check us in early.  Parking in their offsite lot is free, which makes dropping off bags a little tricky.  We were directed to a loading zone on the side street and a porter met us with a luggage cart to take our bags to the room while I checked us in and my SO parked the car.  The room was very spacious and decorated in surf theme.  We had an ocean facing view (over the rooftops).  It was on the top floor which actually is right under the rooftop bar, so kinda noisy and chairs scraping the floor/our ceiling made the room a little less than peaceful... but it was nice and we were able to watch the sunset and drank wine
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write this, appreciate all feedback as it only helps us improve and make your stay that much better! We have all our decorations after Thanksgiving till first weel of June and it looks beautiful in our lobby :)

Summary: Only stayed one night and wish we could‚Äôve stayed longer!! Hotel had very pretty views, clean, cozy feel, perfect location, friendly staff. We had a great time and will definitely be coming back!!! (:
Manager Response: Glad you had an enjoyable stay with us!! See you next time :)

Summary: We had the best NYE dinner at the Comedor and the most wonderful overnight stay. The staff were lovely and they really took care of us. This hotel feels like a second home and is definitely our go to place in Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! Glad to be your second home!

Summary: Best hotel, staff and view!, the staff took care of us and were so very helpful! They were able to help me decorate for my engagement! And help with any other necessities, I will 100% be back, and only tell ppl to stay at the hotel!! By far one of our greatest stays and experiences!! Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you so much!!! We strive to be the best and take great care of our guest. Will see you next trip! :)

Summary: Great location, rooms are super cute and comfortable. The staff was very hospitable. Alex, the evening Front Desk Clerk, was super helpful and kindly warmed up my soup for me that I had brought.  The live music on Friday and Saturday night in the lobby was dreamy.  And Sunshine the bartender at the restaurant inside was a doll.  Did I mention, great staff!
Manager Response: Very happy to hear you had a great stay and our team took care of you! Looking forward to your next trip!

Summary: We enjoy visiting Laguna Beach and Casa Del Camino is a great place to stay. Close enough to downtown so we could walk and even closer to the water on Cress st. The room was nice and cozy with a balcony overlooking the main drag and the ocean. The service was great, everyone was very accommodating. We loved lounging by the big fireplace in the lobby and having our wine.  We look forward to going back. Hopefully the rooftop lounge will be open. It was way to windy and cold this time around.
Manager Response: Glad your New years getaway was very enjoyable! I love that balcony room!  Yes hoping the next trip the weather plays nice.

Summary: We stayed in an ocean view Surf Room, which was delightful and well worth the upgrade from the much smaller standard rooms. The staff was great, the place is cool and a little funky and you can't beat the view from the roof-top bar! We booked 4 rooms for a family get-together and it was great. The location is excellent and parking was free and close by. We will make this our go-to place in Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and happy to take care of you and your family. We love hearing we will be your go to place, home away from home :)

Summary: Every time my boyfriend and I have stayed at La Casa del Camino we are always so pleased. This hotel has an amazing location very close to the beach and a cool surf vibe. We always make friends and think very highly about the staff, property and overall energy. Don‚Äôt forget there is a rooftop bar that is very beautiful. Can‚Äôt wait to come back!
Manager Response: Thank you for always coming back to us, means alot! Always love our regulars and how much we take care of them,

Summary: Great place to stay! Right on he ocean! The people who work there are amazing! They will do anything to make your stay great. We always stay here every time we visit Laguna. Highly recommend to anyone!
Manager Response: Thank you for making us a high recommendation! See you next trip :)

Summary: Our one night stay at the hotel for ‚ÄúFamily Christmas 2022‚Äùwas fantastic.   We started in the rooftop bar with appetizers and drinks with reservations at 1:30pm. Jake was our waiter and made sure we were well taken care of. The staff could not have been friendlier or more helpful. They allowed us to put all of our luggage in one of our 4 rooms at 1:30 pm when we arrived because the others weren‚Äôt ready yet.  The other 3 rooms were ready by 4pm with complimentary bottles of wine for each room. We had one surf room and 3 Queen rooms. The surf room was the most spacious and I would definitely book that again with a beautiful ocean view #314.  We had a nice dinner at Comedor and then enjoyed more wine, desserts and games that we brought with us in their beautifully decorated living
Manager Response: Very happy to hear we were able to make you stay memorable and take such great care of you and your family! 314 (Rip Curl) is such a cool room!! Please come back and visit us again!

Summary Heading: Great service and feels like home
Summary: We got room 312 with an ocean view. It was well appointed, comfy bed/bedding, great shower (low pressure but good and hot), lots of storage, complimentary breakfast items with coffee/hot chocolate, beautiful living room downstairs with a fire, wonderful rooftop sunsets, walk right out back to amazing waterfront and great people working there. Walked everywhere around the hotel with great a restaurant across the street (Avila‚Äôs El Ranchito) yum!! We thought it would be noisy with thin walls of older building but the hotel was super quiet at night. Loved our stay in a lovely area. The price is expected due to the area as well. Our 20th Anniversary trip!!
Manager Response: Soooo happy to hear you anniversary trip was amazing and that you loved our property. Looking forward to taking great care of you again!

Summary: After a brief visit at the rooftop bar a few months back my wife decided to celebrate our anniversary with a one night stay at the hotel. Our greeting, our room, our ocean view the hospitality, the celebratory wine helped create a lasting memory for us one to treasure & one to do again in the future!
Manager Response: So happy to hear we were able make your anniversary very special! Hope to have you back again. :)

Summary: Wonderful experience.   All the employees seemed like family. Very much enjoyed the fireplace and sitting in the living room! The food was excellent.  We ate dinner there as  well as breakfast. It was simply a great time!
Manager Response: Family is what we are and and how we treat our guest. Always want the very best for all :) Hope to have you back again!

Summary: Hillary was AMAZING and so kind to us! Gave us a flawless check-in process. She always recommends different places to eat and explore to make sure we have a perfect Laguna Beach experience. Hillary is simply the best!
Manager Response: Hillary is amazing! Thank you for recognizing her and will definitely let her know. Hope to have you back again!

Summary: Staff was very friendly. The ocean view room was a nice surprise as well as how early the room was ready.  The only suggestion is that for those staying in 311 and even the hallway is that I would ask the septic company to come between checkout and check in. That is a tough ofer even w/the hallway and room windows closed
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! 311 has a great one and one of my favorite Spanish queens. Come back soon!

Summary: The beds were very comfortable. The views were also immaculate from my room. The views and food on the rooftop restaurant were a highlight to my stay. I will definitely be coming back here when I'm in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you and hope to see you back soon for another great stay!

Summary: Surf rooms are simply THE best!!!  And service provided by Gonzales is the industry‚Äôs very best.  Great fireplace in the cozy lobby/ living room!  Then most perfect location, too!  Aroma therapy throughout and again the best service ever!!
Manager Response: Very much appreciate you and thank you for recognizing Gonzalo! See you next trip!

Summary: After a long drive from southern Arizona, we were delighted to have picked this lovely spot to rest. A great room with the ocean view and wonderful sound, made for a relaxing stay. We look forward to spending more time here.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! Relaxing and wonderful is what we hope you enjoy! Come back and visit us again :)

Summary Heading: Beautiful Rooftop Lounge but Dated Hotel
Summary: La Casa is a beautiful Spanish style hotel with an amazing rooftop lounge that was the perfect venue for my friend's wedding.  The service at the hotel was great, and the location was good, as it is walking distance to many restaurants and shops and is maybe a 15 minute walk to the main beach area.  My only major criticism is that the hotel is quite dated.  My Spanish queen room was very small, and the furniture and decor all had a very outdated feel, and is very much in need of modernization.  The hotel lobby similarly has a dated feel/vibe to it, and the carpeting throughout the hotel is old and worn looking.  To be clear, I loved the hotel for my friend's wedding, and the service was generally great, but the hotel itself badly needs cosmetic renovations.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us! As we are historic property and European Spanish style our rooms will be on the smaller side. We unfortunately cannot modify them as that is our charm and we would no longer a historic staple in laguna. We do have some rooms that are made separate to be modern called Surf Rooms.

Summary: We attended a beautiful Wedding on the Rooftop. Stayed 4 nights. Loved the hotel atmosphere and location. Walking distance to just about everything you need.  Employees go above and beyond to make sure are stay was memorable.
Manager Response: Very much appreciate you staying with us and glad we made your stay memorable. :)

Summary: We loved our stay! The proximity to a small beach, restaurants and shops was excellent. Rooftop was just stunning. We stayed in a surf room with excellent ammenities and view. Front desk people were all very friendly. We will be back soon!
Manager Response: Glad to hear you had a wonderful getaway! Here's to many more.!

Summary: I visit Laguna Beach often and always look forward to my stay at the La Casa Del Camino. The hotel location is perfect. The beach is just steps away. My favorite breakfast spot is just across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We will make sure you have another perfect vacation.!

Summary: Our stay was absolutely perfect. The rooms were adorable. Had such style that you will not get at your modern hotels. They provided free water bottles, coffee, hot chocolates and pastries. Not necessary but it was very nice. We celebrated our anniversary and they made it extra special by leaving a lovely note and bottle of wine. We had dinner at El Comedor and the food was amazing. As was the service. We hit Rooftop Bar for brunch after a perfect nights rest and it was the best way to end our stay. We will highly recommend this hotel to others and be back.
Manager Response: You are so welcome for your perfect stay! We love doing personalized touches for our guest special moments. Please come back and visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: What a gem! Will be back every year!
Summary: This beautiful boutique hotel was everything we hoped for and more! We are a family of five and there was something for everyone . The rooms are gorgeous, especially the one with the ocean view! The dining at the hotel and the restaurants within walking distance are amazing and being steps from the beach made our vacation feel like we were in another country. The service, especially from Phelton, the manager, was excellent ! No matter what we asked for or needed, he was on it. We will be returning as often as we can !
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to take care of your family and it was my pleasure to assist with whatever needed :), Please come back again and I'll be happy to take care of you again!

Summary: From the afternoon you check in to the morning you leave, the staff is professional and personable. Every request, no matter how large or small, was attended to graciously and timely. The location, right in the heart of the historical HIP district, sets the hotel and surrounding shops and restaurants apart. The age, history, and architecture make for an interesting experience.  But, have no fear, the hotel has kept pace with modern amenities, while maintaining its original charm. This was the perfect venue for our son‚Äôs wedding, but we will return for the staff and charm!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for allowing us to make your stay memorable! We make our guest satisfaction top priority and make sure we deliver. Happy to hear you'll return and that we were perfect for your son's wedding!

Summary Heading: Great hotel but tight parking lot
Summary: We love staying here (our third time!), and the location is unbeatable! We love the nearby beach that is out of the way and quiet.   However, the parking lot is small and tight, and at some point during our stay, our rental car was damaged in the parking lot while sitting unoccupied by another car that left without giving any information.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and do apologize this occurred.

Summary: Love this hotel. Staff was very friendly, check in was easy, the beach front view is gorgeous and the room felt very modern and retro. I definitely will comeback and highly recommend to my friends and family.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for spreading the word and staying with us! Come back soon!

Summary: Nice place, great staff, very comfortable accommodations.  Would definitely stay there again when traveling to that area. Very attentive to all of our requests and we enjoyed our stay thoroughly. Thank you for everything
Manager Response: You are welcome and thank you very much for the review! Please come back to visit u again.

Summary Heading: Nice quick visit at a cute boutique hotel
Summary: I appreciate that the hotel does a great job of explaining all the amenities (or lack of amenities like air conditioning). My initial room was nice and cool as it was on the east side of the hotel. Unfortunately, it did not have the desk I needed. The first person I spoke to about switching rooms told me they were completely sold out and there were no rooms to switch to.   After parking my car in their lot a different person was at the desk and I asked him. He totally understood and moved me to the same level room with a desk. I didn't ask why I was told no initially, I was just grateful for the desk.  I will say this room was a bit warm as it was on the west side. I did open two windows however neither had screens. One I had to prop open with a towel unless I wanted it to be
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us and for taking the time to write this. I'm glad we were able to take care of you. We have floor AC units in the rooms and unfortunately due to our historic nature doesn't not allow for central air in the rooms. Hope to have you back again!

Summary Heading: Great experience with a bunch of guys
Summary: Great experience all around. Our group came here last year as well as we had a Perfect location off the beach and main attraction. The unique Rooftop experience was worth it for sure. Rooms were clean and good service. I was traveling with a group of guys and everyone had a good time.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for allowing us to make your guys trip great and take care of you! Come back and visit us.

Summary Heading: Laguna Beach stays with  a view
Summary: Exactly what you want for a stay at LB.  Sky terrace was clutch for hanging out and enjoying the view.  Easy walk to eateries and shops.  Has parking lot for convenience a block away.  Right on the main road for people watching and ride sharing.
Manager Response: Come back and visit us again! Thank you!

Summary: We stayed here this past weekend. This hotel is quintessential Laguna Beach. The decor and vibes are perfect for the location.  The staff was polite and helpful. The rooftop is amazing! The views are to behold. Amazing setting for breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for allowing us to take care of. Hope to have you back again!

Summary: Don't look any further, make sure you stay here no matter how small or large your group is. Breakfast & dinner on the rooftop are beyond mind blowing ü§Ø service was great, rooms were comfy. They're a very helpful staff,  don't hesitate to ask recommendations.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us and see you next time!

Summary: Boutique hotel with history. Views and access to the beach. Walking distance to eateries and downtown. I‚Äôve stayed a few times now in different rooms, and like the uniqueness to each. Rooftop restaurant has anazing views of the ocean and city in the opposite direction
Manager Response: Appreciate you making us your home away from home, being unique is our specialty! Come back soon!

Summary Heading: What a wonderful hotel and staff!
Summary: We visited La Casa del Camino Laguna Beach for our 33 yr anniversary!  Phelton,  the manager was so accommodating and treated us to a wonderful celebration including a special welcome in our hotel room!  All the staff was friendly and very helpful and we loved dining and celebrating at the Rooftop bar and restaurant- great sunsets!  Our room was spacious and clean! We highly recommend this hotel and will definitely be back!!!
Manager Response: Very happy I was able to take such great care of you and make your anniversary so special! Please come back and visit us again :)

Summary: Cute, historic and charming. Of the hotels in laguna we chose this because it looked to have e some charm / character and it definitely does. This is a good location and really all of laguna is nice and walkable. Go across the way to the Heidelberg cafe for breakfast. Walk to the main beach and the cute shops and restaurants.  Lobby is lovely with a beautiful fireplace. Room was really cool, updated old hotel and things are old but clean and charming. Stayed in sept and it was hot, there‚Äôs no A/c but they have a unit in the room that works quick and is suitable. The bed was super comfy! The rooftop lounge has amazing views and yummy drinks. Do you want a boutique style, cute, historic stay? This is your spot.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!! We do our very best to stay true to our history while still being modern. Hope to have you back again!

Summary: Mentioned via Email we were visiting for my wife's 50th,  they had a bottle of wine and nice decorations on the bed and dresser.  Very cool to walk into not expecting anything.  Always our go to in laguna.
Manager Response: We love making memorable moments! So glad you loved our surprise!

Summary: Stayed here for two nights but wish the trip could last forever. This pet-friendly hotel has everything. From a rooftop lounge to an early morning complimentary coffee n' snacks table. Gosh I loved it here.  The hotel is steps away from Cress Beach and we spent so much time there as well...The sunsets were magnificent!  Being so close to the ocean was mind-blowing and breathtaking. Of course the ocean is a huge plus to this hotel, but even if it was in the middle of nowhere I would've came! Why? The staff is so kind and the ambiance is amazing.  A trip I wish I could re-do a hundred times over.
Manager Response: We appreciate you very much! Thank for the kind words and please come back to visit us again! :)

Summary: I stayed at La Casa del Camino, it was nothing less then amazing. I stayed in the middle of august I have to say from the staff to the service to managers it was all amazing. I wanted to give a say Phelton Calhoun was a stand out he made sure if I had any issues his team would take care of it it was amazing to have that
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us! We strive to provide the absolute best for all our guest and I am happy to hear I was able to take great care of you!

Summary: The exterior is absolutely beautiful and the rooftop restaurant has breathtaking views. Although the rooms fit the vibe and theme of the hotel, the rooms need a little maintenance. A slight update perhaps. The television was broken but not an issue whereas we toured the town all weekend. The room did look like the picture but there were a number of exposed pipes, chipped paint, etc. The bed was comfortable and the floor AC worked although ours was extremely loud. The room was relatively clean and the staff was outstanding. Awesome staff. Love the staff. Love the live entertainment in the lobby. Very nice touch!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the feedback and very much appreciate you staying with us! Always room for touch ups.

Summary: Steps from the beach this historic hotel has its charm and style.  Throughout the property there are upgrades, however, the ambiance, some decor and many historic design features are presently used or are on display.  The hotel is also only minutes from the downtown arts district
Manager Response: Very much appreciate you staying with us! Little by little we are doing upgrades that don't take away from the historic property.

Summary: Great Staff & Fab Roof Bar and only a block from the beach, whats not to love? Easy access to lots of great restaurants only a short stroll away and cool shops. The room was a little dated but all the other positives more than made up for that.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us! We are a historic property and have to keep as much of it intact as possible. Hope to have you back!

Summary Heading: Like The Hotel CA, you can check out but NEVER WANT TO LEAVE this nearly-beachfront gem just steps from the ocean!
Summary: If you‚Äôre looking for a clean, quaint boutique hotel with a rich history & the most accommodating & hospitable staff I‚Äôve seen in years, stay here at one of the more affordable & fun Laguna Beach hotels.   Having been ripped off by one of the annoying pop-up third-party scams, I called and asked if they would consider honoring the reservation I mistakenly made & the Manager was kind enough to do so as well as match the price. Upon arrival, Felton the GM upgraded us for $35 a night which was a steal considering their resort fee is only $20 nightly & includes parking. This fee is a fraction of what neighboring hotels charge without parking. We loved the Surf Suite theme room with plenty of room for 2 including a seating area, desk, & fridge with lots of storage.  The suites are
Manager Response: Thank you so so much for taking the time to write this. Truly appreciate you and LOVE that myself, Bo and Monica were able to be a part of what made your stay so memorable and more than enjoyable. Happy to be your home away from home and hope to have you back soon :)

Summary: Great location. Great staff. Shout out to Felton, the manager, who is amazing! The rooftop restaurant has incredible food and great sunset views. The rooms are freshly updated while keeping its 1930s vibe. If you want a spacious room, this is not for you.  If you want to step back in time, with people who will make sure you‚Äôre happy, this is the place. We‚Äôll be back.
Manager Response: Appreciate you taking the time to do a shout out :) It was my pleasure! Hope you get to visit us again!

Summary: Fantastic property in the heart of Laguna Beach. Walking distance to the beach and numerous great restaurants and shops. Perfect internet access and extremely friendly staff. The roof top restaurant and bar is a must see.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and hope to have you back for another great stay!

Summary: Such a cozy little stay right on the water! Came for a restful weekend away and found everything I needed in this little gem. Very casual, such friendly staff, and the most perfect location right on the water and walking to restaurants. Will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Glad we were able to make your restful weekend possible and enjoyable!

Summary Heading: Charming Historic  Hotel and Super Friendly Staff!!!
Summary: We had an amazing stay at La Casa Del Camino during my birthday weekend with friends. Quaint  Oceanside hotel with super friendly staff and beautifully decorated clean rooms. The restaurant Comedor at the lobby has amazing food! The staff is amazing and super friendly!  This hotel continues to hold its heritage while providing a classic costal vibe with historic charm. We stayed at the historic Spanish and Moroccan-inspired  ocean view room and the decor was amazing! This hotel is also super pet-friendly üê∂.  It‚Äôs conveniently located and  just a few steps from the beach, independently owned boutique shops and great restaurants in Laguna Beach.  The hotel also houses the @rooftoplounge and has the most amazing sunset and ocean views and is so popular and it can be tough to find
Manager Response: Very much appreciate you staying with us and for the taking the time to write about this. This hotel is magical, and we love taking care of every guest that comes in especially for special occasions :) Please come back and visit.

Summary: Air conditioning broken hose, can‚Äôt open window due to traffic noise! Very stuffy only choice was ceiling fan, very unfortunate to ruin a good experience. Otherwise rooftop restaurant has awesome food and panoramic sea view
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to stay with and for the feedback. We are in the process of getting windows replaced to open and updated AC's.

Summary: Had a great time! Thank you Phelton for taking great care of me on every level! Cosy ocean front room with special goodies in the room From Flowers to Champagne and a yummy dinner at the Rooftop Lounge. A boutique historical hotel with special touches to make your stay a memorable one. Right in the heart of Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and you are most welcome!!!! Come back anytime :)

Summary: Such a beautiful visit in the heart of Laguna. The parking is offsite, but close by. Amazing food on the rooftop and great views! The rooms are super cute and spacious feels like home! Would visit again!
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us make it feel like home and that you enjoyed your stay! See you next trip!

Summary: We just had a fantastic time my wife and I.  We were given special attention throughout, with the staff always being helpful and accommodating.  They went above and beyond for my wife‚Äôs birthday celebration.  The room was charming, great ocean view, and comfortable.  Definitely recommend for a romantic couple‚Äôs getaway.
Manager Response: Happy we were able to make your romantic birthday celebration memorable! Our team loves doing the special set-ups :)

Summary Heading: Great resort, great staff, great value
Summary: Quaint resort on the southern end of the Laguna strip on PCH.  We had a rental car but after the first few days did almost all of our getting around via the free trolley and a little walking.  There is a catty-corner lot for your car... the spaces are a bit tight but we never had a problem.  We had one of the hotel's "theme" rooms -- it was nicely done.  We had an ocean view as promised.  The only issue was that for the rooms in the hotel to have an ocean view, they back up to an alley behind the hotel, which was noisy with trash or delivery trucks most mornings.  That didn't prevent us from having a good stay, though.  The staff, including front desk, housekeeping, bar and restaurant folks, were all wonderful.  The rooftop restaurant is well-known and people come there from
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and happy to hear you enjoyed our cozy home. Apologies on the noise in the area but glad didn't impact your stay, see you next time!

Summary: My friend and I stayed here over the weekend of July 4th.  It's such a cute boutique hotel and they allow dogs.  There's so much to say about our stay and the staff so let me break it down. Location:  It's south of Broadway where the downtown area of Laguna is, but that doesn't mean it's not happening.  Plenty of great little shops nearby.  And there's a Ralphs right up the road just in case you need anything or forgot something.  There is a private beach just steps away that is gorgeous!  OH, you can get Margaritas to go from the little Mexican place across the street from the hotel.  SCORE!  Hotel:  All the rooms are decorated differently.  Very eclectic and original.  Our room had a queen bed and a daybed.  Both were very comfortable.  There is a small dorm fridge in the room
Manager Response: This is so lovely to read and very touching. Thank you so much for the taking the time to write how amazing your stay was and how great our team is. We all take such great pride in what we do and along with the unique energy of the hotel it works so well. The historic and art deco rooms are among one of the rarest I've seen and there's a room for everyone! I will share with everyone the impact they made and hope to see you again!

Summary Heading: Our favorite place for a staycation
Summary: We live in north OC, Casa Del Camino is our first choice for a short weekend (or weekday) get-away.  Perfect location, staff is friendly and professional, and you can't beat the Rooftop Lounge the view and service is the best.
Manager Response: So happy to hear we are your first choice for your get away! Hope to have you back soon!

Summary: Phelton (Manager) and the staff at this hotel is why I come back every 6-9 months!! Extremely friendly and they genuinely care about their guests. Location is exceptional and the rooftop bar is such an added bonus!! They know what they are doing and are a huge asset to the hospitality business!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much!!!! We love what we do, and it shows, see you next time :)

Summary: We had a great stay here. Great location. Plenty of parking. Loved the beach chairs and umbrellas and of course the ROOFTOP bar/restaurant‚Äî the main reason we stay here! Rooms are small but showers are huge.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us, hope to have you back soon.

Summary: Solo traveler and decided to spend the night at La Casa. It happened to be a Saturday night and when I arrived the place was alive! Live music in the lobby, couples dancing, the restaurant was booming and smelled so good and don‚Äôt forget about the rooftop! The whole vibe and atmosphere was truly enjoyable and brought such a smile to my face. Between the Saturday night vibe, the extremely pleasant staff members, the old world charm of the decor and quick beach access I‚Äôm very happy I decided to spend the night here.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to make your stay perfect! So happy to hear you enjoyed every minute. Come back and visit us again!

Summary: This hotel was so amazing! It was our anniversary and they decorated our room for our special day. There‚Äôs a loading zone where you can park to check in and take   your luggage out of the car. The beach is literally just down a public stair way. I could see the ocean from my window!   The staff was so nice and courteous. They always said hi. The rooftop restaurant has the freshest local seafood cocktail (a MUST try).   You could go down the street and spend double/triple the amount but why? The hotel is a bit dated, but everything was clean. The parking is included in the $20 daily resort fee. Granted some people complained that the parking wasn‚Äôt on site, but it‚Äôs only a 1/2 short block away! Not bad for the beach. The location of the hotel is perfect. The restaurants that we
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words and so happy to hear you loved the set we did! Our Housekeeping Supervisor takes pride in making those, she's amazing!! Please do come back and visit us again :)

Summary: Cute, Cozy Gem. Your with in a few feet from the Beach. The rooftop view is absolutely gorgeous, we had brunch and the food was amazing! The staff is awesome. We met the GM Phelton very üòé . Highly recommend this hotel.. we will be back!
Manager Response: That you so much for staying with us and YOU are AWESOME! :) Hope to see you back!

Summary Heading: La Casa del Camino - Shoo away your stress
Summary: Normally when I visit California, I always go back home to San Pedro, but this time, I figured we needed something different, quaint, old and a different vibe, La Casa del Camino was definitely it.  From our welcoming from Gustavo, to the bottle of wine that was brought to our room.  If you are looking for a peaceful getaway, this is your place.
Manager Response: So happy to hear you enjoy our vibe!! We are your HomeAway from home :) Come back to visit!

Summary: We stayed here on a Travelzoo deal and really enjoyed it overall. The dal waived the resort fee (whatever that is) and included a bottle of wine, which I very much enjoyed. Free parking was in a lot about a block away.  It's a lovely place, the staff were super friendly (including front desk, rooftop restaurant, and cleaning staff), there were free snacks and coffee/tea available for most of the day), and we felt comfortable at this hotel, even though the room was a bit small.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We are a historic property, and our flagship rooms are a bit on the smaller side. We do have Surf rooms which are more modern for any guest that is looking for something a little larger. Hope to have you back!

Summary: I paid for premium room, but got a standard which were cheaper. we are sorry but your room are not available. we will get you refund manager said ! more than 3 months and nothing fake manager and stuff  !
Manager Response: Sincerely apologize for your experience, please reach out to hotel directly as this was not brought to my attention.

Summary: We had the most wonderful weekend, celebrating Mother‚Äôs Day at La Casa del Camino and the Rooftop Lounge! The hotel was so accommodating to our daughter, who is wheelchair enabled. The food and drinks at the Rooftop Lounge were delicious! Our whole family found delightful items on the menu and the staff worked with us to get keep the little kids happy :) Our accessible room was perfect! It was easy to maneuver through with a wheelchair and it made our staycation so much more pleasant! We enjoyed the live music in the lobby at night too! Our family likes to dance and we are still talking about our stay. We can‚Äôt wait to return!
Manager Response: Warms the heart to hear we took such great care of you and were able to accommodate your daughter. We take pride in ensuring we deliver the best experience! Please do come back and visit!

Summary: We celebrated our 23rd Anniversary as we married in Laguna Beach.  Staff was friendly and helpful.  Our room was clean and unique.  The hotel is located near the beach, shops and restaurants.  The rooftop restaurant is great!   We‚Äôll be back!!!
Manager Response: Very happy to hear you had such a great time and great anniversary! Hope to have you back again!

Summary: We loved staying here! My husband and I took a 3 night trip to Laguna Beach. We had a room with a little balcony and the room was cozy and comfortable. Great customer service. It was clean and newly renovated. Thanks so much!
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us! Very much appreciate you and glad we were able to take care of you!

Summary: La case del camino is an excellent hotel to stay at. It is very clean and has awesome views from the rooftop bar. i highly recommend the hotel and would recommend to anyone to make a reservation at the rooftop to see the sunset on their stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words and for staying with us! Come back and visit!

Summary: Great location. Very nice staff. Coffee in the am. Water at the front desk. Brief walk upstairs to rooftop bar / restaurant. Walking distance to downtown. Could not have been a better staycation. Loved it!
Manager Response: So happy to hear you had a great Staycation! Hope to see you back!

Summary Heading: Inexpensive, cozy historic-style hotel seems old indeed.
Summary: The room provides the minimum functionality for a stay. At $240 USD per night per guest (Single bed, including taxes and a $20 USD ‚Äúresort‚Äù fee) seems according to the Laguna Beach area. The property is walking distance from the ocean and very nice restaurants.  ROOM There seems to be an effort to have this hotel looking like an old villa, with tankless toilets, sink and vanity top outside the bathroom, heavy wood furniture, etc. My particular room had a view to a Jack in the Box drive-through, hopefully other can see the ocean.  ROOM AMENITIES There were 2 USB chargers by the bed and only one worked. Another one by the desk. A couple of outlets by the sink outside the bathroom. There is a safe, a small fridge and a portable A/C unit in case it gets too hot. I‚Äôm personally not a
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us! We do have rooms with views as well and do our best to make sure guest enjoy them when available. As we are historic property those are the only AC units we are allowed to use. Very happy to hear my team was able to take care of you and sincerely apologize for early morning work.

Summary: A really nice boutique hotel with an amazing roof top bar/restaurant. The hotel has designed rooms and we were in a skate room. Lovely design.  The hotel has some years since last time it was updated but stil in fresh and clean style! We wil come back!
Manager Response: Very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay!! Come back soon!

Summary: This beautiful, historic property is a must stay when in Laguna. The hotel is only steps from the beach and restaurant options. During my stay, I tried both the restaurant on the main level and the rooftop.  Food was good, and the sunset views were breathtaking. Got a bit busy on the rooftop, as this is one of the few places to get unobstructed water/sunset views while dinning. After dinner, we enjoyed a glass of wine in front of the fireplace in the living room. It‚Äôs a great space to enjoy a drink, eat or even work (saw a couple of people working in front of the fireplace on their laptops). Look forward to being back.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!! Please do come back and visit, very happy to hear everything was great!

Summary: After a 3-week journey north and south and south and north I returned south following our brother's funeral. La Casa del Camino was the respite I yearned for 'by the ocean' to bring closure to my month long journey. The reception entry, the roof top dining, the intimate Spanish Queen room I shared with my sister- the overall experience was exceptional. At the top of the list was the concierges; one more welcoming than the other; always with smiles, kindness and small talk to ease our souls. Molte graze!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us and so sorry to hear about your loss. Very happy to hear you loved our little spot and hope to have you back!

Summary Heading: La Casa Del Camino The Laguna Experience
Summary: My Wife and recently Traveled to Southern California and were given a couple of choices of Hotels in the Laguna Beach area.  We selected the La Casa del Camino and are very happy we did.  The Staff was very friendly and helpful with any questions we had about the area.  The facility is cozy, quaint and clean.  Thank you for making our stay outstanding
Manager Response: Truly appreciate you and your kind words. We love our little piece of heaven and always happy to hear when our guest do! Please come back again and thank you for letting us make your stay outstanding! :)

Summary Heading: There‚Äôs a Fine Line Between Rustic and Musty
Summary: There are some nice looking rooms online. Unfortunately, ours was not one of them! Our room was musty and needed updating. We were off the noisy alley and had two windows that didn‚Äôt lock and one that didn‚Äôt open!  We could hear toilets flushing in the rooms around us ‚Äî including waking us up at 4 a.m.!  There was one uncomfortable chair in our room and the furniture was missing some of its knobs.   Staff was unhelpful. $20 parking was a block away.   If your only requirement is being close to the beach, this is the place for you! Otherwise, keep looking.
Manager Response: Sincerely apologize we were not able to deliver, we do have more updated rooms called Surf Rooms that are not of the older style. Will definitely take a look at the maintenance issues and get this rectified as soon as possible and review where the staffing issues occurred.

Summary: I truly enjoyed my stay. Me and my dog we‚Äôre definitely living our best lives! The staff is very friendly and attentive. I got a casa surf room and the themed Decorations were perfect. The windows opened and I had a view of the ocean. I could hear the waves crashing day and night, they offer bottled waters, coffee and pastries in the morning. I also enjoyed the rooftop lounge which offered great views! It‚Äôs walking distance to great restaurants and shopping. This place is a gem!
Manager Response: Amazing to hear everything was delightful! We love our furry friends as well!!! Please do come back and visit us again :)

Summary Heading: Gem of a place with all amenities
Summary: Cute hotel with all the amenities for a business traveler and vacation. Smaller rooms are thoughtfully decorated to high quality and detail. Staff and service are genuinely delightful. Location is superb with guest parking across the street. No swimming pool or bathtub which would make it a 5* facility üòÄ
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and appreciate you loved our property, please do come back and visit!

Summary Heading: Cute hotel, but very noisy and there are "hidden" charges.
Summary: The hotel is a cute and the room was furnished with very nice antique style furniture and the staff was friendly.   The problems were mostly with noise. The windows did not close all the way (1/2 gaps on the top), so there is a cold breeze and noise from the partiers in the alley below all night. Also, the room door did not seal, so people talking in the hall (at all hours) sounded like they are in our room. When the person in the room next-door took a shower, we could barely carry on a conversation over the noise.  They also added $20 plus tax per day "Activity Fee" which they said was breakfast (coffee and a small packaged pastry), wifi and parking. Parking was supposed to be free according to their website.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and apologies on the issues you encountered. Will make sure those items get addressed immediately. We do have all fees listed on our sites and partnering sites.

Summary: We came here to celebrate my husband‚Äôs 70th birthday with another couple. The front desk host immediately said happy birthday to my husband and upgraded our room to a king surf room with gorgeous ocean views. Not only that but they upgraded our friends room also. Inside our room was a bottle of wine with two glasses and a lovely card from the hotel wishing happy birthday. It all made us feel very  warm and welcomed. Dinner on the Rooftop had a wonderful view and our waiter was very friendly, humorous, and accommodating. He even brought a free dessert with a candle at the end. Fresh coffee and danish in the lounge in the morning. All staff were very friendly even when just passing in the hall. Beautiful, historic atmosphere and great location topped it all off!
Manager Response: So happy to hear we made your birthday enjoyable! We take great pride in taking care of all our guest. Please do come back and visit us again :)

Summary: We have been visiting Laguna for many years for work, and after a 2 year hiatus due to Covid, we were in town for a combo of work and relaxation. And we had family that was joining us a bit later in the trip. Since we were here for a whole week, we opted for the larger Surf room. The regular rooms are tiny but nice and fine for shorter stays. We ended up in the DeBilzan gallery room. Art on every wall and room, which includes a sitting room, office and bedroom as well as the shower/toilet room and a small room with sink closet and fridge. It was like living in an Art Gallery! Track lighting, artsy seating beautiful floors and a hip vibe. A bit of water view from the bedroom too. Will try for this or a surf room on future visits. The rooftop lounge/bar/cafe is a must, and the
Manager Response: So happy to hear you loved the Riviera room! We have other style surf rooms as well with full views. Thank you for staying with us and hope to have you back again!

Summary Heading: Great little boutique hotel with very friendly staff!
Summary: As soon as you walk into this hotel you want to know all about its history!  This is a historical hotel so you will be disappointed if you are looking for new and modern.  This hotel just has so much charm and character.  The front desk staff was also really friendly and helpful.  The downside to this hotel is that the hotel is not directly on the beach and the view is very limited and the rooms are small.  You do have to walk past several other homes/vacation rentals to reach the beach access.  It is in a great location at Laguna Beach, with shops and food choices all around.  We felt very safe to walk around after dark in the area.  We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and happy to you were able enjoy yourself and experience the history!

Summary: This hotel is wonderfully quirky! The beach, shopping & restaurants are all just steps away. The staff is very friendly & helpful. The comfortable rooms are clean. I‚Äôd stay here again for sure! The beaches are beautiful!
Manager Response: Very much appreciate you staying with us, hope to have you back again!

Summary: Great hotel right on the water in Laguna. Be sure to get an ocean facing room because the interior room views aren‚Äôt very appealing. Hotel location is amazing. Very close to downtown Laguna and has everything you could need within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with and glad you enjoy the surf rooms! Our historic rooms our flagship rooms. Hope to have you back.

Summary: Portable AC units in the room work very well. The Rooftop sports the best sunset viewing spot. Great live music in the lobby. Good food and drinks with great prices for being such a well known beach hotel and bar. Parking included in the resort fee diagonally across the street. Packaged pastries with coffee and tea available much of the day.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and very much appreciate you!

Summary: I loved EVERYTHING about La Casa del Camino.  Not only is the building charming and the accommodations lovely and clean with every amenity imaginable, every member of the staff went out of their way to make things special.  I found LCDC on line, and although I do not expect to be in Laguna Beach often as I live on the East Coast, I really can't wait to return.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for staying with us and very much appreciate you taking the time to write such kind words. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The staff was very helpful and polite. Rooms were very clean. The food was very good. Great location in the middle of town. Great view of the ocean from roof top bar and restaurant. Quiet dining room.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! Come back and visit soon!

Summary Heading: 5* for the friendliness of the staff. Everyone from the front desk, to the cleaning staff and the chef were so welcoming
Summary: The friendliness of the entire staff and the comfort of the lobby as a meeting and greeting place.  The live music on the weekends was a plus. Yes the walls are thin. Dogs are most welcome. (Bonus for me and my 4 pound Pepper) a step away from the beach, great shopping, restaurants and other live music venues. Cute room as well.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed 2 nights at Casa Del Camino. Location is the best, in walking distance to town and many restaurants and shops. Room is small but enough for 2. It an older property so walls are thin and noise travel, but was aware before booked based on other reviews.  Rooftop bar has awesome views and food was good, although pricey but again expected. Parking was easy and included in the $20 resort fee.   Overall a good place to stay for a quick getaway
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was a great escape..  Right on the ocean.  The roof top dining, food and bar with sunsets was fantastic.  Easy listening music for the afternoon early evening guest would have been better.  Hotel noise from other rooms and hallways made it difficult to sleep .
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a review of La Casita unit at La Casa del Camino.  The hotel itself appears to be doing a fine job of keeping up and improving a historic near-icon of Laguna Beach.  That's great to see.  Also, their tapas restaurant is excellent.  La Casita is a small house adjacent to the hotel.  It's down from Highway 1 and quiet.    Downstairs there are two bedrooms and a full bath, a third small bedroom and small bath, a living-dining area with gas fireplace.  Furnishings are simple but generally comfortable.  Owners need to upgrade the sheets and bedding.  The upstairs has a very small bathroom and shower, a sitting room, and a deck.  As is, this is wasted space because the sitting areas only have two uncomfortable chairs each.  Advice to owners:  put in two sofa chairs, or a bed,
Manager Response: Very much appreciate your feedback and thank you so very much for staying with us! We do have plans in the works for La Casita.

Summary: Gonzalo you are amazing and helpful and always available. Also the lovely woman with brown hair was outstanding - please let me know her name. And the woman with blond hair was so friendly and accommodating. Everyone I interacted with was friendly, kind, helpful, warm and I felt so at home. I loved my room with the ocean views and the warm Comfy big bed! Thank you also for providing a microwave which allowed me to warm Up my yummy leftovers. Lastly hearing the waves at night was so peaceful.   I will always return to Casa del Camino for these reasons. Thank you for making my visit so special! I wish you a very happy New Year! Warm regards, Kelly
Manager Response: Hi Kelly!! Thank you so much for the kind words, I will ensure all the colleagues are aware and know how much of an imact they made. Hope to have you back again soon!

Summary: I surprised my husband with a night at La Casa del Camino to celebrate his birthday and I'm so happy we stayed here! From the moment we arrived the staff at the hotel provided the level of warmth and hospitality that made our stay so special.  Our surf-themed, ocean view room was beautiful and so much more interesting than a typical franchise hotel. We had drinks while watching the sunset at their Rooftop lounge,  followed by a fabulous dinner in the hotel restaurant, Comedor. The staff brought complimentary champagne to our room for the birthday celebration. They even upgraded our room before we arrived. We will definitely be coming back for more special celebrations.
Manager Response: This is wonderful to hear! Very happy we went above and beyond. Hope to have you back, stay safe and stay well!

Summary: La Casa del Camino was a perfect choice for my stay in beautiful Laguna Beach. The historic building was interesting yet comfortable with modern updates. The room was cozy yet elegant. The staff was exceptionally friendly as well. Lastly the hotel is very nicely located, within walking distance of many establishments, and close to a trolley stop. The beach is within steps and is a lovely spot.
Manager Response: Very much appreciate we were able to make your stay in Laguna beautiful! Please do come back and visit us again :)

Summary: Thank You Gonzalo (Hotel Manager), Felton (General Manager) and Cindy (Front Desk) for a fabulous stay at La Casa del Camino!  You made our stay so enjoyable, and we look forward to seeing you again for another visit. The rooms may be small, but are very nice, and this historic hotel is wonderful.  It's in a great location, you can take chairs and umbrellas down to the beach, walk into town, and it has two great restaurants you can enjoy.
Manager Response: Thank you so much and you are so welcome!! Looking forward to your next visit as well :) Stay safe and always happy to make your day!

Summary Heading: Wonderful weekend getaway to La Casa del Camino
Summary: I tried this hotel through a travel deal and i'm already planning my return!  I almost don't want to review my stay because this hotel is such a hidden gem, but I would be remiss not to call out the friendly staff and homey, laid-back vibe of the place!  I'm a clean freak and I found the place to be exceedingly clean and the amenities are top-notch.  I really do look forward to booking again and see La Casa del Camino being my GO-TO place for all sorts of occasions in SoCal!
Manager Response: Thank you so much! Our staff love what they do and its what also makes this place great, Happy to hear you loved our property and hope to see you again!

Summary: Visited for 1 night mid-November and the weather was a gorgeous 88 degrees. Skies were clear, gentle breeze and it was perfect. Hotel location is prime for easy walking to shopping and dining. Direct access to a beautiful spot on the beach as well. This time of year was less crowded for restaurants and parking, which can be tough throughout Laguna.  We stayed in the Quiksilver room which was a great size. Bathroom was updated and bed was comfortable. The hotel is older so adjacent noise is to be expected. The rooftop bar is spectacular. Be sure to make reservations in advance if you are hoping to catch the sunset.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for Staying with us! Hope to see you back to experience more of the hotel and surf rooms.

Summary: I was drawn to the place for the rooftop lounge but the rooms are perfectly quaint and romantic. We went as an overnight  anniversary getaway and our welcome and treatment by the staff was personable and professional, the room was presented, clean and special for our anniversary. Everything was in working order and loved the window box planters. I was even pleased that the hotel was quiet enough to sleep with the windows open to feel, smell and hear the ocean as we slept and woke in the morning.  We definitely will return often.
Manager Response: Hope to see you back again soon! Thank you for the kind words and we truly value you, happy we made your stay enjoyable!

Summary: My husband brought me here for a quick birthday getaway. I enjoyed every bit of my time there. The rooms are clean. Excellent customer service from all the staff that we encountered.  I had all the amenities I needed. The rooftop restaurant was a nice bonus. Amazing views and Great food! I would highly recommend. We will be back!
Manager Response: Very happy you enjoyed your stay and that you had a great birthday! Hope to see you again!

Summary: From the staff to the location, the charming rooms to the overall stay, it was fantastic. Our 2nd time here and no complaints at all. Very helpful staff....from the front deck to the housekeeping. Location is awesome. Close to all there is to really do and see in the City. Walking distance to everything you need: grocery, food, beach, trolley, etc. And all at a great rate. You wont be disappointed!
Manager Response: Much appreciated! Love our return guest and new guest! Please do come and visit us again and thank you!

Summary: Hotel was amazing !! Perfect view beautiful room will be back !! The food at the rooftop lounge was amazing as well. The staff made my 27th birthdays one of my favorite birthdays up to date. Will be back very soon.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and happy to hear you had an AMAZING Birthday! Come back and visit soon :)

Summary: We loved staying at La Casa for our stay in Laguna Beach.  Great location, great service, loved the restaurant, loved the vintage vibe.   Staff was very friendly, loved having the coffee station.   We will be back.
Manager Response: We so appreciate you! Please do come back and visit us again :)

Summary Heading: Great hotel and location and the staff is wonderful
Summary: It was my first time staying at this hotel, and I loved it. Cindy at the front desk made me feel really welcomed and at ease, which is important when you are traveling by yourself as a woman. The location can't be beat! It's basically on the ocean and really close to some great restaurants. I will definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the to write this and recognize one of our colleagues. Very happy to hear she made your stay and that you were taken such great care of. Come back and visit us soon!

Summary Heading: A beautiful Spanish style hotel seconds from the ocean
Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here for a quick getaway, and we had such a great time. This hotel is literally around the corner from a staircase leading you down to the beach! We took a moonlit stroll one evening, it was so fun. The hotel is also located close to a lot of bars with live music, so there was lots for us to do even on a weeknight. The hotel has a Spanish style architecture, and is very cozy. The rooftop bar offers gorgeous views of Laguna Beach and the hills, it's the perfect place for breakfast or grabbing a drink during happy hour when the sun starts to go down. We will be back the next time we pay a visit to Laguna Beach, our favorite beach in SoCal!
Manager Response: Thank you so very for staying with us. Very happy to hear you had an absolutely amazing time!! Please do come back and visit us, stay safe and stay well!

Summary: This is my second stay at the hotel. Very comfortable accommodations but even better service. Front desk staff make you feel at home and the food and views on the rooftop are really impressive! Probably the best rooftop experience in Laguna Beach! Thank you for always taking care of my family and friends!
Manager Response: Thank you for coming back! We love having regulars :) You are so very welcome and we look forward to taking care of you again!

Summary: We stayed in the Casita for a long weekend and it was perfect. We had two couples so used the two full bedrooms and used the third room with a twin daybed for extra storage. The deck/patio was lovely and we enjoyed having a kitchen and refrigerator, in addition to the living room and deck. The casita basically next to the hotel - maybe a building or two between them but on the same block. It‚Äôs one block from the beach so very easy access. The service was amazing and everyone was very friendly!
Manager Response: We are hoping to have La Casita be an even better experience in the months to come. Thank you so much for staying with us and happy to hear we did amazing to take care of you!

Summary Heading: Casa del Camino deserves all 5 stars
Summary: From making our reservation to our check out at La Casa del Camino was amazing. My husband book a one night stay for our anniversary and called ahead to let the staff know. The wonderful hotel staff went above and beyond making sure our room was ready early and having rose petals carefully laid out. My father is law also called to have a bottle of wine sent to our room and it was nicely displayed and ready upon our check in. We love to make this suburb beach hotel our go to spot. Many thanks to the amazing staff that made this trip extra special!
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to have you and happy to hear you had an amazing anniversary! Our housekeeping supervisor loves making those for our guest so I will definitely let her know how much you liked it. Thank you again for staying with us and come back and visit us :)

Summary: Hotel was cute. The tapas restaurant was amazing. The rooftop lounge had great views.  Room was clean, bed comfortable and the employees were super friendly and helpful. We had a partial ocean view but it was on the 2nd floor near the kitchen so it was a bit loud the 1st night but after we mentioned it to the front desk it was much better the 2nd night.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to take care of you and happy you enjoyed your stay. looking forward to your next trip!

Summary Heading: The Most Lovely Little Spot in Laguna!
Summary: I love staying at places with character and comfort and La Casa del Camino is so cozy and welcoming with so much charm. It‚Äôs literally RIGHT by the beach, we could see the ocean and beach from our window. The staff was very warm and welcoming and made sure my girlfriend‚Äôs stay was special. The rooftop bar is also a gorgeous spot for drinks and dinner.   Thank you for making our short lil trip to Laguna so enjoyable!
Manager Response: You are so welcome and thank you for allowing us to take care of you and make your trip special!  Stay safe and stay well! See you next trip :)

Summary: Very pleasant stay. Cute rooms, great desk, enjoyed all of the restaurants. Perfect location to walk everywhere! We especially enjoyed access to beach chairs, towels, water, and an early check-in. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, glad you were able to relax and enjoy yourself :) Come back soon!

Summary: Such a great spot. The staff was absolutely awesome. Every single person we interacted was friendly and helpful. The rooftop and both restaurants were great. We are definitely returning.  Thank you la casa del Camino team!
Manager Response: Thank you much for staying with us! Please do come back and visit soon!

Summary Heading: Little Piece of Heaven by the Beach
Summary: Our stay at La Casa Del Camino was amazing! We had an ocean room view for a few nights on the 3rd floor and the view was everything you could expect and more.   We were able to check out both of the restaurants the property has to offer. The exquisite taste and feel of Comedor was our favorite. Although, the views from the Rooftop Lounge and accompanying cocktails were a very close second.  From the moment we checked in, we were greeted with absolute grace from Cindy and Dalton. We loved the vibe of the living room. We were able to watch the Buccaneers game on Thursday night. In the morning, it was a great spot to read and sip coffee.  The hotel couldn't be closer to a very quiet and quaint beach. We loved it so much and will be back so soon.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay! Cindy is Amazing and will let Phelton (Dalton) know as well :) We take pride in assisting our guest, please do come back and visit!

Summary: We visited from Ohio. Our friends who live in Huntington Beach recommend this place. It was in the heart of Laguna. We could walk everywhere. The staff was amazing and constantly checking  in to see how our stay was going . The rooftop bar was the most happening place in town with breathtaking views. Would come back here in a heartbeat
Manager Response: We love the locals! Hope to see you soon! Stay safe and stay well!

Summary: Upgraded to the surf room with a king bed and ocean views. Wasn‚Äôt disappointed!! Walking distance to so many places. Very conveniently located.  Beds were comfortable, amazing rooftop lounge on top of the hotel that we always visit. It was nice to finally stay there.
Manager Response: Very happy to hear you finally made it down, thank you for letting us take such great care of you! See you next trip!

Summary Heading: Cindy, Michael and others are outstanding üòä

Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us! Wil definitely know they played a part in you enjoying your stay! Do come back soon!

Summary: Friendly and excellent staff.  Close to beach and beach was not crowded.  Hotel provided beach towels, chairs and umbrella.  Walking distance to shops and restaurants. Room was small and quaint.  Rooftop had great view. Great experience!

Summary: Historic place with a B&B feel located perfectly near the ocean. Special thanks to the amazing desk staff who were friendly, knowledgeable, and even offered amazing stories about the hotel from years past. Spend some time in the hotel ‚Äúliving room,‚Äù and you can feel the unique energy of the place. Also thanks to Cyndi for her special talent in hospitality and putting me in the perfect corner room! Take your coffee to the rooftop early in the morning and take in the ocean.

Summary: My husband and I stayed 2 nights to visit friends in the area.  Price was fair to be Oceanside.  Walk right out the side door and your practically to the stairs that take you right down to the beautiful sandy  beach.  We had dinner on the roof top deck with amazing views.  Great staff and great food.  The hotel staff also very friendly.  The room was pretty small but we managed it ok and had a portable air conditioner that kept the room comfortable.  There was coffee in the lobby with various cookies but lots of restaurants for breakfast, lunch and dinner very close to us.  We had free parking across the street and also the city provides a free trolley that runs most of the day and maybe even to later in the evening.

Summary: Excellent beachside location, charming Spanish-style rooms, wonderful rooftop bar & restaurant (with panoramic views of the coastline) and stellar staff! I have stayed at La Casa del Camino several times and look forward to my next visit!

Summary: Extremely disappointed in a sterile small room with no amenities at a crazy price!  The queen room appeared to have a double saggy bed.  The portable air conditioner was rather loud making sleeping challenging.  The bathroom sink did not drain & the refrigerator did not cool.  We put the "clean room" sign up, however no one came to clean.  The price of $415 per night for a special birthday was really disappointing.  We wanted to leave and stay at a Motel 6, however the hotel had our credit card.  We had an inside room with a peep hole window to the front reception staff as our view.  Couldn't keep the window open!  Wasn't expecting an ocean view, but was not expecting to see the staff & lobby guests. Our displeasure, disbelief & disappointment went unheard from the hotel staff.

Summary: La Casa del Camino has always been a remarkable place to stay in Laguna Beach. It has a great rooftop bar view unbelievable ocean and sunset views.  Their restaurant food is fantastic. It is also walking distance to anything in Laguna.

Summary: This hotel is a true gem. The true definition of paradise. If one, was to write a movie or think of a place that you would fancy as Eden this hotel would be the touchstone. Summary Heading: Nice Hotel.. didn't live up to its safety procedures.

Manager Response: Thanks for the kind words about our team!  We are glad that you were able to have a wonderful experience with us. Manager Response: Ema J, we sincerely appreciate you taking a moment to write us a review.  We are so happy that you enjoyed your time at our hotel and Laguna Beach!

Summary: This was very special anniversary (37th), The desk clerk upgraded our room at a discount gave us champange, beautiful beach view. Top notch service, we looking at reservations ass soon at we are allowed to do it. The rooftop bar was beautiful, great view and great company, sunset was gorgeous. the restaurant was excellent!! Hats off to the Chef.
Manager Response: Jeffrey S, we love hearing about your experience with us for your anniversary!  Thank you for spending a special time with us and getting to enjoy the views and yummy food.  Let us know when you pick and date, we'll make sure to get you set up to watch another sunset at the Rooftop.  Cheers!

Summary: This hotel was one of the best experiences we have had in our dozen plus trips to Laguna Beach. From the quant setting of the lobby to the AirBNB feeling of the Skate room and the perfect sunset view from the Rooftop this was an awesome visit. The food in both the K'Ya and the Rooftop was delicious and perfect portions. The hotel and wait staff were friendly and made our stay even more enjoyable!
Manager Response: We love celebrations!  Sounds like you were able to stay in our Etnies Casa Surf Room this trip, this room has a very fun theme and a great view.  We are so appreciative that we were able to make your anniversary an enjoyable one, our entire team takes extreme pride in making our guests feel they are among friends.  We'll have the sunset view ready for the next Laguna getaway!

Summary Heading: A solid 4.5* for this cozy and quaint spot in Laguna
Summary: After finding this deal on travelzoo, I couldn't resist booking for a quick getaway weekend in Laguna Beach. Plus, the SoCal heat in September and warm water temps were an additional draw. Due to work obligations, my spouse and I were unable to arrive to La Casa until around 10pm on Friday night. The lobby area was lively and filled with folks who had just come from the lobby restaurant. Nicholas helped us check-in and while I had hoped to upgrade to a surf themed room, due to a lack of availability, Nicholas patiently listened to what we were looking for (peace and quiet!) and gave us Room 308. Having read many reviews prior to staying, I knew what I was in for with the Spanish Queen. The room is indeed, very small, and the carpet is indeed, pretty gross. But, as we did not
Manager Response: LilCTravels - what a fun review detailing your recent stay with us - we loved reading your tips!  Thank you so much for mentioning Nicholas and Carlie, we will make sure to share this with them and the team as well.  We hope your travels bring you back to our cozy and quaint spot!

Summary: We‚Äôve visited the Rooftop Lounge before but never stayed at the hotel. Knew that the rooms tend to be smaller because of its age going into it so it was not a problem. The room was clean, light with windows that open, and  big shower!  We enjoyed the beach equipment they offered, the free breakfast, and of course the Rooftop Loung. But mostly I can‚Äôt say enough about the people working there. Everyone was so nice and accommodating. We will return!
Manager Response: We love hearing that we were able to host your visit to the hotel and after spending time at The Rooftop!  Thank you so much for recognizing the team, it means so much to us.  Most importantly, the biggest compliment is knowing that you will return - we hope soon!

Summary: We had a most splendid time at Casa del Camino for our anniversary. We got a surf room with a gorgeous view of the Pacific. It had plenty of space and a well thought out unique ambiance! The staff were exqusitely friendly, helpful and professional. The restaurant Kya bistro was delicious and the roof top bar was amazing for cocktails and sunsets. You also can't beat complimentary breakfast and beach accoutrement like umbrellas towels and chairs. It was bliss! Thanks to the staff and everyone who made our time so wonderful.
Manager Response: Kyle Kate D - we are so grateful to be a part of your anniversary memories. We also really appreciate you taking the time to share such kind words about our staff .  It sounds like you were able to take advantage of most of our little hotel - at K'ya, the Rooftop Lounge, breakfast and the beach!  There is always more to discover and we can't wait to help you on your next romantic getaway.

Summary: This was a business trip that cut short. The management was accommodating. The staff were all friendly and helpful.  The room was smaller than what I am used to and faced the street but the in-room air-conditioner helped white noise it out.  That said the location, so close to the ocean, made up for it.  I got approval to stay there because the rates were lower earlier in the week.  I'd love to take my family here some time in the future.  I plan on coming back for future business trips...(5-6 weeks)
Manager Response: We look forward to your next visit, thank you so much for planning to return.  Make sure to reach out so we can get any Rooftop reservations set up for you!  Safe travels.

Summary Heading: Has its pros and cons - I‚Äôm not sure we would stay at hotel again but we would definitely go to the Rooftop Lounge
Summary: We asked if we could have a quieter room w/ a partial ocean view. When we arrived at our room, we realized we were next to the kitchen (which was quite noisy) and a door to exit the hotel. If we wanted to see the ocean from the room window, we needed to stand in one spot in the corner of the room while trying to keep our balance.
