The room was steaming hot so we turned on the portable air conditioner and decided to go up to the Rooftop Lounge. The view, drinks, food, and the bartenders at the Rooftop Lounge were amazing. After, we decided to go to our room and take a nap. We shut our eyes and we were both awoken by loud sounds coming from the portable air conditioner, it sounded as if it were going to combust. We realized we weren‚Äôt going to get any sleep so we decided to go for
Manager Response: Veralynn, thank you for letting us know about your recent stay. We are so sorry that your stay was disrupted a few times, we will share this with the team so we can look into this.   Thank you so much for visiting the Rooftop and glad that you enjoyed Laguna Beach!

Summary: We came here on a TravelZoo deal ($169 Saturday, $129 Sunday, including waiving the resort fee and a $20/day dining credit).  We loved this place!  Terrific location, less than 5 minutes from the lovely but small Cress Beach, near many shops, stores, bars, etc.  Charming Spanish colonial decor.  Very decent breakfast (buffet with several hot choices).  Excellent rooftop restaurant.  Room was small and dark (no relation to the picture on the site, which I'm sure was more, perhaps a lot more), but clean, nicely furnished and quiet.  Super helpful and friendly staff.  At the prices this hotel charges, even without the deal, it's hard for me to understand a less than 4 star review.  Will certainly come again with a similar deal.
Manager Response: We loved reading all the wonderful details about your stay!  Thank you so much for sharing with the TripAdvisor community.  Super grateful for you and your kind words!

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at La Casa del Camino. Staff was exceptional, location was amazing, perfect hotel & Laguna Beach get-a-way. I would highly recommend this hotel and be sure to take the time to walk and soak in the lovely beaches.
Manager Response: Thank you SandJWillis, it was outstanding to have you stay with us!  We are super appreciative of your review and so glad you had a great experience.

Summary Heading: Laguna Beach Gemdelicious.  I would recommend reserving a rooftop bar table for happy hour and enjoying the afternoon wi
Summary: I had not visited Laguna Beach for many years, but the summer heat finally was too much so we booked three nights at La. asa Del Camino. We were lucky enough to be able to upgrade to one of their larger ‚Äúsurf‚Äù rooms, and it was worth every cent.  Gonzalo Guzman, the manager greeted us and we dropped off our luggage and went up to the rooftop bar for lunch and drinks.  Both Fantastic.  Our room had an ocean view, air conditioner and was very eclectic in decor.  Based on a skateboarding theme the room was fascinating.  There is a nice beach about 100 yards from the hotel, and the hotel had beach umbrellas, chairs, towels for spending time at this beach.  The hotel restaurant, K‚Äôya is one of the best in Laguna beach, and the small plates were reasonably priced and delicious.  I
Manager Response: JoeZ395 - thank you so much for your amazing review and acknowledging Gonzalo!  Sounds like we were able to get you into our Etnies room... we are so glad you enjoyed the upgrade and were able to take advantage of the perk of getting a reservation at the Rooftop Lounge.  We will have the mojitos or sangria waiting for another getaway from the heat!

Summary: We booked 3 nights at this hotel at the end of August. We were in room 203, which was very small and faced the back of the hotel over the dumpsters. The hotel is old but well maintained. The rooftop bar is well known for it's ocean views and happy hour. The breakfast buffet was excellent. Free parking in a lot across the street. WiFi was strong. We will return, but will request a different room.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us this past August, Nomad582989.  We are glad you enjoyed your overall time with us and look forward to your return - the Spanish Kings and Casa Surf rooms might be a better fit for next visit.  Let us know and we will help you book the next getaway!

Summary Heading: Nice weekend at La Casa del Camino
Summary: We live in the county but spent the weekend at the hotel. The rooms are rustic and need a little updating. The first thing would be to pull up the old carpet and replace with hard flooring. The furniture is a little dated but they are trying to keep with the Spanish influence. The portable air conditioner was not working when we arrived at the room but that was replaced. After that, we spent the evening with friends at the rooftop lounge watching a beautiful sunset.  We ate at the restaurant (the food and service were very good), and we hopped on the free trolly the City of Laguna provides and rode around seeing the sites.  The hotel is above a very nice small beach and the hotel provides towels, chairs, and umbrellas. We will stay again and had a great and relaxing time.
Manager Response: Thank you for spending the weekend with us and sharing about your stay. We look forward to hosting another getaway soon.

Summary Heading: Summer work trip to Laguna Beach
Summary: I have stayed at this property for over 10 years and at least 50 nights.  Always a great visit to La Casa Del Camino.  Being the hight of summer, the A/C unit puttered out and had to be replaced.  This is 2 years in a row that this happened on my summer visit. The gentleman that worked on the unit was able to solve the issue after multiple room visits.  The room got to 85 degrees.  Also, I wish you had a loyalty program.
Manager Response: Oh dear, we are so sorry Mr. Gerhardt!  Thank you for letting us know about the A/C and allowing us the opportunity to fix it.  We are grateful your loyalty and look forward to showing our appreciate during your future stays.

Summary: Off the famous PCH this hidden treasure is nestled close to the Pacific with an easy 2 minute walk to the beach. Falling asleep or waking up to the sound of waves, this natural white noise will calm any tension you may have. Enjoy the town with easy walks, amazing restaurants, and beautiful beaches. Park the car and never use it again, take advantage of the free trolley or pleasant walks. The Hotel has fun unique rooms, an amazing roof top where you can catch the sun set, and an amazing staff that is happy to help you with a smile. We will be back!
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for the 5 star review... but more importantly thank you for staying with us. It is so awesome to know that you were able to enjoy each aspect of your visit and stay.  We appreciate you, come back soon!

Summary: Our service for the two times we have stayed this year has been engaging, service focused, genuine, as if you have been there a 100 times. Carley and Carson have checked us in and have made us feel special with their attention focused on us and our needs.  Kay the restaurant has some of the best food, small plates with a satisfying palette.
Manager Response: This is wonderful to hear Brenda S!  We look forward to sharing this with Carlie and the team.  Thank you for continuing to let us take care of you during your Laguna Beach visits.

Summary: What a absolutely perfect two day trip! The hotel staff were friendly and efficient, our room had an amazing view, and the bar and restaurant could not have been any better. Gonzalo and Saul were so helpful, and answered any questions we had. We had a wonderful breakfast, with mimosas and bloody Mary‚Äôs. They had a wonderful bottle of wine in our room when we arrived. Couldn‚Äôt ask for a better beach getaway! We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: What an awesome review, thank you!!!  We are so happy that we were able to make your Beach Getaway a memorable one. We look forward to more getaways in the future!

Summary: Customer service was superb !! From check in to check out everyone was friendly and helpful. Had dinner at the Tapas restaurant downstairs and it was fantastic! The view is breathtaking at the rooftop deck. Their mojitos are the best! Will definitely will come back
Manager Response: L8kerzgrl, thank you so much for the LOVE!  We appreciate you staying with us during your visit to Laguna Beach and exploring the hotel as well.  We'll keep the mojitos flowing!

Summary: We were very impressed with our stay. The location is great. the breakfast, beach supplies, restaurants were all wonderful. The staff was professional and helpful. We are already planning our trip for next year.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting us be a part of your wonderful week!  We love that you had a chance to explore the hotel as well as the area - both us and Laguna are small and full of character.  We look forward to your next stay!

Summary: The location is great, walking distance to pristine Laguna Beach.  Rooftop restaurant is fantastic. Unobstructed views of the ocean-- perfect place for happy hour and sunsets.  Gets very busy and even non-hotel guests come.  Hotel rooms are tiny, cramped, and very little views.  Do not get rooms on the first floor because it is actually in the basement with the restaurant smell and noise of cups and plates clanging.  Dont get room into the 'courtyard' which is tiny and gets no sun.  Dont get room facing Pacific Coast Hwy because it is very noisy.  Rooms get very hot and only have a rolling portable air unit. Tiny sink and tiny shower, but you are here to go to the beach, buy very pricey for the room that you get.  At check in was very pleasant.  I was introduced to Supervisor
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear about your experience with us, this is definitely not typical - we pride ourselves on our service and problem resolution when issues arise.  We will definitely share this with the team so we can better assist our guests as well as documenting guest concerns.  We appreciate you letting us know.

Summary: We spent 3 days here and couldn‚Äôt have been more pleased; we are Beach aficionados and the Hotel has chairs, towels, and umbrellas for your stay; the beach is only a short block away.  All rooms come with a breakfast buffet which was more than adequate. The best part of our stay were the competent front desk personnel ‚Ä¶ everyone of them that we interacted with were so considerate and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent Laguna Beach visit!  We love that you had a chance to enjoy the area and amenities during your stay, we hope to host you again soon.

Summary: I love this hotel I would recommend tTo everyone great food great service great prices great service  you have the beach at your feet and the shops out side your door and views that are amazing at the rooftopbar
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the recommendation Sunnyalbert4u, that is one of the highest compliments we can receive!  We truly appreciate you.

Summary Heading: In love with La Casa Del Camino
Summary: My friend and I stayed here for two nights and loved it! We had the best dinners at the rooftop and kya and had a great free buffet brekkie! The rooms are so cute and your steps away from a private little beach.
Manager Response: We so grateful for your review, thank you for staying with us and taking a moment to share with others.  Come visit again soon!

Summary: My husband and I spent two nights during our honeymoon. The staff was exceptional, the rooms were unique, the property had a beautiful rooftop and great happy-hour in the lobby. The beach is just step away.  Thanks for the upgraded room and champagne waiting for usü•Ç
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting us host such a special occasion, we are thrilled that we were able to celebrate with you.  Congratulations and we hope to see you on your anniversary!

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights at La Casa  Staff this July - staff were really friendly and helpful, our room was number 109 and was very comfortable - quite large, Spanish style good air con.   We would recommend this hotel because everything we asked for was provided - great chairs and umbrella and towels for the beach, bottles of water whenever we wanted. The breakfasts were lovely and best of all was the roof top bar - friendly with excellent views.
Manager Response: We are so happy you had a lovely visit with us 444ruthh!  Thank you for letting us take care of you and happy to hear you were able to take advantage of our amenities and offerings. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I loved the place but it‚Äôs not everyone‚Äôs cup of tea.  The good: live music in lobby; beach access with chairs, umbrellas, etc; food/drink at restaurant downstairs, view from rooftop bar, free breakfast, location on the main drag. The bad:  tiny rooms and bathrooms, musty smell that is strong if windows closed, breakfast identical every day.  I wish they‚Äôd just replace the carpets with tile. It would look nice and eliminate the smell.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us Erin O!  We are happy to hear you loved your time and really appreciate you sharing with us so we can make our quaint hotel better in the future.  Cheers!

Summary: Great location, one block to beach and across from nice shops and a few great restaurants for breakfast and lunch. Rooftop bar draws a great crowd and the sunsets are great. Staff was terrific, friendly and tried to accommodate.   But if your looking for clean and comfortable, your in the wrong hotel. It‚Äôs old and not well taken care of. The carpets are old and mildewed, trash piled up at elevators all day. Everything is sticky and dirty.  We checked in and the A/C was not working. After about an hour (80 degrees) they finally replaced the floor unit. But the carpet was soaked from the condensation of the unit, so they began to clean it up. Only to discover the toilet was also leaking and there was about a 1/4 of water on the floor.   Staff was very helpful and got us another
Manager Response: We are so sorry we missed the mark during your visit, thank you for your feedback we appreciate it all - the good, the bad and ugly.  Glad to know that our location and service were a highlight and will definitely share our opportunities with the team.  Thank you.

Summary: We enjoyed Laguna Beach but would recommend looking at other hotel options. The rooms are awkward, the bed uncomfortable, and there‚Äôs not central air conditioning. They do provide a unit but the rooms have limited space so it takes up valuable space. But this also caused the rooms to be damp and musty smelling. The breakfast was good. As far as the rooftop bar, it has pretty views but the food was subpar.
Manager Response: Edith386; we are so sorry to hear that we missed the mark!  We will certainly look into this. We are glad you enjoyed Laguna, we hope to have another chance to host your visit in the future.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel walking steps to the beach
Summary: Rooftop bar had great views and restaurant downstairs had tasty food with discount prices during happy hour. First room wasn‚Äôt in good shape but the second room was great, nice view and no smell. Both rooms were well designed. Staff and service were great.
Manager Response: Stay82725, thank you for dining and staying with us!   We're glad you enjoyed your visit and appreciate you sharing your experience with us.

Summary: The staff was absolutely fabulous! The room was charming, and the breakfast was superior-the scrambled eggs with veggies and lobster was my favorite.  The parking was pretty tight and compact. The beach was clean and beautiful.
Manager Response: Thank you AndreeH15!  We are so happy to know you enjoyed your experience at our charming hotel. Thank you so much for the wonderful compliment for our staff, I am excited to share this with them!  Come back and visit soon!

Summary: A small hotel with a great location. It has that shabby chic feel to it. Not your run of the mill franchised motel. It's a little worn, but has great character. Cute little lobby. Has the great rooftop lounge. Easy walking to local shops and restaurants. Not a hotel for kids, as they would get bored. Great for a day or two tops. Interesting architecture.
Manager Response: Thank you Randy, we are glad to hear you enjoyed you stay!

Summary: Great Hotel for the price. Very European in style with a great ambiance and excellent service. The Roof Top Restaurant /Bar has the best views of Laguna Beach. Rooms are small but adequate. Fantastic breakfast buffet included with your visit and convenient parking also included. Take advantage of the FREE Laguna Beach Trolley that runs along the Coastal Highway and leave your car at the Hotel!
Manager Response: AI G, thank you so much for the 5 star review!!!   We really appreciate taking a quick moment to share your experience with us. But most importantly, congratulations on your Graduation! Thank you for letting us be a part of your trip.

Summary: This is an amazing location! The food in the facility is great and the rooms are funky but comfortable. You cannot beat the rooftop bar and steps to the rocks/beach. The only negative is the parking situation (very small spots) but that is pretty par for the course in Laguna or California for that matter...
Manager Response: Thank you so much Courtneyy174 - this is a perfect little summary of our hotel!  We believe that we are truly the best value in Laguna as well.  We hope your travels bring you back again!

Summary Heading: Worlds Smallest Room in the most lovely hotel
Summary: This is difficult to write as I really do like this hotel. It's historic, it's location is terrific, the breakfast was magnificent, the staff outstanding but the room....sigh. Rm 309 is the smallest room we have ever stayed in...with too many pieces of furniture, old carpet with a carpet deodorizer that was too strong, but a lovely shower..go figure.  If they took out a few pieces of furniture--tore the rug out and put tile down and got rid of the heavy velour curtains...it could be passable.  The staff apologized for not having a better room and we LOVED chatting with them...(we were last minute--not blaming them!).  However if  you're claustrophobic or have aversion to strong smells...then be sure to not stay in RM 309.  The breakfast was truly the best we had on our trip.
Manager Response: Marlo93, thank you so much for staying with us and appreciate your feedback and opportunities for us to review.  We do our best to share the square footage and emphasize that we are much more ideal for those that are looking to get out and about to explore Laguna; and need a great place to shower and rest!  We loved reading about your experience with our staff, location and breakfast.  We would love for you to return!  Our Spanish Kings or Casa Surf Rooms are more spacious options.

Summary: This is my favorite hotel in Laguna Beach. This hotel has free parking, use of beach chairs and umbrellas towels, an amazing breakfast each morning that would rival any restaurant in town, very courteous engaging staff, beautiful building that was built in 1927 with Spanish architecture, very nice room set up With exquisite pieces of furniture a lot of old world would and pleasing textures and colors. You feel like you are in your nice rich aunts house instead of a hotel. The rooms are smaller, but they are decked out with exquisite pieces and I would prefer this room over some big large empty spacious generic hotel. The TV is very large and plays a whole bunch of channels. Also this hotel is so charming you can either enter off of the main PCH or there‚Äôs a side entrance that is
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the thoughtful and amazing review!  We are so happy that you got an amazing deal - that always make the trip that much better!  We are super grateful for you taking the time to share and also letting us be a part of your Laguna experience.

Summary: We‚Äôve been going to Laguna several times a year for over 20 years. We try to stay at a different hotel each time but La Casa Del Camino is screwing up our mission... we keep going back !  It‚Äôs smaller than others, and it‚Äôs older than most, and that may be what makes it so great. Its one of if not the oldest hotel in Laguna Beach, but well maintained with obvious upgrades while maintaining an historic look.  On Our first trip we stayed in a tiny room, and loved it, this most recent trip we stayed in an ocean view king, Rm 314. This was a bigger room, and well decorated with surf stuff. The room has a stand alone AC, I think they all do, (remember, it‚Äôs an old building, and it worked well. We had a refrigerator, coffee maker and a safe, no microwave.  The $20 resort fee gets you
Manager Response: It was so great to celebrate with you this past weekend!  Thank you so much for letting us be a part of a special getaway and birthday trip.  We love making sure that our guests know how much we care and I'm so glad everything went off well.  Thank you so much for all of the wonderful words!  Each and every one of us appreciate you taking the time to share and recognize what we do and who we are.  See you soon!

Summary Heading: Our favorite hotel in Laguna Beach
Summary: This is the third time we've stayed at La Casa del Camino and we have always enjoyed ourselves.  The staff is friendly, the atmosphere is nice and relaxed, the rooftop bar is a wonderful place to enjoy a drink and watch the sunset, and the breakfasts are really good.
Manager Response: We are so appreciative that we have become your favorite hotel in Laguna, now we have to make sure that we turn that four into a five.  Please let us know what we can do to bring it up one more notch.  Thank you again for the loyalty!!!

Summary: For the price and location, this place is definitely underrated.  I found the hotel to be quite charming, and really enjoyed the room that I stayed in (Billabong-themed surf room).  Also had a chance to visit the Rooftop Lounge and had dinner at the K'ya Bistro restaurant.  Both experiences were excellent.  Especially K'ya Bistro, as they sat me at the lounge area and I had a front row seat for the guitarist/singer that was performing.
Manager Response: We are beyond happy to know you enjoyed your visit to our hotel and Laguna Beach!  We love our Billabong rooms, they are both a guest favorite.  Thank you for spending time at the hotel and experiencing our awesome Lounge and Restaurant. We appreciate you!

Summary: Would stay again. Peaceful, beautiful room with good partial ocean view. great service and food. Very close to beach. Clean. Management was very tentative and helpful. Free parking and beach towels. Husband and I had a great experience. I was at pacific edge with good experience last time and would pick casa over it anyday!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Proximity to the beach, but would not stay here again
Summary: We rented out La Casita while in town for a wedding. This hotel is not nice, but the Casita is a separate residence and has some really nice touches and some new elements. However, for $650/night the service is not there. When I called ahead they couldn't tell me about early check in (and after seeing the size of the Casita I understand), but when I arrived they made it seem like it is not an option for that type of accommodation. It did cause a problem because the other two members of my party were elderly and had been driving all day, and all everyone wanted to do was sleep and get ready (we just would have amended our flight and drive plans had we known). When I mentioned to the woman at the desk (just as an FYI) that they shouldn't make it seem like an option if it not
Manager Response: We are so sorry about any confusion with early arrival, unfortunately it does take several hours to clean and highly depends on what condition it was returned to us. We also appreciate you sharing your feedback so that we can address your concerns.  Since your stay in August 2018, there have been many improvements and the construction has been completed.

Summary Heading: The Second Time Was Even Better
Summary: We were headed to LA and decided to spend a few days just relaxing In Laguna Beach. The last time we were in Laguna we had a nice experience with La Casa del Camino. Finding a good price through the hotel was a pleasant surprise, even the extra charge ($20) for parking and breakfast for two was quite reasonable given this pricey town. We were welcomed at the desk by accommodating folk who helped us choose the exact room to meet our needs. We headed up to the rooftop and had drinks and warm Brie with the fantastic view that it affords. Melissa was nice and on the ball, as was Noelle the next day when we had great meatballs with our drinks. Connor, a super guy at the desk, represented the hotel very well. He gave us water when we needed it, helped us get the heater serviced, went
Manager Response: Clsm929, we are so thankful for your return visit as well as your review of the hotel, restaurants and our staff!  What wonderful compliments.  You know what they say... the third time is a charm!  We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: Absolutely gorgeous beaches. The hotel staff were amazing, tentative, and generous! My wife and I fell in love with Laguna Beach years ago, and now we've discovered this jewel within; La Casa Del Camino!!   The morning breakfast is an unexpected extravaganza! Our server AARON made the experience 5 star worthy! Thanks to Aaron and ALL the hotel staff!   We will definitely book our future trips to LB at the LCDC!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting all of us be a part of your Honeymoon!  We are all especially appreciative of the kind words for Aaron and the rest of the staff, I can't wait to share this with them.  Come visit us again soon!

Summary: La Casa Del Camino is a great hotel in a nice central location.  Easy walks to Victoria Beach or downtown Laguna.  Staff was very friendly and professional.  Roof top bar is worth the visit. Rooms are very nice and very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the awesome review and more importantly staying with us. We are so grateful for your positive feedback  - come visit us again soon!

Summary: All the people that works in the hotel are very nice, they gave us and early check in, the room was stunning, amazing shower and the view was fenomenal, the tapas style restaurant is really good and having brunch on the rooftop its ann experience
Manager Response: We were ecstatic to read your wonderful review, but also thrilled that you were able to take advantage of the restaurants during your stay.  Thank you for the kind words, we hope you'll be visiting again soon.

Summary Heading: Lovely rooftop, nice communal areas, professional team but room took it down from a 5 rating
Summary: We loved the rooftop bar here and the views it afforded, plus the perk of being able to book your seat if you are a hotel guest. The team were professional and helpful. But our particular room did not have a good view so if that‚Äôs important to you then do mention on booking. The room was clean and bed was comfortable but it wasn‚Äôt up to a 5 rating like the rooftop and the communal areas were.
Manager Response: Thank you KellyR1977, we are glad to hear you enjoyed the hotel and appreciate you choosing our hotel to host your visit to Laguna Beach.  Happy travels!

Summary: We arrived to the hotel 5pm. Women at reception tried to use first my Visa and then my boyfriends MasterCard. She said either works. She said we have to pick up cash. We tried 2 hours pick up money but none ATM at laguna works. We were soo tired about travelling, we go back to hotel. We ask women to try our cards again, and then se said ooh these works. I asked about price lowing but she said thats not her fault. She also said se hasnt sen ever cards like these. Women also looked us like we have no money, and just laugh when our cards didnt worked. So terrible service, cant recommend to anyone. Room also have very bad smell.
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear about your experience, this was a new form of credit card that our staff and operating system was not familiar with; which may also be why other ATMs were unable to accept it as well.  We have reached out to our merchant services to prevent this from happening again in the future. I can certainly imagine how this would have lead to a horrible reception and beginning of your stay.  We sincerely appreciate you taking a moment to let us know and sincerely apologize.

Summary Heading: Tiny but charming room in a charming hotel.
Summary: The room was very small but nicely appointed in old world Mediterranean vibe.  Shower was wonderful and bed comfortable.  A few minor electrical problems with ac and hair dryer.  The location is less than a block (and many stairs) from the beach.  The view from the rooftop lounge is wonderful but it was very crowded in the evening.  We went back in the morning to just enjoy the ocean view.
Manager Response: SLS Brown, thank you so much for staying with us on your visit to Laguna Beach.   We appreciate you sharing your experience and letting us take care of those hiccups.  Our Rooftop Lounge is usually quite busy, especially during sunset, but one of the best perks of staying at the hotel is being able to sneak up before the lounge opens to take in the views and ocean breeze.  We hope to charm you into another visit in the future!

Summary Heading: Fun little historic hotel in the heart of Laguna!
Summary: The rooftop bar, lobby and K‚Äôya restaurant were bustling hangouts for the locals and visitors alike. Yet I n our beautiful surf themed room we heard nothing but the waves!  The A/C made it nice for sleeping on the warmer nights.  Matt and Conner were both particularly helpful with things we needed during our stay.  Loved the lobby music!  Ate at K‚Äôya 2 nights in a row!  We are major foodies.  Yess it was THAT GOOD!  Try the Duck salad...but every thing we tried was excellent.  One of the best restaurants we have ever experienced!  We will be back!
Manager Response: FWillison, THANK YOU!!!  We really enjoyed reading your review.  Thank you for all of the wonderful compliments, especially for Matt and Conner. It sounds like you really got to take advantage of everything during the stay. Come visit us again soon, we'll have the food, waves and smiles waiting.

Summary: Room was small but full of charm. Venetian plaster walls and old world feel.   The location is the big selling point for us.  Rooftop bar great for happy hour drinks, get there early.  Walking distance to a multitude of entertainment venues, restaurants, gym.   Incredibly nice staff.  Great restaurant on property K‚Äôya.  You won‚Äôt have to get in your car the entire stay.   We love this place and will return.
Manager Response: We are so happy you enjoyed your time with us and sounds like you got to take advantage of all of our offerings!  Our location definitely helps to make everything that much easier. We hope you get another chance to visit us soon  and really appreciate the great review!

Summary: This is the first time we stayed at this hotel.  I loved the Spanish style hotel, the room was large and the bathroom was great with an open shower.  Bed was nice, pillows were horrible.  They were flat within minutes of laying on them.  Location is wonderful and the tapas were great as was the wine.  Parking is an absolute joke if you leave the hotel and come back in the evening.  We spent the day in Santa Monica and Hollywood, were in traffic for 2.5 hours and when we got to the hotel parking lot, there were two spaces left.  Both of those spaces we could not park in because the people who parked in the spaces next to them, parked so terribly.  I went to ask the front desk if there were other places to park and she said no.  It was VERY apparent that she couldn't care less
Manager Response: Slp0422, we sincerely appreciate you taking a moment to share your experience with us.  We are so happy that you enjoyed your room but see that we had a few opportunities.  We would have been happy to switch out the pillows for you! A good's night sleep is a must. Most importantly, we understand how the parking situation was frustrating, we have reviewed your feedback with the team so that we can better respond when we have these concerns arise. Thank you for letting us know and hope that you'll stay with us again on your next visit to Laguna Beach!

Summary: My Husband & i booked our weekend stay for our 32nd Wedding Anniversary through hotels.com.  We paid extra for an "ocean view" room, but did not get it as you can see from the picture that I posted.  The picture was taken from inside our room.  The picture that we were showed on hotels.com was of a brightly colored room with surf boards for decor -- cool.  What we got was a stark white room with creepy pictures of a "slender man" looking character.  Also, there is a full-length mirror directly in front of the toilet -- 18 inches in front of you that you can't escape from; not always a nice view.  The hotel called the room The Riviera Room #305, but we called it The Serial Killer room.  We did complain, but there were no other rooms available so the manager gave us a small
Manager Response: Bellarose1964, we are sorry to hear that you hadn't enjoyed the Casa Surf Room that we had available upon check in.  While many of our guests love the spacious Riviera Room because it is an art gallery, featuring the art of DeBilzan, this may not be to every guests liking.  We assure that you received room type you selected and were not charged for a view, we specifically do not sell or guarantee our rooms based on view type as some other properties are able to offer.  It is definitely important to review the details of the room type that is confirmed.  We pride ourselves on service and never would want to over promise and under deliver when a view can be subjective, our hotel has vacation rentals that lie between us and the water, so we don't have what many would consider a full ocean view at our hotel.  Likewise, it can be difficult to know what requests a guest might have when booking through a third party. The highlight was hearing that the rest of the experience was enjoyable - from the service to the experience in our restaurants.  We really hope we have another opportunity with you soon, there are nine other Casa Surf Rooms that may just be the right fit or you may even fall in love with our Spanish style rooms.  Thank you for spending your anniversary with us!

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel in vintage look with great food and view from rooftop bar
Summary: This hotel is a surprise - decent prices, yummy tapas and a gorgeous view from the rooftop bar into sunset. Next to the beach in a lovely city invites for a walk in the evening. Rooms are in vintage look but tidy and clean, breakfast is OK and parking lots are across the street
Manager Response: U3e_m, thank you so much for staying with us. We are glad to hear that we were a pleasant surprise and that you were able to take advantage of both the Rooftop Lounge and the Restaurant - k'ya. We appreciate you making us a part of your recent getaway.

Summary Heading: Quaint little place to stay, but watch for extra fees
Summary: My husband and I stayed here for a night while we were passing through California. It's a quaint and cozy old hotel -- our room was small, but comfortable, and the rooftop bar was nice (even in January). Staff were friendly, but not really attentive or willing to give that little bit extra that newer, more modern places can get away without giving. We slept well, though, and enjoyed the complimentary breakfast. Only real disappointment (and this is a big one) are all the extra fees the hotel tacks on to your stay... all in all those little extras added nearly 30% to the nightly rate that was quoted online.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us Bumble_Cee, we appreciate you taking a moment to share with us.  We absolutely would never want our guests to have the impression that any fees are not disclosed.  Unfortunately, when booking on websites other than through the hotel direct it can receive placement at the bottom of the confirmation e-mail.  This is disappointing for us as well, because we would never want to mislead anyone.  We are confident that we offer the best value in the market for our $20 resort fee - parking and breakfast often times can exceed $50 alone. I hope that when you return to Laguna, you will stay with us again.

Summary: We decided on spur of the moment midweek getaway and found a deal on Travelzoo for this gem of a hotel! We loved everything about it! The lobby was gorgeous and beautifully decorated with a cozy fire. The restaurant adjacent to the lobby was fantastic and also provided room service in the evening! The rooftop bar was perfect with a beautiful sunset view, get there before sunset for a good seat. Wine was half off, one night we had ceviche appetizer and the second night we had poke, both delicious. Staff at both the bar and hotel were friendly and attentive, they loaned us beach chairs and towels and sat on the beach for several hours listening to the ocean. I would recommend this hotel for a very romantic stay for anyone, we are in our 60‚Äôs and we loved it!
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you!  We sincerely love hearing that you were able to take advantage of all of hotel. Thank you again for the 5 stars and recommendation.  Come back soon for another romantic getaway, MooshiPalmdale - we'll have a glass of wine and a sunset waiting.

Summary: We stayed at La Casa in the skateboard room. Although their were minor quirks we expected that with staying at a unique hotel. The staff was great, very accomodating as we arrived early for check and they did everything in their power to make us comfortable. The room was sufficient with ocean view and great bed. Only downside was the beer delivery truck at 7am in the alley below. Comp breakfast was very good. Excellent roof top bar to view sunset with happy hour. Recommend getting up there early though.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us Ottissmithjr,  it sounds like you were in our Etnies Casa Surf Room, a favorite room with a great view. We really appreciate you taking a moment to point out the highlights and especially feedback out the delivery, we will definitely look into this.  That's a bit early!  We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: We decided to try this hotel with a special deal from Travelzoo. Glad we gave it a try, we will stay here again. Really nice buffet breakfast each morning served downstairs with an option to eat inside or in a little outdoor, European style courtyard. The room was small and basic but clean and comfortable. Parking lot is located just across the street. Breakfast & parking included in the resort fee. We had drinks and munchies each night in the outdoor rooftop bar, great place to watch the sun set. The staff were a delight, all friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: MIchelle, we appreciate you booking our special promo and giving us a shot!  Thank you for sharing about your visit with us and would love for you to come back again.

Summary: We stayed at La Casa del Camino over Thanksgiving week with a special deal from Travelzoo.  We were treated to a great buffet breakfast each day which included eggs, bacon, sausage, oatmeal with toppings, fresh fruit, French toast, some really great croissants and breakfast pastries, plus coffee and orange juice.  Our deal also included credit towards food at their rooftop ocean view bar and their tapas style restaurant.  We had some yummy lobster mac and cheese and delicious meatballs and pot stickers.    This is one of the oldest hotels in Laguna and it sits right on Pacific Coast Hwy just steps from stairs leading to the beach.  Parking is in a lot across the highway which is a benefit that is included in the daily resort fee.  The fee covers the parking and the breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay!  We love gaining new loyal guests through our exclusive Travelzoo offers we are able to extend during our off peak time of year.  We are so glad to hear that it was an overall good trip, thank you again for giving us a chance.

Summary: You know those people who ask to move 3 times and aren't happy with their room? Yep, that me. Largely because of an incorrect description on a third party website rather than the hotel's fault but despite this, they were so accomodating and kind. And even though I was difficult, the hotel also went out of their way to make our anniversary really special. Matthew on the front desk was the star of the show but actually everyone was super helpful.
Manager Response: We sincerely appreciate the fabulous feedback about Matt and the staff as well as sharing your arrival experience.  Thank you for your patience and allowing us the opportunity to make it right so you could enjoy your anniversary.  We are also grateful for the 5 stars.  Come back and visit us soon.

Summary: I can't remember our room number but we were on the a level that had an exterior exit right next to our room door and windows that faced the side street. We loved the access to the outside and beach. It was next to the sidewalk that was a 3 min walk to the stairs that take you down to the beach. The rooms were boutique styled and I loved it! Also, the roof top cafe gets packed quick as it's an excellent place to watch the sunset so get there early. Breakfast was good and lots of fresh fruit was offered.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. Our location is ideal for a quick stop at the beach to enjoy the view or spend the day.  We are so happy that it was a great stay and we're looking forward to another!

Summary: A charming old style California inn with nice ocean view. Maybe seek breakfast elsewhere! Rooms are comfortable with surfer motif though a slog to get to. Situated out of the centre of town but nevertheless surrounded by fine shops, bars and restaurants. Great staff.
Manager Response: NickT008, thank you for your review!  I'm sorry to hear you weren't a fan of our breakfast, most guests are a fan of the variety and quality for the price point.  We also really appreciate you recognizing our staff!  Happy travels!

Summary Heading: Great character, great service, great location, and great rooftop
Summary: I stayed at La Casa del Camino in early November for a weekend getaway to Laguna Beach. I was very pleased with this hotel. My only criticism is the rooms could use a renovation, but I anticipated this coming in. Otherwise, everything about my stay was 5 star. The hotel staff was extremely nice/helpful, especially the two staff members who worked breakfast on the weekends. The hotel was in the heart of Laguna Beach so the location could not be beat. The Rooftop Lounge is the spot. The half priced mojitos were fantastic. Overall, this was a very good stay!
Manager Response: Thank you Ben!  We are so glad you had a good stay and got to enjoy our Rooftop Happy Hour. The drinks are a great deal.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I booked this hotel last minute so there was not a ton of options. I travel to Laguna Beach about once a month with my husband. We had never booked with this hotel and thought we would give it a try. I booked a room with a queen size bed since that is all they had available. I guess I didn‚Äôt pay attention to the square footage of the room but I checked later and it was less then 200 square feet. I would not recommend staying in this room (#321) there is only about two feet from the bed to wall which is the walkway to the bathroom. It was basically a small bedroom with a bathroom attached. Not even enough room for a chair or sofa. It wouldn‚Äôt have been so bad if the bed was comfortable but that was not the case. It had to be the most uncomfortable bed I have ever slept in. I woke
Manager Response: Luv2snorkel, thank you so much for staying with us! We are so glad to hear the feedback about K'ya and the staff.  Our rooms are definitely on the small side, we do our best to ensure our descriptions let our guests know what to expect. Our King rooms and Casa Surf Rooms are a bit larger, hopefully those will be just right for your next visit.  We'd love for you to stay with us again.

Summary: Great hotel with an awesome view from its roof top bar. Rooms are poky but full of character- the one I had was quite cramped but good enough for one (although plug sockets are hard to come by). Friendly staff and decent breakfast too. Beats a chain hotel any day.
Manager Response: Thanks W!  We are definitely full of character, thanks for staying with us and hope to host you on the next Laguna getaway.

Summary Heading: Historic, Friendly, Close to Beach, Reasonably Priced
Summary: This hotel has a ton of charm - it feels a bit like walking back in time - and reminded me of places I've stayed in Europe. The staff could not have been more accommodating and friendly. From the front desk, to the rooftop bar, to the lobby restaurant, to the free breakfast - we had nothing but positive interactions.   The location could not be better - we didn't have to use our car during our stay - everything's within walking distance: the beach, shops, restaurants, yoga studios, and gyms. And, free parking's included in the "resort fee" with a lot near the hotel (across the street).   The rooftop and K'ya both had delicious food that exceeded our expectations and friendly servers. Even the free breakfast had impressive options - hot and cold items - and plenty of coffee, with
Manager Response: Katie K, we appreciate your review and feedback.  We pride ourselves on delivering an eclectic vibe in our historic building - a characteristic throughout the Laguna Community. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: We had a great stay here. Location was perfect. Enjoyed walking down to the main beach every morning stopping by the Orange Inn for the best coffee in Laguna. Took advantage of the breakfast each morning which was good. 2 types of scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage, fruit and small pastries. The hotel provided beach chairs, towels and umbrellas free of charge which was great. Some construction going on during our stay ( re-doing the carpet) started to get a little noisy first thing in the morning especially since the workers storage was in the room next to us. Walls a little thin. Best roof top patio in Laguna. Spent a couple of happy hours here, no meals serviced on the roof top (only appetizers). Restaurant down stairs looked good, did not partake. Staff was very friendly and
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay, Sean! We are so sorry about the noise during our carpet installation.  Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience at the hotel.  Next time you stay, you definitely have to dine at K'ya - the food is amazing and we have the best Happy Hour in town!

Summary Heading: IF YOU LOVE HISTORICAL INNS, LA CASA EL CAMINO IS FOR YOU...
Summary: La Casa is the very first hotel/inn ever in Laguna Beach...built in 1927,  the inn is historically famous for being THE  spot for celebrities to stay as a destination or a retreat.  If you don't much care for historical features, you might enjoy their perks:  such as free parking,  excellent free breakfast, music in the lounge in the evening,  literally several steps from hotel to beach access... gorgeous beach! incredible views... And then, there's free access to a nearby health club/gym,  two restaurants/bars onsite,   walking distance to about any kind of restaurant/cuisine you  might fancy!   Oh, and I should tell you about the amazing service and incredibly friendly staff.  They will do their best to accommodate you in any way!  They clearly love welcoming guests and caring
Manager Response: Wow!  We can not thank you enough for taking the time to share this review with the Tripadvisor Community; we really appreciate it.  We are absolutely a unique experience, filled with charm and character that is hard to sum up in photos or a quick 25 character blurb.  Thank you again, adelaidetaylor!  You rock!

Summary: Beautiful hotel in Laguna.  Nice rooftop restaurant and bar.  Our room was small, but clean and beautiful.  We had a deep bath tub and a small ocean view.  0.9mile walk to the best restaurants and bars, or about a 4 dollar ride in Uber.  About 100ft to the ocean.  Free parking 1/2 block away.  Free breakfast buffet in morning.  Very friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you so much Traveladix!!!  Thank you so much for staying with us, appreciate the sweet and simple recap of what you experienced! We think you summed it up quite beautifully.  We hope to see you again at this great location soon. - Katie

Summary Heading: Felt Like Home Away From Home
Summary: Before I get into details, please keep in mind... if you are looking to hang in the room all day or wanting to be pampered with in house spas and such, move on... So why 5 stars you ask? Because this cute boutique hotel was exactly what the doctor ordered. Friendly service from the minute I checked in to the minute I left. Located in the heart of Laguna Beach... I checked in to my awesome Quicksilver themed room, threw my bags down on the nice hard wood floor (not gross carpet) and explored the town. After exploring the town, I hung out on their AMAZING rooftop bar! Drinks and food were great... took a nap and then had dinner at the great restaurant downstairs... I highly recommend eating there! Food was delicious and the waiters and staff were on it the whole time. Oh and about
Manager Response: Thank you Dusty, we really really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience at La Casa.  You nailed it, we are ideal for those wanting to experience Laguna while enjoying great people, location and restaurants.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon too, you have 9 other Surf Rooms to give a try!

Summary: You'll have to fight to get a table, or buy one for $250, but either way it's totally worth it. Food is great, service is great, view is magnificent. Yes, there are some telegraph poles / power lines slightly disrupting part of the view, but it's a small blip in what is breathtaking. One of our favourite places, relaxed vibe, reasonable prices and you can get street parking. Highly recommend you take someone you love or your besties. P.S We love the Ahi Tuna entree, super yummy and great value at $17 a platter. Enough for two for sure.
Manager Response: Hello Tanya T - insider tip - guests of the hotel can request a reservation for no fees.  Otherwise its is $150 on the weekends and $50 during the week.  We are so happy you enjoyed your visit overall!  Thank you so much for sharing your Rooftop experience.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: After our hotel room in the Laguna Beach Inn was cancelled at extremely short notice by the inept staff, we struggled to find anywhere we could stay. We managed to get a petite room at this hotel. While it did cost more booking it, we only had 2 hours until we were due to be at a friends wedding. The staff were extremely helpful and understanding of our situation and even delivered a bottle of chilled cava to our room for our anniversary. It's an excellent hotel with a brilliant restaurant. The bacon wrapped dates are unreal!! The rooftop bar is also very good but incredibly busy.
Manager Response: Terry S, thank you so much for letting us help get your trip to Laguna turned around.  We are thrilled that our staff was able to help you get ready for the wedding and also add a "pop" of celebration in the mix.  We also agree... the bacon wrapped dates are a must have!

Summary: There are trapped pigeons under your feet (deck boards) at the Rooftop Lounge and they have nets trapping them in on the outside portions of the deck.   The waitress didnt seem to be concerned as it was the hotels (La Casa del Camino) responsibility.  There was a dead pigeon on the other side of our neighboring table. It must be typical protocol for the hotel to pick up the dead ones when there are no restaurant guests per the waitress.   The waitress also said there are openings for the pigeons to get out but I guess their are some with bird brain and unable to find their way out. It was heartbreaking to see these birds wanting to get out from the nets and seeing other pigeons feeding the ones under the net.  The ones that were trapped were crying so if you can ignore these
Manager Response: Casey R, I can certainly understand that your experience at the Rooftop Lounge was affected by the pigeons. We have a relationship with a wildlife company to remove them safely as we don't want to hurt the birds or our staff.  They unfortunately do find their way under the net which to prevent them from finding a home and removing the net welcomes even more. We are absolutely looking into finding a safe solution.

Summary: La casa del Camino is a charming hotel at first look and has the most beautiful roof top in laguna.But the rooms are very disappointing especially if yours in on the third floor it‚Äôs as if you are in a dorm. The rooms are tiny and barely fit one person. The breakfast is poor and the out doors are needs some cleaning. The private beach that is a few steps away from the hotel will make it up for you and Brighten your day.hotel will provide you with towels, beach chairs and umbrella.
Manager Response: Daniageorgeyan, thank you for staying with us and providing us with feedback.  Glad you enjoyed the Rooftop Lounge and beach amenities, Cress Beach is definitely one of Laguna's gems!

Summary: This 1920's hotel is located in the center of Laguna Beach, with an awesome rooftop bar and happy hour, ample parking and a friendly staff those kudos said now the bad. Tiny rooms, even tinier baths, paper thin walls and a view of the laundry bags from room 103 oh yeah and the window on ground floor that doesn't lock but then what do you want for $250 a night peace and quiet. Sorry our next stay will be elsewhere with a visit to the rooftop bar maybe for happy hour.
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us, we look forward to seeing you at the Rooftop!

Summary: This hotel made our trip, my husband and I loved it. The views are amazing, you are literally right on the ocean. Yes the hotel is older, but the rooms are beautiful and the customer service was awesome. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Love that we made your trip, Caitlin. Thank you so much for taking a moment to let us know about your visit.

Summary Heading: Was promised a refund we never received
Summary: The first 3 nights of our stay at La Casa del Camino were fine. It was a bit noisy and lackluster, but overall the location was great and the service was good. However, our last night was awful -- the fire alarm went off 5 times (the latest was at 10:45 pm, each time waking us up out of a dead sleep as we were trying to get an early rest before our flight the next day) and the staff did nothing to explain to the guests what was going on. Drunk guests who were overserved at the hotel bar were stumbling through the hallways and kicking our door. We contacted the manager, Mr. Guzman, and asked for a refund for that night's stay only, and he was very pleasant and agreed to refund that night's stay. That was almost a month ago, and despite repeated emails, the manager has not
Manager Response: RRMachusko, thank you for reaching out to us.  I can understand the alarm being a frustrating item, as mentioned in the correspondences via e-mail from Gonzalo - this was due to a chair in the restaurant that got placed against the pull station.  We absolutely stand by honoring our word to refund this night, we will be sending you an email with your folio showing the refund.

Summary: This Hotel is the bomb.  Stayed twice in the last few weeks.  We couldn‚Äôt be more pleased.  From the awesome suites to the rooftop lounge,  location and service.  Special shout out to Evan and Katherine!  Thank you all so much.
Manager Response: Thank you!  We are so thrilled that you loved our place - but we can not thank you enough for the shout out to our staff!  Let's make sure we get you reservations up top for sunset on the next round.  You're the bomb!

Summary: Superb rooftop location with views of Laguna Beach. Friendly staff. Reasonable pricing on drinks. A perfect place to just relax and enjoy the coastal vibe. Reservations can be made to ensure the best unobstructed views.
Manager Response: Thanks for staying with us, Daveandavril!  We are glad to hear you got to take advantage of the perks of staying at the hotel - reservations for the Rooftop Lounge. Thank you for letting us take care of you!

Summary: The photos were taken with a magic camera because this place is barely two star. Dirt carpeting and guest rooms as dark as a dungeon. This place has zero personality. It‚Äôs like they know they have a good location and stopped there. This stay will make me second guess hotel photos going forward. The reviewer who said this hotel is not for the high quality vacationer is 100% correct. Good news is you won‚Äôt want to stay a second extra in your room, so you‚Äôll be sure to get out and see beautiful Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear that your experience we disappointing, we do our best to accurately describe and feature the rooms so that our guests know to expect and old world feel.  We do appreciate your feedback and glad that you were able to explore the area during your visit.

Summary: Stayed here overnight with my mom while visiting Laguna from L.A.  This hotel is not fancy, but if you would rather go to beach and explore town than sit by the pool- you will love it.  They have a nice rooftop bar frequented by hip crowd.  Also, stairs to the beach right behind the hotel.  Breakfast was included and served in cute little courtyard.  Cute lobby with fireplace and live entertainment on weekends.  Room was clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Glad you and mom had a great getaway!  We appreciate you taking the time to share about your stay with us.  We hope to host your next Laguna visit.

Summary: If you are looking for a quiet, sterile environment with a room containing the 23 items a focus-group determined to be required in a hotel room - go stay at a chain hotel.  If you want amazingly friendly service, unique rooms, delicious breakfast (included) and a stunning location steps from a beautiful beach in the heart of Laguna - you will love La Casa del Camino.  I stayed in a Casa Surf room with gorgeous ocean views.  Each room is unique (see their website) and mine had a skateboarding theme (see pics).  I arrived two hours before check in time and the super helpful guy at the front desk told me ‚ÄúI can give you a good room now or a GREAT room if you don‚Äôt mind waiting an hour to check in‚Äù.  I waited and was not disappointed.  Yes, the building is older, the hall carpeting
Manager Response: Pat S!  We loved reading this review, you perfectly explained what to expect.  Thank you so much for taking a moment to share, we truly appreciate it.

Summary: This was a bit of a mixed bag for us. We tacked on 3 days in Laguna to the end of a business trip.  Had we booked the hotel as a special couples getaway rather than a nice place to stay while visiting friends & family in CA, this review would not be as good. Husband hated the room (small, stuffy, no storage,, open closet), never could get internet to work on his laptop (worked on his phone) and had a horrendous parking experience the first night. I didn't mind the room and found it to be lovely. The walls are very thin though and I was awakened the first night by some drunk folks getting into their room.  Saw another woman complaining extensively about this same thing the next morning at the front desk.  Also overheard part of a complaining phone call upon check out. We both
Manager Response: Hello Renae, thank you for staying with us on your recent business trip.  Glad you loved the location and breakfast.  I'm sorry to hear about the internet and parking issues. We appreciate your feedback!

Summary: Elizabeth at the front desk was a doll. She went above and beyond to ensure our stay was a 5 star experience. Customer service was consistently amazing from all personnel. The complimentary breakfast was the best I'd ever had. The ahi poke bowl at the Rooftop was superb. And the hotel was super pet friendly. What a great place. Parking was a little cramped, but so is everywhere else in Laguna. Definitely looking forward to returning!
Manager Response: Hoangk00, we sincerely appreciate you taking a moment to share about your time with us and especially recognize Elizabeth.  We are so happy you and your fur baby was able to enjoy your stay!  Please come back soon.

Summary: Had a wonderful stay at LaCasa del Camino celebrating our 7year anniversary.   Pros: Ocean View, steps from the beach, great complimentary breakfast, lovely style, fast WiFi, black out curtains, we got a little anniversary gift, staff helped me print some forms that I needed, will be back (just as we have been last 4 years.
Manager Response: We are so thankful for choosing us to share this 7 year celebration with you. We also appreciate your wondeful review!.Looking forward to many more years with you and yours.

Summary: Amazing staff, every single person that worked there was extremely friendly and helpful. Rooms are small but man they have some awesome character. Perfect location and amazing restaurant and rooftop bar! 10/10 would recommend
Manager Response: Awesome review, thank you jfvail!  Glad we met your expectations and look forward to your next stay.

Summary: Service was exceptional and the young man at the front desk exceeded expectations. The whole staff was very friendly and accommodating. We were there one night for our wedding and will definitely be back for a few weekend stays.
Manager Response: Congratulations, Tjmurp! Thank your for celebrating you wedding with us, glad all went well and we will see you soon for another getaway.

Summary: I loved this little hotel.  The staff were lovely and the location was perfect for the beautiful beach, restaurants and shops.  The  room and the hotel were unique, a little quirky but comfortable and pretty.  I didn't get a chance to go up onto the rooftop bar (short stay) but it looked beautiful.  I would absolutely stay here again.  We brought our dog along and they were quite welcoming of her and gave us a room with easy access to the outdoors.
Manager Response: Jill154985, so thrilled you enjoyed your short trip.  Next time let us know so we can get you reservations up top, you can also bring your dog there as well.  Laguna is a very dog friendly community and we love to welcome each one at the desk with a treat, it's a requirement!

Summary: This Hotel was AWESOME! Our first couple of nights were at a hotel down the street, and pretty much everything was not at all as described online. We were extremely disappointed, so we called just about every other hotel in Laguna trying to get a better place to stay. We decided on La Casa Del Camino and are SO happy we did. Huge shout out to Lliam and Matthew at the front for helping us out and making everything so easy and wonderful! The room was awesome, staff was awesome, location was great, everything was fantastic!
Manager Response: You're also awesome Jared G!  Thank you so much for letting us come to your rescue.  We especially love that you recognized Liam and Matt for their amazing service, it makes us all so proud. Please come back and visit us soon.

Summary: My girlfriend and I were celebrating our one year anniversary and our lodging for the night fell through.  We were lucky enough to find a place to stay at La Casa del Camino.  The look and feel of the hotel was as if we were in a completely different place and time.  The room was comfortable and cozy.  We were able to have a lovely stay at La Casa del Camino.
Manager Response: Glad everything worked out with us and you were able to enjoy your anniversary in old European style! Comfy and cozy is our specialty.  We appreciate your lovely review as well.

Summary: Lovely accommodations in a great location.  Beautiful views and spectacular guest service.  The rooftop lounge is a must.  Matthew from the Front Desk was always friendly and helpful.  Thank you for the great weekend!
Manager Response: Much appreciated Norman828!  You are very very welcome!

Summary: Thank you to the amazing staff at Casa Del Camino. I just had to put my dog down and they sent up champagne and a personal note... such an sweet touch! The location is perfect, the rooftop bar is the best and just across the street is Mozambique‚Äôs which I highly recommend for Sunday Reggae!
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear about your dog, we are all animal lovers here and am glad we got the chance to lift your spirits in a tough time.  Thank you for the kind words and fun tip!

Summary: My wife and I stayed for our anniversary weekend. The price was right and staff is excellent. Hotel is old but has a charm. Rooms are clean. Rooftop bar is awesome and you cant go wrong with the brunch. Only minor issue we had was that the shower and sink drains were slow which created a little puddle when showering. They immediately offered to fix it, however we did not want to be inconvenience as we were in our room. Had it not been for this, our review would of been 5 stars. Great boutique hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you erniet922, thank you!  We are sorry to hear about the drain but look forward to earning five stars on your next visit. Thanks again for all the accolades!

Summary: When I opened the door to room 316 with a ‚Äúpartial ocean view‚Äù, I felt my heart sink. Since our trip to Amsterdam a few years back, we have never experienced a hotel room so small and cramped. This ‚ÄúSpanish style‚Äù room basically consists of a queen size bed, a sink in the room, a chair, tall skinny chest, small desk, and damaged carpet.  If you stand by the side window, you can see the ocean over the rooftops. With the windows open the sound of Pacific Coast Highway and the noise of the street revelers below is deafening. With the windows closed, it's stuffy and hot. We couldn‚Äôt hear the waves. Yet I give La Casa del Camino four stars for one reason: MATTHEW, front desk person extraordinaire! In my travels throughout the world I haven‚Äôt met a person so passionate about his
Manager Response: StarLady99, I was absolutely thrilled to read this and see what a wonderful compliment you paid to Matthew and our other staff members that you mentioned!  We surely have an allstar team. We also sincerely appreciate you letting us know about our description of 316, we made sure to update that.  We hope you'll return and we can get you into a room with a better view!

Summary: This was my favorite hotel stay in years! The building is gorgeous inside and out. My room was comfy, classy, clean, and had amazing view. I felt like I was home and not in a hotel. Both restaurants have amazing food and drinks. The staff is top notch and friendly to all. They can cater to the very affluent to casual. It is really less than a block to the stairs to the beach. They even had a chair and towel for me to borrow. The only tip I have is to make reservations for the rooftop bar a few days in advance. It is a local favorite. Once you're up there you'll never want to leave! I've paid five times as much for much less class and service at other hotels. I cannot recommend enough and will never stay anywhere else again. Thank you!
Manager Response: Dana W... wow!  Thank you!  We are beyond excited to know we made your list of favorites, that is so very special. We can't wait to share our gem with you again.

Summary: We absolutely loved the Casita, it was perfect for our family. It was clean and spacious and the location was fantastic. We have 4 kids and it was great for them, loved the rooftop bar. Check in was easy and welcoming. It was an amazing experience all around. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review and recommendation! Our Casita is perfect for families since you have most of the conveniences of home with a hotel staff to assist

Summary: My husband and I have just walked out of the ground floor bar in this hotel after being ignored by all 4 of the male staff behind the bar! They did not even acknowledge us when we sat at the bar despite there only being 4 other customers sitting at the bar.  We sat for 10 minutes and no one even looked at us, never mind offering us a drink.  They were the rudest bar staff I have ever encountered. Avoid this place if you want a drink in Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: Fio24, we are very sorry about your recent experience at K'ya Bistro's bar. We are proud of our reputation to give excellent service and are saddened that we fell short. I appreciate you letting us know so we can share with the team. I hope you'll return in the future and give us an opportunity to make it right.

Summary: My husband and I recently stayed at this hotel for 2 nights as part of a short trip to the area.  The location is walkable to area shops, galleries, restaurants and the beach. The staff was very accommodating, both at the front desk and the restaurants.  The breakfast buffet was better than at most hotels.  We loved our dining experiences at the Kya Bistro:  amazing food and service!  The rooftop bar can not be beat - the views are spectacular.   While the hotel isn't new and shiny it has character and feels a bit European. One suggestion to hotel staff:  there was a complete absence of storage in the bathroom.  A shelving unit or wall shelves to place toiletries on would be very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying and dining with us!  We love that you got the opportunity to try each dining concept and explore the area.  Thanks for the suggestion as well!

Summary: We were treated very well by the front desk staff in particular - Liam and Matthew.  We mentioned it was our anniversary when we checked in and a bottle of champagne was brought to our room shortly thereafter!  The room we were in is VERY small but in spite of that it is well set up and had everything we needed.  Right now there is construction going on right behind the hotel and we were awakened by hammering just after 7 am.  Other than this (which the hotel really can't help) we had a very nice stay.
Manager Response: Thank you babyRN19, so happy you had a terrific stay!  You're right our rooms are nice and comfy but just right to enjoy for a quick trip and explore our area.  Thank you also for recognizing Liam, Matthew and the Front Desk staff.  We hope you'll come back soon (that house is almost complete).

Summary: Nice hotel with exceptional staff.  Also the restaurants at the hotel are fabulous. My wife and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Hotel is very conveniently located and has nice beach access. I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you fgprice! We really appreciate your wonderful review and recommendation.

Summary Heading: Charming Hotel with Wonderful Staff and Restuarant
Summary: I stayed here for a few nights and had a wonderful experience! La Casa Del camino has the feel of a small European hotel. The staff couldn't be more helpful; Matthew and Liam at the front desk are terrific! My room was small but sufficient, comfortable and quiet.   The hotel has a great location, with easy access to the beach, shops and restaurants. Be sure to dine at the restaurant, K'ya Bistro Bar. I dined there twice, once with a friend, and every dish was delicious. Guests also enjoy a hot breakfast, and Linda in the breakfast room couldn't be nicer! The rooftop bar offers spectacular views.  The hotel provides access to a nearby gym, the Art of Fitness. It is clean with equipment in excellent condition.   I'll stay here again and highly recommend the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much sobaytravelguy!  Linda, Liam and Matt will be thrilled that you took the time to acknowledge them in your review.  Looks like you had an opportunity to take advantage of all of our amenities too!  We really appreciate you sharing your experience, safe travels until we meet again!

Summary: Customer service is wonderful! Made my boyfriend's 50th amazing! Love the atmosphere and of course, location! Can't beat the roof top bar. The foods and drinks are great. Room was clean and comfortable! We will certainly return soon!
Manager Response: We are so happy the birthday went well, thank you for letting us celebrate with you both. We also really appreciate all the wonderful compliments on the staff, Rooftop Lounge and your room!  See you soon!

Summary: We absolutely loved our time here! The staff was one of the best we have ever experienced, very joyful and excited, and helpful in every way, Elizabeth at the front desk was especially helpful and accommodating to us on our Anniversary. The hotel itself is so charming and really adds to the time in Laguna. Beach is a very short walk, and is a beautiful private cove, towels, chairs and bottles of water were provided. The rooftop lounge is great and the restaurant KyA was amazing! So yea, we were overjoyed with our time and will absolutely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review and acknowledging Elizabeth, we are so happy to share this with her and the team.  We hope to see you before the next Anniversary!

Summary: Absolutely loved my stay here! Location is perfect for those who are looking for a relaxing and fun time. Lots of good shopping and eats near by! And having the beach as your backyard for your stay is the best part. Service forgot to restock certain items at times but the front desk staff are very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: erikanatalieg, we are thrilled you loved your stay and we really appreciate you letting us know where we can improve.  Thank you again and we look forward to hosting another fun and relazing time!

Summary: What a great experience! The best location in laguna. Clean rooms with a great staff. Restaurant downstairs is great and the rooftop can't be beat. Awesome breakfast don't stay anywhere else!! The Spanish style makes you feel far away!! Oh and amazing parking too.
Manager Response: We enjoyed reading your review, Aly M!  We agree that we have the best bar, especially with the amazing sunset and view.  Thank you again for sharing!

Summary: This place is exactly as advertised! Beautiful views, excellent rooms, incredible service & I've never had better free breakfast!! La Casa Del Camino is the perfect romantic get-away! The hotel staff is there to help & offers great suggestions of what to do & see. The rooftop bar is the perfect place to see the sun set over the Pacific and because of that, it's always packed. Make sure to reserve a table up there. Also make sure too have a meal downstairs in K'ya bistro. Reservations also required at least a day in advance. Awesome experience, I hope they never change!
Manager Response: Ekorshus, we appreciate the wonderful review of your stay and especially the great tips for future travelers!  THANK YOU! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: My second time staying here. Friday night in Laguna, last minute decision, trouble finding a hotel with justifiable pricing, and La Casa Del Camino does it again. Easy booking, friendly staff, and clean room. Slightly noisey around 9 am but I think it‚Äôs because they got the rooftop lounge/restaurant in the same building. Overall it was a great experience and as mentioned, my second stay here. Best pricing/quality in Laguna. Only complaint is.... I wish the rooftop opened at 10am instead of 11:30. Multiple friends/locals agree. We just want our mimosas earlier!!:)
Manager Response: Microsoft Jacob, thank you for giving us another opportunity to enjoy Laguna and La Casa.  Although the Rooftop doesn't open until 11:30, you can always purchase mimosas at Breakfast for $10 and take them up to the Rooftop to enjoy until we open!  Now you have an inside tip for your next visit!

Summary: We arrived the first night at 2:00 am with our two year old child (5:00 am home time). We were shown a room where the bed was literally 3 feet short....yes, 3 feet short!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! and there was no room to swing a cat. We then moved to another room that had a bigger bed but barely fit our suitcases (it's now 2:30 am). The next day we chatted to a wonderful front desk worker who essentially kept us from checking out. He moved us to another room and the room was acceptable. The hotel had a fantastic breakfast and offered  beach towels, sun umbrella and lawn chairs for free. These were huge pluses. The hotel also had a great restaurant and an amazing patio bar ‚Äì which you could also visit even if you‚Äôre not staying at the hotel. The hotel was very close to the beach, also a
Manager Response: Thank you for the compliments about our staff and amenities, sarah j.  It sounds like you may have booked one of our Spanish Petite rooms, that are on recommended for solo travelers because they are quite small and comfy.  We sincerely apologize about the noise, we would have been happy to speak with anyone that was being noisy and not in compliance with our noise policy, we can understand how frustrating that can be.  We appreciate you letting us know about our opportunities and successes.

Summary: From the minute We arrived We loved it.....from the super Friendly Employees in front....to the amazing views and mojitos on the rooftop. Secluded beach spot was Amazing. Will definitely be staying there again in the near future.
Manager Response: Kingkoopa2018, appreciate that you think we are AMAZING - we think you are too!  Looking forward to your next stay...

Summary: Not for RItz Carlton/Hyatt types, but if you love historical places with personality and ambiance, this is for you.  The best staff, from housekeeping and the breakfast host to the front desk, awesome perks, a rooftop bar, your own little beach cove (they supply the chairs, towels and umbrellas!!) includes parking, wifi and breakfast and dining credits.  There are some updated surfer motif rooms, but mostly updated and cozy Spanish-themed rooms with windows that crank open to catch the ocean breeze.
Manager Response: none

Summary: convenient PCH location with roof top view of Laguna coast and Catalina.  highlight was a whale sighting whilst strolling on the beach  cons: parking limited and (like all So Cal beach properties) always a neighbor under construction with all day noise
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location. Friendly staff. Happy happy hourüç∑some of the rooms are too small,so inquire about that. Not fancy, old style Spanish . The rooftop lounge is stunning although the Friday night we were there it was crowded with locals, no seats, no service. The bar downstairs was accommodating though and welcomed our well behaved four legged friends. Excellent happy hour specials. Complimentary breakfast in the morning is amazing! What more can I say?
Manager Response: We love everything that you did say about your visit with us! Next time you visit, please let us know ahead of time so that we can secure you a Rooftop table, we are able to add this perk for our hotel guests when it is available.  Thank you also for letting your fur baby enjoy the visit as well!

Summary Heading: A Jewel of a Hotel on PCH
Summary: My wife and I didn't know when I made the reservation that the La Casa del Camino is the oldest hotel in Laguna. We really enjoy staying in places that have a history, and this hotel has got lots of it!
