Each room has its own cool unique theme, and some also include beautiful ocean views.  The rooftop deck restaurant & bar is a hip gathering place with the locals due to its spectacular views of the sunsets over Catalina Island.  Listening to live music by the fire in the downstairs lounge is an excellent to start or finish an evening.  Looking forward to my next visit!
Manager Response: What a wonderful compliment and recap of your time with us Durango_Steve69!  We are so thrilled to be a part of your next visit back to Laguna Beach.  Music in the lobby is Thursday through Sunday and don't forget to request a reservation at the Rooftop so you can enjoy another sunset, we love having this as a perk for our guests.  Looking forward to it!

Summary: I don't really understand surfing but our room was furnished in an old surfer style with authentic details and collateral that explained everything, so it was really fun. Our room was huge, with a small fridge, plenty of furniture, and a big bathroom (walk-in shower). The beach is SO close, and the front desk gives you backpack-chairs and towels. Breakfast was nice, especially if weather allowed you to eat outside in the little gated courtyard. The hotel itself had an odd layout but was inviting, and decorated with antiques. However, it really needed to be shut down, cleaned from ceilings to floors, and updated a little where there was damage, such as the bathroom floor in the room. That said, the public restrooms were pretty darned nice. Food? Wow. The Rooftop bar had great
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your time with us Joni K from the room and restaurants to the beach and area.  We hope to turn you into a beach person on your next stay!  We appreciate the great feedback.

Summary: Thank you Bethany for making our last minute getaway experience nothing short of surreal. We enjoyed everything about La Casa del Camino & loved the surf room! Your added gesture to us truly warmed our hearts. We came to the conclusion that La Casa del Camino will from here on be one of "our places." :)  Warm regards,  Alek & Polina
Manager Response: Thank you Alek and Polina, we are so excited to become a part of your memories and future plans, we are so appreciative that we were able to make your experience with us a memorable one.  I can't wait to share this with the team and Bethany!  We'll see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great old building but a bit tired...
Summary: I love vintage Spanish style architecture, and Casa del Camino does have that, at least on the exterior. Inside there's not a great deal of effort made to capitalize on that flavor, however. In general, the facilities could use a good scrub and updating, although I wouldn't say it was dirty....just not as well kept as It could be. The free breakfast offerings were good, beyond a bare bones "Continental"  breakfast, but the little outdoor eating patio was just tired, no effort made to make it a special place, when it could be. The room (King) was a good comfortable size and pleasantly furnished in a "Spanish" motif (points for that). Our room had a peek-a boo ocean view from small old windows that were not designed to take advantage of the ocean view (upgrade?), but the ocean
Manager Response: Meg G, thank you for staying with us on your trip to Laguna.  We hope to welcome you back again during your next visit, please don't hesitate to ask the Front Desk for reservations to either restaurant. Although the Rootop Lounge is first come, first serve basis, we do make reservations for guests upon request.  Thank you again!

Summary: Great time very close to all the places you are looking to see.  We look forward in doing this again.  We love the location. It was a nice idea for a short getaway for us. We will recommend this to everyone we know.
Manager Response: Bennieb1, it is always the biggest compliment to know that our guests would recommend us to their friends, family and the Trip Advisor Community.  Thank you for letting us know that we got it right and you loved staying with us!

Summary: Awesome location, food, and comfort! The front desk staff- Bethany makes you feel welcome and is so informative. Breakfast hostess is in that same category- Ilena (sp?) treats you like family. Although the weather was a little overcast, the ocean and beach remains peaceful/tranquil. A great place to renew one's energy and spirit.
Manager Response: Thank you so much Gayles46 for making us a part of your weekend getaway.  We can not wait to show the team your wonderful review, especially Alina and Bethany!  I'm sure that you will return to us soon so we can share better weather to renew both your spirit and ours as well.

Summary: I hate to say ugly things but this hotel is NOTHING like it seems from the photos. We had booked most of the hotel for a wedding,to include the lobby and rooftop and a huge block of rooms. We were there during some rare horrible weather. The staff was less than helpful, the lobby/ hotel smells bad and the rooms were tiny, dark and unventilated. Terrible place to try and get ready for a wedding. The elevator was out of service most of the weekend and again the staff was less than energetic or helpful. I ends up leaving and moving down the street to Pacific Edge hotel. MUCH better!
Manager Response: GenaBilbo, thank you for sharing your experience. We appreciate your feedback and are very sorry that we did not meet your expectations.

Summary Heading: A Little Friendly Gem on the Pacific Coast Highway
Summary: Spent many a trip at this location. Rooms are comfortable with a pleasant boutique feel. I really prefer this to the normal sanitized big brands, due to the congenial atmosphere, I always get a bite to eat at the bar with the varied menu, small snacks to big plates and food is good. Often on long haul you just need that little tasty snack to keep you going. Always good company at the bar.
Manager Response: Stuart, thank you so much for continuing to choose La Casa del Camino as your home away from home in Laguna!  We appreciate your loyalty to us and the K'ya Lounge.  Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Reserved what they call a spanish queen room (the King rooms were sold out).  Parking and wifi were included.  First the parking is one block away up a slight incline and you have to bring your luggage by foot and across the street to get to the hotel.  The hotel is an very old building and has a bar and a restaurant on the main floor.  The hotel is on a hill so several levels but there is a small elevator.  When we arrived the 2 lady clerks were not very welcoming and when we walked away to our room we heard one say "its going to be one of those days"  We were shocked to find the room really small and dark and right on the street next to an exit door that was wide open.  They offered another but it was even smaller.  They did not look like the picture we saw.  Their king room
Manager Response: Amos803, we are so sorry to hear about your recent experience with us.  While our parking is across the street, we encourage our guests to use the loading zones to make it a bit easier- I'm so sorry we hadn't shared this with you prior.  We try to ensure that our room descriptions are listed with square footage so that our guests understand that our historic hotel rooms are indeed on the small side, we encourage our guests to get out and explore or wonderful area.  I appreciate you letting us know where we can improve, I hope that you will give us another opportunity in one of our larger Spanish King or Casa Surf rooms in the future.

Summary Heading: A wonderful night at La Casa del Camino
Summary: We had a wonderful night's stay at La Casa del Camino in Laguna Beach.   First, early on in the afternoon we were due to check-in the front desk called us and asked if we wanted to be upgraded to a 3-bedroom, 2-bath bungalow with a full kitchen and its own parking spot;  then she said at "no charge" but it was our option as our original room we booked was waiting for us.   It took a New York minute to say YES!   We checked in and she walked us to our bungalow - fantastic!   All the staff was very friendly and pleasant - thank you for a GREAT stay.
Manager Response: We are ecstatic that you loved the La Casita and it worked out well for both of us!  Thank you again for the compliments of the hotel and staff and taking the time to leave us a review.

Summary Heading: Quaint little hotel on the water
Summary: Cute little hotel...stayed here during a work trip and enjoyed wine on the beautiful rooftop both nights of my stay. Rooms were well appointed with everything you need, very friendly and responsive staff, and location that can't be beat! Definitely would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you carolineogh, we are so happy you enjoyed your trip with us. It is always great to share with the team that we were able to exceed our guests' expectations.  We can not wait to welcome you back!

Summary: I stayed here on business and was very impressed.  The staff is extremely helpful and nice.  The rooms are small but well laid out with everything I needed.   And the rooftop bar - to die for! There is a great restaurant down the road - the Deck which I also recommend.  Just a short walk. Free parking was a nice touch too!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful 5 star review, we love sharing the compliments with the team.  The Rooftop is a special spot that we are lucky to call ours and there are certainly other great restaurants in walking distance.  Thanks again!

Summary: Funky old place on the main drag in beautiful Laguna Beach.   When we checked in there was a mixup with our reservation so they upgraded us to a suite at no charge.  It's a nice space, with an ocean view even though the hotel isn't ocean front.  We would have booked this suite from the start but the website pics made it look dark with no windows - it's bright and sunny. Don't look too closely at the stained and worn carpet and furniture. The bed is comfy and immaculate, though only a queen. The rooftop bar has great views.  The buffet breakfast is tasty.  The restaurant downstairs is fantastic, we ate there 3 out of 4 nights.   Best thing is the proximity to the beach without paying beachfront prices.  There's a public staircase just a few metres down the street, giving access
Manager Response: EBandGJ, thank you for the review and giving us the opportunity to make it right with you at check in.  Glad you got a great night sleep, some beach time and to take in the view in at The Rooftop.  We appreciate you taking the time to share this with us, cheers!

Summary Heading: A total treat - would definitely stay again!
Summary: I had business in Irvine and then a few days later in San Diego so rather than fly back to Seattle in between, my husband joined me and we looked for somewhere to stay for the in between days. Luckily we found La Casa del Camino, a total delight. The room was great (sound of ocean all night), comfy bed, nice bathroom and then the 2 on-site restaurants which both have creative/interesting menus. Service was fantastic and the food delicious. Then the complete surprise, the included breakfast. Better than some we've paid $30+ for and Elena, the host, just delightful. If you are in the area don't stay anywhere else. Just note they will give you a complimentary appetizer in The Rooftop Lounge or a small plate at K'ya Bistro Bar for checking in on Facebook/Instagram with a photo; wde
Manager Response: RosalynA, we loved reading your review.  We sincerely appreciate you sharing your experience with your fellow Tripadvisor readers so they know what to expect when staying with us.  Thank you for letting us host your stay during your visit to California, happy travels!

Summary: We have friends that live in the area.  He frequents the Roof Top Restaurant and took us there for lunch.  We are from Canada - and immediately fell in love with the warmth of your hotel.  Thank you for a wonderful experience and we cannot wait to come again!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for making us your Laguna getaway, Beverlyjw65!  We look forward to your next visit, let us know about your next visit!  We would love to help you get a Rooftop reservation so you can enjoy with your local friends.

Summary: We have stayed at other hotels in Laguna over the years, all were fine. This hotel is different. It shares the charm of a 1927 hotel with cozy rooms and a Laguna vibe. The small rooms are fine for the time that you are there and not outside enjoying the city or the water. The main dining room serves some of the best food in the area and the rooftop has wonderful lunch/appetizers/drinks. A full breakfast is included in price. This great package is affordable, which is not common in Laguna. The people who work there are top notch, efficient, friendly and accommodating. We were checked in and out by Bethany, but everyone was the best!
Manager Response: What a delight to read about your stay, clsm929!  Your recap was a wonderful explanation of what future guests would expect with us.  I especially look forward to sharing with Bethany and the rest of the outstanding staff.  Thank you, thank you, thank you!

Summary Heading: Cool little place and I loved the architecture!
Summary: Overall, we really enjoyed our stay and their breakfast was very good.  We'll be back! Also, they have Happy Hour on the roof top which was beautiful...but chilly.  Bring a jacket:)  We had dinner in their downstairs restaurant and it was terrific.  Lots of different small plates that we shared.  You've got to try the tomato bisque...SO GOOD!
Manager Response: Tgray1044, it is always the biggest compliment to know that our guests will return and have taken the time to share about their experience.  Great weather has headed our way, but being by the beach, a jacket is always a great tip!  K'ya is definitely one of our treasures, glad you got to enjoy it during your stay.  Take care!

Summary: Beautiful location, wonderful and friendly staff. Would definitely stay here again:) We love Laguna Beach and this is a great location. The restaurant on top of the hotel overlooking the ocean is beautiful as well.
Manager Response: Wow! We are so thrilled to be a part of your adventure and even more happy to know that our awesome staff, location and amazing view hit all the right marks.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Staff was very nice! The beach is right outside the hotel & more private than the main beach. Room was cozy and air conditioning worked perfectly, we had a really enjoyable stay. Only about a 15 minute walk to Broadway st/lots of dining & things to do
Manager Response: Thank you laughinglia!  Glad you had a great time with us, enjoyed your room and got to explore Laguna.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Nice place and it has a beautiful view. Different room styles and my mom and I spent 2 nights in one room and our last night in a different room. The staff were very nice and we loved Sam who helped us out very much when we first arrived and helped us get a new room when available. She was great. The only thing that really bugged me is that we were never told that there would be a wedding going on that Saturday night we were there until two days before arriving and at first the rooftop bar was going to be closed but the wedding got moved downstairs in the lobby so that was closed. Both the lobby and rooftop was closed and we were on the same floor as the wedding guests so it was a bit loud around 11pm and we felt like we had to stay out of the hotel the whole night. We believe
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback Nina M, we will make sure we better communicate to our guests when we have events that may close areas of the hotel.  I'm excited to share your kind words with Sam and the team!

Summary: Really enjoyed staying here for a quick getaway. Beautiful location, lovely view from rooftop for drinks and appetizers, and staff very friendly. Hotel is a bit older, room we had was on the small size, and can be a bit loud with music playing or hall noice, but by late evening it quieted down. We really enjoyed our stay and look forward to coming back!
Manager Response: Kimniemi, love that you enjoyed your getaway and overall experience with us.  Thank you for your review and we look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Great for a romantic getaway with your significant other. Beach is right in your backyard. Rooms were clean. Major attractions are walking distance if you want to get a little exercise. The K'ya restaurant has great food too. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to take care of you for your recent getaway!  The biggest compliment is knowing that you would stay with us again, we appreciate your review.

Summary: My husband and I stayed there for 2 weeks and was a great vacation . The hotel have a great view to the laguna beach . Amazing breakfast and breathtaking view but the rooms are very small and noise as well . The staffs are extremely helpful . At the beach are chairs and umbrella from the hotel without any extra charges also towels.
Manager Response: Garciapatty2008, thank you for staying with us and sharing your feedback! Our little historic building may not be the largest, but we do have a great team and amenities to help our guests enjoy their stay.   Happy travels!

Summary: Really loved the rooftop bar in this boutique hotel . I had the blackened ahi and portabello sandwich which was one of the best things I've ever eaten. The cocktails were gorgeous and service friendly and attentive. The atmosphere here is California at its best and great value.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review, janemmw, and I will make sure to pay compliments to the Chef and kitchen team.  We are so happy your over all experience was 5 Star!  Thank you again!!!

Summary: We made a very last minute res so our room was very cozy. Breakfast on the sunny rooftop w fresh juices, good food and beautiful view. We cancelled maestros dinner rezzies  bc we fell in love w the acoustic guitar and apps in the lobby.  Warm, laid back atmosphere, good drinks, nice staff. Easy access to quiet beach. Easy parking. We will return.
Manager Response: We are so happy that your last minute trip was a success, Stacypm! Thank you for sharing your experience with us and I can't wait to share with the team.  We have live music Thursday through Sunday for your next visit as well, we look forward to turning that 4 into a 5!

Summary Heading: Depends on what you're looking for in a place to stay....
Summary: Things they got right: Convenient location, friendly and attentive staff, small but fun rooftop drinks and dining, quality breakfast, cozy lounge in lobby, good bed and bathroom. Very good value.  Things they can't help: its an old building. That means: parking a half block away, navigating with a wheelchair is tricky, the structure/rooms might be charming, quirky, cramped or dated depending on your taste, not much insulation between rooms, had an hour long hassle getting connected to wifi.  Overall: I think they have an eye for quality and have made the most of what they have.  I'm not fond of old stuff, so it wasn't really my style, but I can imagine that others would absolutely love it.
Manager Response: Kathleen O, thank you for taking a moment to share your recent experience at our hotel.  Although we may not be the best match stylistically, I am so happy to know that there were several items that you enjoyed.  If you prefer updated, modern rooms - you will have to come back and giver our Casa Surf Rooms a try!  Thank you again.

Summary: Very nice place to stay, the roof top lounge has an awesome view of the ocean. The staff are extremely polite. The breakfast was absolutely wonderful. The only thing that didn't quite make 5 stars was the steak. We will definitely return.
Manager Response: Travisf907, thank you so much for staying with us and your wonderful review.  We love knowing that you enjoyed our atmosphere, staff, breakfast and the great view at the roof!  You'll have to come back so we can get you a 5 star dining experience as well.  Thanks!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at La Casa Camino.  The staff was really accommodating and the location is great. You need to remember that this is a historic building that has been renovated, but along with it comes the charm of such architecture.  Thanks, to the staff for making it a nice getaway.
Manager Response: HYRichardson, thank you so much for staying with us for your recent getaway and taking a moment to share your experience.  I am excited to share this 5 star review and compliments with the team, hope to see you soon!

Summary: My fianc√© brought me here for a weekend stay-cation for my birthday and everything was wonderful despite the stormy weather. Every employee we met was exceptionally warm and accommodating. We enjoyed every minute of our stay and can't wait to get back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words about the team!  We love being a part of your celebration and are so happy we could make it a good trip, despite the weather working against us.  We will send lots of positive thoughts for sunny skies and warm ocean breezes on your return kimid122!

Summary: My boyfriend and I booked this hotel from a TravelZoo deal for a romantic little getaway, we were so excited. Upon arriving, I immediately loved the location, steps away from the beach and very cute and quaint. We ran into an issue, we had reserved a King size room and were given a Queen, when walking into the room, I realized right away there was something wrong. My boyfriend is a big guy and its quite uncomfortable to fit into a Queen bed together, plus the room was TINY, the window didn't close properly, the air fan wasn't plugged in, the carpet looked dirty, and they had the smallest bathroom I have ever seen, we knew this was not the room we booked. When I came to the front desk, the employee told me they had sold out of King bed rooms and had only Queens, that would have
Manager Response: Anna T, thank you for your review of your recent stay with us.  We are so sorry about the confusion with your reservation and check in but so happy to know you enjoyed the rest of your stay and dining. We hope you return again and we have an opportunity to get it right from the start.

Summary: Thank you to your hostess Bethany for making our stay so pleasant and wonderful! What a charming young woman, working at such a warm and inviting hotel. I love the character and location of La Casa del Camino, prefered over the prestige and limelight of larger resorts to the north and south. This hotel accommodates my needs perfectly. I grew up in Orange County, so I appreciate the local-first charm of this area on the coast. Now that I live out of state, I love staying at La Casa del Camino when I come home to visit family. The beds are cozy, the two restaurants are wonderful, and the shops up and down PCH are lovely, local-first and fun! The rooms are tiny, but I don't mind. Everything else makes up for it.  I was bummed, however, we didn't get our apple cider toast in-room as
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review, support and loyalty.  We can not wait to share this with the team, especially Bethany.  We sincerely appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with other travelers in the Tripadvisor community!

Summary: I had a lovely stay for one night at La Casa just recently. I compliment the front desk team on being very friendly and extremely helpful to me. The greeting was five star and better and sincerely appreciated. I will definitely stay there again and again.!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much Mary D. I look forward to sharing your compliments with my team as well as your return!

Summary: La Casa is a great value for it's location and amenities.  While the rooms are small - the location, breakfast, amazing rooftop deck and quality service make it a perfect get-away.  Please be certain to spend time on the roof  - the Ahi Poke was terrific.  The breakfast on the first floor was very good!
Manager Response: TravelerKRL, thank you so much for letting La Casa del Camino be apart of your Laguna getaway.  So happy to know you enjoyed our location, breakfast and especially The Rooftop Lounge and our staff!  Come back and visit us soon!

Summary: This property was great for our family.  kids are 4-7.  its private and located in a great part of laguna.  staff friendly and you really get your privacy.   the only draw back is that the area leading up to the property is a little messy and dirty but other then that the inside is amazing.
Manager Response: So happy we could be your recent find to enjoy with your family.  I'm sorry the first impression was messy and appreciate you sharing this with us.  Thank you for your review and we hope you will return to visit us again.

Summary: This is our tenth year traveling here to stay for our anniversary. We love everything from the cozy room to the spectacular rooftop sunset views!  Best happy hour deals too! ‚ù§Ô∏èFrom the minute we arrive to the moment we leave to we are always treated like special guests.  We look forward to our annual stay all year long.
Manager Response: Pylee65, Thank you so much for your loyalty over the last 10 years.  We love our guests and are so happy to know that you continue to let us celebrate with you in the hotel and at the Rooftop Lounge.  We look forward to the eleventh year as well!!!  All the best.

Summary: The setting and food really set this place apart.  it's older so rooms not as big but the bed was very comfortable. We really enjoyed the food and ambiance! Really nice breakfast buffet too! Roof top bar was great for ocean watching and relaxing if you can get a table!
Manager Response: 585ritas2016, thank you so much for your review.  Glad to know you were able to enjoy the food, locate and a good night's sleep.  Let us know the next time you plan to return, we would love to reserve a table for you on the Rooftop.  Thank you!

Summary: They went out of their way to accommodate my family and me. I was sick they sent me tea for free and a card.  Our bed was too small so they upgraded us for free with an ocean view. It is walking distance to everything. Be prepared to send because of the art district  enjoy.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us take care of you and your family, we love being able to make our guests visit a more memorable one.  We hope you are feeling better and appreciate you choosing La Casa del Camino!

Summary: La Casita was a perfect place for our corporate group to stay so we could all be together but still each get our own room. We loved it! The property was great and the staff was friendly and accommodating!
Manager Response: Thank you so much Emily N.  Our La Casita's floor plan does make it nice for groups or family that are travelling together, but still would like personal space.  We hope you keep us in mind for your next visit to Laguna Beach!

Summary Heading: Great Location and nice Happy Hour
Summary: A special thanks to Brittany at the front desk for taking GOOD CARE of us.  We appreciated everything she did for us celebrating our 47 wedding anniversary!!  La Casa has a great location and it's nice that they include free parking.  the breakfast is also outstanding and we enjoyed being close to everything.
Manager Response: Garyvchatsworth, thank you so much for letting us celebrate your Anniversary during your stay.  Our staff loves to help make the experience here a memory that will bring them back or share with friends!  I look forward to sharing your review with our team, but most importantly, we look forward to your return to Laguna!

Summary: Everything was excellent. The only negative is that they have live entertainment on the weekend that can go past 10 PM and if you have a room near the lobby. you will hear it. The food at the restuarant is very good and a great value for the price in the area since Laguna Beach is a resort town.
Manager Response: Peter T, thank you so much for the 5 star review.  We will keep the live music in mind when we are checking in guests and telling them about our hotel.  Glad you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: We had a wonderful stay in the Casita associated with the hotel during our Thanksgiving Holiday.  The accommodations were wonderful.  Clean and well organized.  The kitchen accommodations were a bit lite on things like mixing bowls and tools.  One of the beds was lumpy and not very comfortable.  Regardless, all things considered the facility was clean, very well located and the staff were fantastic!  We will definitely do it again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us for Thanksgiving, we truly enjoyed taking care of you and your family.  We also love your suggestions and feedback!  We hope to continue to be a part of your return visits to Laguna Beach!

Summary: Photos aren't accurate on line. Lobby, hallways an stairs need renovation. Area where breakfast is served should be swept clean - daily! looked a mess both days there. After we checked in, we were given a note at our door stating there would be loud noise and water repairs next day - this info was shared after we checked in to avoid us checking in somewhere else.
Manager Response: TravaGoddess, thank you for sharing your experience with us and I have also made sure to share this with the staff.  We are so sorry about informing you about the repair upon your check-in, we had not known that this was going to be necessary but tried to schedule it close to check out.  Luckily, we were able to delay this with an alternative option so that it wasn't noisy. We hope to host you again during another visit to Laguna.

Summary: The hotel has wonderful old bones, but the remodels over the years have resulted in a miss match of the over all esthetic of this original historic structure. Which is unfortunate, because this is a shinning example of old California coastal architecture. Something that just can't be replicated.  The complementary breakfast was a pleasant surprise. It was much more than what I was expecting. It was delicious. A variety of hot egg and breakfast meat dishes were being offered along with fresh fruit, cereal and danish. We ate at both of the on-site restaurants. We took advantage of the Happy Hour specials at both locations. The food and service at both were very good. The view from the roof top bar was spectacular! One of the best ocean views in Laguna Beach. Lucky for us it was
Manager Response: Cthymrtn, we enjoyed reading your review of our hotel.  We certainly have developed character over the years.  So happy you enjoyed K'ya and The Rooftop while you were visiting, I agree the food is delicious and we have a popular Happy Hour with our great deals.  Thank you again for staying and sharing your experience with us.

Summary: We returned to La Casa del Camino, after our first stay in November 2014, to celebrate my husband's birthday again and had a really wonderful time.  All of the staff were super friendly and made our stay and special occasion so enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for returning to and letting us celebrate with you, AndiA1218.  We also love knowing that we were able to help make your husband feel special, that is one of the joys of hospitality!  We'll keep the champagne cold for the next celebration!

Summary: had been by this property a couple times but never inside and decided to stay this time.  Such wonderful charm.  Staff was incredible from check in to bar crew!!  Was my birthday and they even brought a bottle of champagne to the room for us.   Order the Cucumber Martini at the lobby bar.  Greatness.  Dinner at the lobby bar was delicious and such a value.  Very talented young lady played guitar in the lobby.    Wonderful experience.   Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Camelmania2, thank you so much for spending your birthday with us!  Thank you choosing to celebrate with us.   You were listening to Lauren Black when dining at K'ya on Sunday.  We really appreciate you giving us such a high recommendation!

Summary: we had such a lovely experience at your hotel..the rooms were perfect for the theme of the hotel  the rooftop bar is amazing , and the courtyard where breakfast is served was lovely also.. and it was a great value. will definitely be back in the future
Manager Response: Ldyg, we are ecstatic to know we were able to to help you have a wonderful getaway with your friends!  I look forward to sharing this with my restaurant and hotel team.  Happy Travels, we'll see you again soon.

Summary: WE stayed at la Casa del Camino over the weekend in the Casita and it's been heaven!! Loved the Casita, loved the staff and the location is so great!!  Everybody there was very nice and accommodating... you can totally tell they want you to enjoy your stay... Also the rooftop has the most spectacular views of beautiful Laguna Beach, so you can bask in the sunset while you sip on your favorite drink...
Manager Response: You Rock, Alexlpn1!  Thank you for your review and staying with us in the Casita this past weekend.  So happy to know how much you enjoyed the hotel and Rooftop Lounge.  We look forward to sharing another sunset and sip in the near future.

Summary: Love the vibe of the place-great food in restaurant but we upgraded to an Ocean view room and got to look out at it thru filthy windows! Great roof top bar-unique restaurant-nice staff-funky decor in room. Had we seen what the Ocean view room was like we probably would not have upgraded.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, jsellers5.  I am so sorry to hear about your windows in your room and have a project to replace all of our windows in the near future.  Glad you enjoyed the Rooftop, K'ya and our staff.

Summary: This is a great place in a great location at the south end of Laguna Beach. They've decorated the rooms by theme (ours was surfing) which is fun and different. The rooms are large with a sitting area, desk and chair, mini fridge and microwave. The bathroom has a walk in shower and toilet separate from the sink and mirror area. Our room had peekaboo views of the ocean. Because of the age of the hotel, the walls are a bit thin so you do hear hall noise. The breakfast is better than the usual free included breakfast as there are hot dishes available on top of the usual fruit and bread items. The beach access is half a block away with stairs taking you down onto the sand. There's a bar and restaurant on the main floor, but there are also many restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: Hnewheels, we enjoyed reading your review of our hotel and stay in one of our Casa Surf Rooms.  Thank you for sharing your experience with us and fellow travelers, our hotel, and location was well very explained.  Come back when you are ready for a little more fun!

Summary Heading: Finally gave this place a try
Summary: We have always wanted to stay here and finally gave it a try.  The rooms are smaller than we had expected (especially the bathroom) but they are nicely decorated.  We love the rooftop bar!  That was the main reason my husband wanted to stay here.  The beach is very close which was wonderful!  There are also restaurants within walking distance.  We plan to stay here again!
Manager Response: Nikki, thank you so much for "giving us a try!"  While our rooms are on the smaller side, I am so glad you loved the decor and our Rooftop Lounge.  You will also have to give K'ya a try as well.  We are excited about your return, thank you again for the review.

Summary Heading: old world charm close to the beach
Summary: Stayed here one night while on a business trip.  Room and bed was comfortable.  Fantastic location half block and walk down 30 steps to laguna beach.  The take a long walk.  Especially great near sunset.  Roof top bar has spectacular views.  The front desk staff and wait staff were awesome.  My breakfast was included (eggs, bacon cereals toast coffee tea juice) and was great as was the staff that worked it.  I will be back!  The only negative I can think of is the carpet could use a refresh
Manager Response: DMG33, thank you so much for taking a moment to share your experience with fellow travelers and us!  We are so happy you enjoyed your stay from the room, to the restaurants, location and service.  We appreciate all of your feedback.  Come visit again soon!

Summary: Our daughter and son in law booked a one night stay for us as a overnight getaway and thank you for babysitting Thor 20 month old do ten days... What a fabulous hotel! Very charming and eclectic, I could just imagine the characters of people who must have stayed here over the past 80 years! The roof top deck has a commanding view of the pacific, so relaxing to view while sipping a refreshing mojito! All the staff were great! We would highly recommend for a casual getaway!
Manager Response: We are so happy we were able to help you enjoy your getaway!  It is always an honor to get a recommendation from our guests, thank you so much.  We hope to be a part of a future visit with Thor or even another casual night away.

Summary: Staff at front desk, restaurant and breakfast all excelled at customer service. The location is surrounded by shops and eating. The room I was in was small dark and worn but clean. Loved the tile and lighting in the small bath. The hotel carpeting was fraying in areas. Buffet at breakfast seemed fresh and plenty of choice. Parking off site a bit of a pain but it's a busy area. Bring earplugs if you need quiet.
Manager Response: qotwfu, thank for your great review of our hotel.  We are also glad to know we were able to win you over with our staff, service and location.  You're right, we  certainly are a lively hotel until the night time, I'm sure our future travelers will appreciate your tip.  Thanks!

Summary: great location...wonderful restaurant, bar & rooftop deck  the breakfast room is small but the woman who waits on you is lovely and so warm and welcoming.  the rooms are tiny...but you aren't there to stay in the room.  but the bath tub is deep and the bath products are very nice.  i would definitely go back
Manager Response: Thank you so much, Allnyc.  I will share your kind words about Alina with her!  Your review summed up our hotel quite nicely and look forward to our next opportunity with you to turn that 4 into a 5!

Summary: We chose this hotel for location, roof top view, and charm. It did not disappoint. The weather did not cooperate so we missed out on the roof deck, but it put us in the lobby bar which was charming with a welcoming warm feel, great corner bar and inviting fireplace. The staff is all friendly and helpful. We stayed in a king room, old school charm, warm colors, comfy bed. It was raining when we awoke in the am, which made it really difficult to get up out of the soft bed with the great feather pillows. the bathroom was good size, nice hot shower. Only issue was no counter in restroom for toiletries. We have friends we like to go visit in Laguna and will definetly stay here again ! great location walkable to the sights and shops. next time we want to try the restaurant as it was
Manager Response: Melissa G, we were so excited to read your review. Thank you so much for the kind words about our staff and your stay. We look forward to your next visit so you can experience both The Rooftop Lounge and K'ya Bistro - please let us make reservations for you so there is no worries about getting a seat. Thank you again. See you on your next Laguna getaway!

Summary Heading: Great location, beautiful hotel, wonderful outdoor skyview lounge!
Summary: Just a beautiful hotel. Fantastic location literally 10 steps to Cress Beach. Convenient, close parking right across the street. Within walking distance to all the shops and restaurants along PCH. Great customer service. Beautiful rooftop bar. Gorgeous newly decorated rooms with windows that open to feel the summer breeze. Would definitely recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: What a wonderful review, Sarah C!  Thank you so much for the wonderful compliments about our staff, rooms and Rooftop Lounge.  We are so lucky to have such a great location in Laguna, it is such a great city. Thank you again for the recommendation to your friends and fellow Tripadvisor readers.

Summary: The rooms are small, but this is a great place to stay for business or pleasure. The rooftop bar was great! The location is very close to many good restaurants. Laguna Beach is a really cool town too.
Manager Response: Thanks yzbigair!  We are happy that you enjoyed your visit with us.  We look forward to future drinks with you at the Rooftop!

Summary: I have passed by your hotel for a few years and always said I would love to go stay a night are two there, it looks so cozy and beautiful... and it's right on the ocean I'm so glad I finally got a chance to visit and I wasn't even papered to stay.. just driving up the coast with my BFF from San Diego... I saw your hotel we decided to go have a cocktail are two and once we realized how amazing the roof top setting was and the food , drinks and great service it was a no brainer.... we ended up staying overnight and we enjoyed every minute of our stay!!!!! The Room omg so beautiful and comfortable bed slept like a baby!!!!! Yes I will be returning back here for a mommy getaway from it all weekend.
Manager Response: Happy 92019, thank you for letting us share your special birthday with you and be a part of your memories!  So thrilled to know that we could make your day even better.  We hope to celebrate more with you soon.  Cheers!

Summary: We stayed at La Casa Del Camino for the first time last night and we truly love it. The staff and service were amazing. The attention to detail truly impressed me. Also we were impressed with the breakfast. Our room was a little small but this did not bother us at all because it was perfectly decorated and again that attention to the smallest detail. The bathroom is gorgeous. We loved it so much we booked another one night trip next month. Luckily we live in Orange County so we can do quick one or two night getaways but if we lived further away staying for several days or a week would still leave us happy. Oh and you have to try K'ya Bristro, I have been wanting to try this restaurant for many years but just got around to trying last night for the first time, everything we had
Manager Response: Hairlycalgrd, we loved reading and sharing your review.  Love the detail about you experience and that we were able to make your stay worthy of 5 stars.  I personally love K'ya Bistro, it is not your typical restaurant... so much to try, you have to come back soon!

Summary: Second visit. Had a great time as usual. They should however have an ice machine available instead of having to order from the front desk or room service each time. Weather was perfect even for October.
Manager Response: We are so happy you loved your recent return! Since we are a historic hotel, space is limited, we don't currently have a location but will look for ways to make this easier for our guests.  See you soon!

Summary Heading: If I could give it 0 stars , I would have. Do NOT stay here.
Summary: We were recommended this hotel in Laguna for a friends wedding. Obviously he never set foot in it, or if he did he had lost his sense of smell and sight. The whole hotel is badly in need of refurbishment. The carpet is disgusting and reeks of mould. The rooms are tiny, and frankly, terrible. The shower worked so that's one thing that was okay. The staff were either very stupid or had not mastered listening yet. I asked for a restaurant recommendations and the girl said she could google something - nope I can do that myself, thanks.  Either stay here with low expectations and waste your money, or book somewhere, anywhere else.  Highlights.  1. The breakfast is garbage and the room is filthy.  2. They have an old fashioned air con machine- it is not even close to adaquate  3.
Manager Response: Thisiseleanor, we are beyond disappointed that you did not enjoy your stay at our hotel.  I will share this with our staff and ensure that those that have recently been hired or moved to the area also know about our local favorites.   Please feel free to reach out to me directly so we can discuss further and I can personally apologize on behalf of all of us.

Summary: You won't sleep, but it's got a nice roof top bar.  We were looking for a peaceful & relaxing night in Laguna Beach. We did NOT get it. The staff is great, the roof top bar is fun and the restaurant is FANTASTIC!! But do not stay here if you want to relax because you won't sleep.  Even on a WEDNESDAY night!!! But if your looking for a fun place to party, this is it!!! Can't wait to leave to get some rest somewhere else!!!
Manager Response: WW77th, We are so sorry to hear you were not able to relax during your stay.  Our Rooftop closes as 9pm and K'ya closes at 10pm, I can understand that the nose may be concerning if you were located near this are or are an early sleeper.  Thank you for your compliments to our staff and bar.  We hope you will give us another opportunity and we can place you in another area of the hotel.

Summary: I chose to stay at this hotel with knowledge of the local area. I was welcomed by Hillary and checked in efficiently late at night. The Queen Spanish room was very comfortable and nicely appointed. The full breakfast was like a home cooked meal and Alina, the host, welcomed everyone as if it were her own home.  Very quickly after arriving I found myself totally relaxed and destressed. The beach is a short walk away and soooo enjoyable to walk along. I totally recommend a stay at this homely boutique style hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you, ChikitaLyn!  We can not wait to acknowledge Hillary and Alina for helping to make your stay a 5 star experience.  All of us look forward to being a park of your next destressing trip.

Summary: This is tough because this place did have some things really going for it, primarily the staff.  They were so nice and incredibly helpful.  I would encourage the owners and/or management to stay a couple of nights in this hotel, namely room 210.  they said it was courtyard facing, well depends on your definition of a courtyard, I really just saw a wall 10 ft in front of me which made the already incredibly dark room even darker.  I've stayed in rooms that had bathrooms larger than our hotel room here.  It was small, dark and musty which made it not a place I ever wanted to come back to.  The bed and pillows were uncomfortable, there was just no nice place to be.  I would've loved to collapse out in the lobby but no, there was a big bar there taking up the majority of the space.
Manager Response: First, thank you so much for acknowledging our staff, we are glad that they were able to help you.  We appreciate your idea about having the team stay and experience our rooms, we try to do our best to explain that our rooms are small due to being built over 88 years ago.  We have several other room types that offer more space and I hope that we have the opportunity to make it up to you and get you to stay more than one night with us.

Summary: We had an amazing time at La Casa Del Camino.  Loved the location, roof top bar, bristo food and the employees.  Everybody was so nice and helpful, from reception to the lobby bar to the roof top bar.  The best sunset ever from the roof top bar.  We had the sweetest surfer girl waitress, awesome service and good drinks. Excellent buffet breakfast that you can eat in the enclosed courtyard which made me think of a spanish courtyard. The beach was steps away and shopping for miles right out your door.  The only negative I can say was the room size, but it is an old renovated la casa so that is to be expected.  The room and bath were both very clean and the shower was great.  Loved the whole experience .  We would highly recommend Las Casa Del Camino.
Manager Response: Thank you, Pam D!  We are delighted to know you would recommend us and that you loved the whole experience, that is a great compliment for all of us. We appreciate you sharing your experience with the fellow TripAdvisor travelers.  Thank you again.

Summary: Location and rooftop bar are a definite plus. Beach could not be closer and Laguna beaches are very good. Rooms are ok nothing special and a bit shabby but great for a few days. Staff in rooftop bar were brilliant but front of house a bit vague at times. Breakfasts were good. Layout of place a bit strange as lots of stairs and effectively two parallel buildings so could be confusing. Generally charming. Cleaning of rooms could be improved.
Manager Response: Larry_Jane2014, thank you for staying with us.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and I look forward to relaying any concerns to the team.  So happy you got to enjoy the Rooftop and our lovely city.

Summary: Very beautiful place but thats it. Its not worth money. We had a room in 1 floor. There was somekind working place under our window and we had To listen very loud noice. Bathroom was very nice but very small. In the morning when we were leaving i cut my leg in the class what was in the floor. It was a very small piece so cleaning was not so good there. We said that in the counter when we did chek out and the lady was just smiling. If i pay lot on money To be somewhere nice place, i dont expect To cut my leg or listen loud noice.
Manager Response: Jenny M, I am so sorry to hear about your recent stay with us and more apologetic that your concerns were not addressed.  I would love to speak with you personally about this and can understand your frustration.  I look forward to you reaching out to me.

Summary: Its an ok hotel, small old rooms but 50 yards from the steps to the beach. good restaurant and roof top lounge is fun. Small dark room, noisy a/c but pretty comfy bed and great breakfast! good deal for the price.
Manager Response: Sarah a, thank you for staying with us.  We hope that we can make your next stay a 5 star experience.  Happy travels!

Summary: We attended a wedding on Saturday, and wanted a room close to the beach, and close to the venue.  We were checked in (2 hours early!) by Brittany, who was very pleasant, and gave me a choice of rooms, as well as a rundown about the hotel.  Our complimentary champagne came an hour later, just in time to sip getting ready for our evening.  We had a blast.  The complimentary breakfast th next morning was sit down, restaurant quality!  We met friends on th rooftop lounge later that morning for a Bloody Mary, and to visit about the wedding.  Check out was seamless, and the dedicated passenger loading spaces out front made getting on the road a breeze.  Overall, I would rate LCDC a 12 out of 10!
Manager Response: Thank you GCFlower!  We loved reading your review and were so happy that we were able to make your stay a 12!  We look forward to many more great day, great stays with you.

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay and we thank the hotel for the nice gesture for my husband's bday!! The only 2 caveats were the parking, we didnt know where to park and were looking for a space after 4 hours of driving, and the insulation of the walls, but overall an amazing experience!!
Manager Response: Thank you Sharonishika.  I'm so sorry we didn't get you clear direction to our lot, as it is across the street.  All of us are so happy to know that you enjoyed your time at the La Casa del Camino, we can't wait for your return!

Summary: A great place to stay-Although I think the hotel could use a slight sprucing up, I loved it.  The hotel is relatively small which is nice- we found the staff extremely warm,  friendly and helpful. If you stay here make sure you head up to the roof top bar for a cocktail and some small plates- just make sure you go before sunset- there's no better view around. The area around the hotel is filled with gallerys and if thats not for you theres plenty of beaches to explore. Our only complaint if you can call it that is the air conditioning unit they have in the room is a portable one and tends to be loud.
Manager Response: So glad to hear you had a good experience at our hotel.  I look forward to sharing your review with the staff.  Thank you Sharon S!

Summary Heading: Perfect location, amazing bar/restaurant, average hotel.
Summary: When you first see the hotel you can see the history of it, it is really quaint and has an old worldy Spanish style. The lobby is cute with candles and a little bar it's really ambient. The hotel is right on the beach so you can literally walk onto the beach and get towels/chairs from reception.   The room (Spanish style) was really small, a really cute style but not amazingly clean and really tiny. The sink was also out of the shower/toilet room which was a bit weird and not very conventional. As soon as we opened our cases we had no floor space.   There was also spiders in my room on the ceiling, I suffer from arachnophobia so I had to move rooms, where we found another spider there (i had to get my dad to take it out) so after that i was so on edge and couldn't really relax,
Manager Response: Princessleahjade, thank you for the feedback.  We are glad to know that you enjoyed K'ya and The Rooftop Lounge, we agree the food and drink are the best in Laguna.  We look forward to your return and hope you stay with us again.

Summary: Great staff. Fabulous location. Nice hot breakfast. Beautiful beach. Free parking. Can't beat the roof deck at sunset. Rooms are small and could use a little update but that didn't interfere with our very pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Thank you Marsha G!  Happy to have been a part of your Laguna visit, we appreciate your review.

Summary: We travelled a lot with or without our kids. We wanted a little getaway for our 20th anniversary, and we got a ridiculously tiny room where we can barely sleep in it. None of the pictures on the hotel website prepared us for that. We are feeling rubbed to pay 260$ a night for that!!! Never ever again at this hotel!!!
Manager Response: Hello Annie C, I am so sorry here about your experience with us.  We do try to explain that our rooms are indeed on the small side; our hotel was built in 1929 and do not want our guests to feel deceived.  We appreciate you staying with us and your feedback.

Summary Heading: Wow, a great place to be
Summary: We only had three days to spend in Laguna Beach and I picked the hotel from a quick look at the website and its proximity to the beach. It has been an hotel since the 1920s and is best described as 'quaint'. The room was small but that was because when I booked it,it was the only one available. It was fine, the bed was comfortable and the shower superb.  The food in the restaurant downstairs was the best we ate in a month in the US. The portions were 'sensible' not buckets of lettuce but a simple salad with excellent fish and meat dishes with good wines and beers at sensible prices. This was obvious by the number of patrons each lunchtime and evening. My favourite dessert was the Banana Bread Pudding,( the guy who invented it should get a medal). There is a rooftop deck
Manager Response: We really enjoyed reading your review Longfellow1928!  Thank you for the wonderful detail about your experience and that we were able to serve your favorite meal.  I look forward to giving Chef Craig Connole that medal.  Thank you again, we will see you soon.

Summary: A few steps from the water! A hotel with character and great service! Bethany at the front desk always smiling and very helpful...along with Mambo in breakfast room...!  Bonus: the Rooftop Bar...with a priceless view. Hotel Restaurant has quality dining at affordable prices! Love the 'Art of Fitness' gym that hotel guests can use! Artists singing in the hotel lobby lounge add a nice touch...Finally hotel parking is convenient. Within walking distance to shops and other restaurants. Look forward to next trip back.
Manager Response: 1zellabella, thank you!  It sounds like you were able to take advantage of each amenity of the La Casa del Camino.  We can't wait to celebrate Bethany and Muba's excellent service with the team.  See you on your next visit to Laguna!

Summary: Cozy and relaxed. We had the Spanish themed room, it was beautiful. The drinks are strong at the Rooftop bar! Walking distance to other restaurants and bars. Free breakfast was delicious. I will recommend this place to friends.
Manager Response: NicholasMoniz, knowing that we would be recommended to your friends is the highest compliment.  We are so happy to know that we delivered a 5 Star experience!  Thank you!

Summary: Every time I drive into Laguna Beach I immediately get a feeling of excitement to see the beautiful beach, sparkling ocean water, and then walking into the lobby of this charming historic hotel.This is by far one of the best hotels I have ever stayed in. I love the decor and frequently they have a singer/guitar player in the lobby and one sees families, friends, and couples very relaxed and enjoying themselves. The Casa Surf rooms are all different and very well appointed. I tend to favor the ocean view rooms but there are a few facing the courtyard and village that are also very interesting, comfortable and private- it just depends on what you are looking for. The food is outstanding and at the end of the day, it's the dedicated staff that puts the finishing touch on ones
Manager Response: Gayles46, thank you so much for continuing to let us be a part of your visits to Laguna.  Our staff loves what they do and I am so proud to know that our guests can see that too.  We sincerely appreciate you and always look forward to your visits.

Summary: I love taking a weekend staycation in Laguna at Casa del Camino.  It's a quaint hotel, with great amenities and close to downtown Laguna.  The staff is friendly, clean rooms and great atmosphere.  Plus, the complimentary breakfast is great!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Our Stay at La Casa del Camino
Summary: My husband and I stayed for one night and enjoyed the beach proximity of the hotel and the beach gear that the hotel provides for a fee which we thought should not be there as this is part of a hotel service.  Further, the rooftop bar/restaurant is very nice, however we couldn't get a table as it was all reserved in advance.  In all the stay was nice, the front desk staff was extremely nice, especially Mohamed who was very pleasant and helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very friendly, helpful staff! Beautiful hotel, room was small but has all you need and hey, you're in Laguna....who's gonna be in the room all day anyway.  Rooftop Bar has great food and drinks. Go at happy hour when drinks are half price. The view is amazing.
Manager Response: We loved reading your review and love the compliments about our staff.  Thank you Ellen I!

Summary: What a gem. Great property with the best rooftop deck, beach, breakfast -- and so close to everything. We love our annual stay here! There is a lobby bar, plus a restaurant on the main floor, and the rooftop deck has an amazing view with lunch and happy hour. Rooms are small but comfortable and cozy in this 30s-era boutique hotel. A beautiful beach is just a few steps away. The Hotel provides beach chairs, umbrellas and towels to take down the stairs with you. They also provide parking and breakfast, covered by a small daily resort fee.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review PhinneyLakeChris!  We are thrilled to know you had another great stay with us and look forward to your next trip.

Summary: My Girlfriend and I stayed at La Casa Del Camino for two nights this week.  The food, service and and over all experience was excellent.  I especially want to acknowledge one employee in particular; Veronica Cerda.  Veronica went out of her way to move us to a new room, despite the the hotel being at capacity.  Our TV was slightly malfunction in the room we originally booked and without hesitation Veronica took care of us and the situation.  The staff at this hotel is second to none and we are already planning our next stay.
Manager Response: It was such a pleasure sharing this with Veronica and the entire team.  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to make it right with you!  We look forward to another great experience, please let us know if we can help make it extra special.

Summary: Old, dirty, rundown. Bathroom sink which was in the damn bedroom, filled up and did not drain, no soap dish (maintenance person who attempted to fix the sink but did not, told us "just to put the soap on the tile counter top" and that they didn't provide soap dishes.... Slimy/nasty), toilet was disgusting, window sill wood was rotting as was the door frame of the bathroom.  Portable a/c unit was as loud as could be and kept us up off and on all night.  Breakfast ran out both days in a row, with only one person trying to handle the four-hour shift by himself.  Ran out of food and coffee both days.  We tipped him nonetheless both days, as we did for the room service people.  $300.00/night for the rooms.  What a scam!  Booked through Hotels.com, another scam!!
Manager Response: Dbvan2016, I sincerely apologize for your experience at our hotel.  I hope that you were able to share this with the staff so that we could repair these items.  This is not how we want our guests to feel about our hotel.  Please let me know if we can make this up to you.

Summary: Best continental breakfast of any other hotel around.  Great spot.  walking distance to everywhere .  Parking is $15 per day. Beach in the back. Live music at the lobby. Free trolley for the summer Great town Mexican restaurant next to hotel!!!
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review Jorge A! Glad you had a great experience during your visit with us and exploring Laguna and decided to share with fellow travelers.  Thank you again!

Summary: I thought the room was good.  Not perfect but good for me.  The mattress was a little too soft because I like a firm mattress.  Room was clean and everything worked fine.  The staff was very friendly and helpful when I had questions!
Manager Response: Thanks, yatesharrison!  Love the feedback and kind words about our staff.  Happy travels!

Summary: Bethany at the front desk is amazing! She has a perfect disposition for welcoming guests and taking time to orient them to the Hotel and Laguna Beach. Her interest was truly genuine. The bed was comfortable and this is saying a lot because I travel with a tempurpedic mattress top and did NOT have to use it. Location was perfect, didn't move my care for two days as access to the beach and restaurants were easy walking distance.  Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Sheryl C, what a wonderful compliment for Bethany!  We can't wait to share it with her and the team.  Knowing that you enjoyed your rest and our location as well, makes us happy!  Thank you again we look forward to you next stay with your friends at the La Casa del Camino.

Summary: Stayed in this hotel for the second year in a row. Great location. Our room on the third floor was very quiet and the view was great. Our friends had a room facing the courtyard and were complaining about the noise. The service was also great except one of the girls at the front desk could be very bossy at times. The restaurant on the first level has great food. The roof lounge is great but very crowded. Good luck finding a table.
Manager Response: We are so happy to know that you had another great time with us!  On your next stay, please let us know if we can help get reservations for Rooftop Lounge and K'ya.  Thank you for the 5 star review, Saman9840.

Summary: Our room had dirty carpet, stained walls, broken glass in one window, loud air conditioning unit & the bath tub/ shower did not drain. The room had an unpleasant odor. The pipes below the sink in the bathroom were sort of covered with broken pieces of porcelain.  A bit surprised that this room was even rented much less at top rate. The good things about this property are the rooftop bar, lobby bar, and the employees.
Manager Response: We are so so sorry to hear about the experience with your room, I will be sharing this feedback with the team so that we can make sure to repair these items.  I would love to discuss this further so we can learn more about your stay and express our apologies.  Thank you for the compliments about our lounges and staff!

Summary: Stayed here with my family and rented the la casita, which is the 3 bed room 2 bath cottage located next to the hotel. It was perfect for our family and the cottage was super cute. It has all the hotel amenities and it's great to have a little kitchen to cook simple stuff. The free breakfast was really good, they have hot bacon, sausage, scrambled egg, French toast and other stuff and they all taste good. We'd definitely come back here if we stay in Laguna again, what a lovely stay!
Manager Response: Lala888, thank you so much for the 5 star review!   Our La Casita is a great little cottage and perfect for a family getaway and we love that you enjoyed it as much as we do.  Come back and visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Impressively bad front desk service and room quality
Summary: Weird dirty decor, bad customer service, unpleasant sounds and smells.  Christopher at the front desk took my phonecall and told me there were two surf rooms left one with partial ocean and one with full ocean view - I was very clear I wanted the full ocean view room and we arrived 20 minutes later. He gave us keys to a room.... when we opened the room other people were in it.  He apologized, gave us keys to another room... that had a partial ocean view. We went back and he said sorry, he had given away the room in the 20minutes between when we called and reserved and when we arrived. He knew this when we checked in but didn't admit it till we called him on it. He gave us $20 credit at the rooftop terrace (The absolute best thing about the hotel).   The beach decor concept is a
Manager Response: LoveBerries, thank you for sharing your recent experience with us.  I am so sorry to hear about the confusion when you arrived at the hotel.  I can understand it made for a poor first impression. I would love to see what further we can do to make it up to you, as we pride ourselves on service, cleanliness , as well as our fresh breakfast.  I hope that we will have another opportunity to create a better experience at the La Casa del Camino.

Summary: We escaped the heat of Palm Springs for several days on the coast. La Casa del Camino was the right choice. Dog friendly and central location to downtown Laguna Beach. Everything gets an A+, except the air conditioning unit when we arrived was not functioning on one of the hottest days at the beach. A 2nd unit was brought in and still did not function, so needless to say, our first night was not too comfortable. After the a/c issue was corrected, our stay was wonderful.
Manager Response: Robertperlman, thank you for escaping with us and bringing your furry baby.  I also appreciate you letting us know about the A/C unit, I'll be sure to get with my team and see what we can do to improve here.  We look forward to hosting your next escape from the desert.

Summary: I got a little spoiled after a recent stay at Pelican Hill Resort in nearby Newport Coast.  This is not a large full-service property.  But La Casa del Camino is in a great location with a very helpful staff.  There was a wedding at the hotel during our stay which made getting in and out a little confusing and we could not stay long at the rooftop restaurant for lunch as it was closing for the event.  They have chairs, umbrellas and towels for the beach which is down the stairway behind the hotel.  The hotel is not oceanfront --- but is ocean view behind a row of houses along the cliff.  And it does have lovely views.  The room has an A/C unit (not central air) and it was a bit noisy and seemed to make the room damp.  Parking across the street is a plus along with the morning
Manager Response: Andrea802, we are so thankful that you stayed with us and took a moment to share your experience with fellow travelers.  I'm so sorry about any confusion while we prepared for the wedding and will do a better job explaining any changes to our guests.  Thank you for the wonderful words about the hotel and most importantly, our staff.

Summary Heading: Wonderful boutique hotel.  We've stayed many times!
Summary: Charming with good service, nice breakfast, free parking, and fantastic rooftop bar views!  We love the location which is away from the noisy downtown beaten pat.  The rooms are smallish in size and comfortable. Only one queen bed per room.  This is a VERY NICE boutique hotel!!  We have consistently stayed here for years and love the place!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the amazing review!  We are excited that we have been a part of your Laguna visit and look forward to many years to come.

Summary: We had a great one night stay for our anniversary. Nice room, enjoyed the Piper Sonoma champagne, yummy breakfast, staff was courteous and the restaurant was great.  Went to the Sawdust Festival and enjoyed it very much. Very relaxing, neat art exhibits and musicians playing.
Manager Response: Happy Anniversary ketchjb, we are so appreciative to be a part of your special plans. We are super grateful for the amazing review as well, we hope to share more anniversaries with you in the future.

Summary: We were very pleased with our one-night stay at La Casa del Camino.  The decor and architecture of the hotel evokes the historic Spanish period in California.  The bathroom seemed recently remodeled and despite having a room facing the PCH, the room was quiet.  Our room was pretty small by modern standards, but was nicely designed.  The rooftop bar with ocean views was lovely and the location next to a quiet part of the beach was great. Parking was easy in a side parking lot for guests and the center of downtown Laguna was a pleasant 15-20 walk along the beach or among shops.  The included breakfast was much better than most and it was great to have free access to a nearby gym.  I utilized the beach towels from the hotel which was convenient, but a $15 resort fee is added to the
Manager Response: Laura S, thank you for taking the time to share your experience in Laguna and at our hotel.  We are so happy you enjoyed your visit and got to take in the city!  Thank you again for letting us be a part of your visit.  All the best!

Summary: Close to the beach just steps away, love the rooftop lounge. Chips and guacamole, and sangria were great along with the best view in the house.  Room was small, refrigerator wasn't cold out left overs went bad.  Have to call desk for ice, tried twice no one answered. Overall was worth the view from roof.
Manager Response: Tom t, thank you for your review.  I am so sorry to hear about the fridge and perhaps your phone.  I hope you let us know when you left us.  Come see us again, a round of Sangira is on me!

Summary: This hotel was recommended to us, granted, by people we did not know very well and we should have spent more time looking into before booking. My husband I travel all over the world and found this hotel very disappointing. While it was in a good location, and close to the shuttle to go to the Sawdust Festival, it was a hotel that was reminiscent of what you would expect in Europe. The rooms were so small that we could not open 2 suitcases at the same time! The bathroom had no counter space and the "ocean view" was over the rooftop of the houses down below on the street. We had breakfast included in the exorbitant 300.00/night room rate and could not even get the breakfast due to the fact that the breakfast room was overcrowded. You also have to park across the street in an open
Manager Response: Twohomes,  I am very sorry to hear about your experience at the hotel.  We try to explain that you can unload luggage next to hotel to make it easier for our guests and while we don't have bell staff we are all happy to help.  We did receive a survey and sent an apology along with a copy of the total receipt showing that there were no additional charges placed on your account.  Please do not hesitate to reach out to us directly, we are so sorry that your stay was not pleasant and would love to make it up to you in the future.

Summary Heading: My stay at La Casa del Camino
Summary: The information given to me when I made the reservation was not correct. I was told this hotel was beach front property. This was not beach front. The website shows the beautiful rooftop restaurant but good luck trying to get in. When I wanted to make a reservation the person at the front desk told me we had to call 24 hours in advance. Then when I asked for the following evening I was told there was a special event and it was all booked. When I went to the restaurant to ask myself I was then told there is $150 charge just to reserve a spot. They don't take reservations. I was told there were chairs, towels and bikes provided. The day I checked in there were no chairs and I was told it's first come first serve. I never saw any bikes. It just would have been nice to have gotten
Manager Response: linas114, we are so sorry we dropped the ball with you.  We are steps from the beach, and that could have been better explained.  We do take reservations, only for hotel guests, with advance notice so that we can check availability and ensure that we are not booked for events.  This is something that we do in appreciation of your stay, I will make sure that the desk does a better job at checking for events when guests are calling.  We do not have bikes at the property, but I'm so sorry to hear about the chairs.  While they are based on availability, I hope that we could have made it up to you.  We are so sorry and would love a chance to make it right with you.

Summary: This is the second year in a row that we have stayed at La Casa del Camino/La Casita. Love it! Love it! Love it! La Casita was very clean, nicely appointed, roomy, private, really gives you that "beachy" feeling. Service was very good. The only minor negative note was that they discontinued the free breakfast buffet. Last year that was the wonderful beginning of each day up on the hotel rooftop overlooking the ocean. We still enjoyed a nice lunch up there this year plus a great tapas meal in the Bistro. I plan to return next year during the Pageant season.
Manager Response: Hello Bap48,  thank you so much for returning again and staying in our La Casita.  I'm so sorry about any confusion - we continue to offer our Breakfast Buffet to our guests and is still a part of the Resort Fee. Guests are able to either enjoy the breakfast in the courtyard or can take a tray to the roof.  We look forward to your return next year and sharing breakfast with you!

Summary: Small but cozy rooms . Mattress slips down, uncomfortable and drapes white, allow light and unable to sleep all night .shower water does not drain, feels dirty as it collects in the tub.staff very helpful and friendly. Rooftop bar is amazing. Should inform guests that reservations needed as we had to wait a long time to get a table. Breakfast is good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review Doc U.  I am so sorry to hear about your room and would love to connect so we can get these items repaired.  We love that you enjoyed the Rooftop bar; please contact us 48 hours before your arrival so that we can schedule a reservation.  This is a privilege that is only extended to hotel guests with advance notice.

Summary: Friendly staff, an amazing rooftop bar and lounge with full views of the Pacific...in walking distance to all the great sites of Laguna Beach. the staff is very helpful and the morning breakfast buffet is nice treat - although you might want to walk across the street and try Sapphire for great coffee and baked goods as well.
Manager Response: Wow, jkouveras!  Thank you so much for the awesome review.  I can't wait to share this with the team!  We are very lucky to have so many great options around here that are also Laguna favorites, thanks for sharing the tip.

Summary: We stayed at La Casa after coming up to Laguna Beach to see the Pageant of the Masters.  The staff was very friendly, the hotel centrally located and the resort fee included parking and a very nice breakfast.  The room was small, think Europe, but nicely appointed.  After checking in we went up to the Rooftop Bar and had a wonderful afternoon with breath taking views.
Manager Response: William L - we appreciate the 5 stars for our service, cleanliness and location!  So glad we were your nice little find after the Pageant!  Come back and visit us again soon.

Summary: Was expecting a great time, but although the staff was very friendly, the room had a view of an alley. We tried to enjoy the rooftop bar but there was not room sit, stand or even walk.  We were asked to move by the bar staff four times while trying to order drinks.  We finally did and I have to say that it was the worst Greyhound I had ever had.  I poured it in to a planter and just had a beer.  My wife was excited to try their mojitos which were talked up on the website and was very surprised to find that it was the worst Mojito she had ever had.  The room was clean and nice, but the room as well as the bathroom was very tiny.  No issue there as we were aware of the European style rooms.
Manager Response: RCRobert, I am so sorry to hear about your experience at the Rooftop Lounge.  We hope that you will return and allow us to reserve a table for you so you can enjoy the experience, we just need a day or so notice from our hotel guests so we can do our best to accommodate this request.  Looking forward to creating new memories!

Summary: This hotel has potential. It is in a great location. It was however for the price of $400+ per night, less than what one would expect. The hallway carpets were old and very soiled, the bathroom sink had grime that collected towards the drain that was not cleaned, the room was really dark. It looks like it may have been updated recently? Overall, the hotel did not feel "fresh" or liked someone cared on a management level. The staff were helpful and friendly but the venue itself needs a serious overhaul for the use and traffic that it gets. Perhaps a cleaning service, some new type of high traffic flooring and some updating could change the feeling of this place.
Manager Response: Vee2654, we are so sorry that we fell short and missed the mark.  Our rich tones and colors often appear as dark because of the Spanish "old world" style.  We do care very much about the comfort of our guests and I look forward to sharing your ideas for any upcoming renovations.

Summary Heading: Spanish retreat with rooftop bar and beach access!
Summary: My husband and I loved our stay at La casa del Camino. We arrived early and parked in a nearby lot (included in resort fees) and were able to check in early. We enjoyed a relaxing lunch on the rooftop bar (note: it's first come first served). Rooms are small but decorated with a beautiful Spanish theme. AC unit was strong. There is a breakfast buffet that we enjoyed in the morning. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Kelly M, we are so happy to hear that you will be back!  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at the La Casa del Camino and Rooftop Lounge.  Happy travels!
