If you choose to stay at our property again on your next visit to Laguna Beach, please give the hotel a call and ask to speak to the Front Office manager so that I can assist you in making your stay extra special to make up for the small incident with your neighbors during your previous stay. I look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Small rooms, noisy, guest service problem
Summary: I stayed at La Casa del Camino in March 2015 ‚Äì it was selected by my client for me during a business trip.  I called the hotel the day before I arrived and told them how important it was that I get a quiet room to be ready for business, as I had read the reviews about the noise from the bar.  They assured me that they had assigned me to a quiet room well away from the noise.  When I arrived I the desk clerk (short guy, dark hair, slight build) gave me a room on the 3rd floor (with the bar is above).  When I said I had called ahead to arrange a quiet room, his reply was, ‚ÄúALL our rooms are quiet.‚Äù  Then, when I said I had checked out the reviews from other travelers, he said, ‚Äú Why don‚Äôt you check it out and if you‚Äôre not happy with it, we‚Äôll see what can be done.‚Äù  I got to my
Manager Response: Dear guest,   Thank you for your recent review regarding your stay at our property. I am extremely disheartened to hear that you did not quite enjoy your stay. I have spoken with the agent that you mentioned in your comment and he has assured me that he did not mean to mislead you in any way and he is sorry for any confusion or discomfort he may have caused you.   To be honest about the noise levels in our hotel, they can rise in the evenings especially on the weekends and we do try to make a point to advise our guests of this but to also assure our guests that we do have a noise free policy which takes effect at 10pm every day. We rely on our guests to let us know when they feel uncomfortable so that we may address any noise issues expeditiously.   I do hope you consider our hotel for future stays despite your experience with the noise levels. I want you to know that we take our guests concerns and comfort seriously and we strive to make every guests stay a most enjoyable one. If you would like to share any additional comments, please feel welcome to contact the hotel and speak with the Rooms Division Manager. We are happy to receive all feedback on guest stays.

Summary Heading: Close to beach with nice rooms
Summary: The La Casa is an older hotel that has been upgraded. It was nice and comfortable. I was a little disappointed that the property did not have a true "beach location" - though it was easily walkable -just there wasn't an area with lounging set up like other properties. The room we stayed in was nice and the bed was comfortable. Everything was clean. The rooftop view was great but was also very busy at lunch and dinner. The La Casa attracts non-guests to the restaurants and rooftop so depending on what feel you are going for that can be good or bad. Overall it is a nice, comfortable property.
Manager Response: Dear guest,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your recent stay at our hotel! I'm delighted that you enjoyed your stay. I would also like to thank you for taking notice of how much attention we put into making sure our hotel is clean. The rooftop and restaurant are very popular spots for the locals so it indeed does get very busy but we believe that all adds to the overall experience. We hope that you consider out hotel again for future visits to Laguna Beach. We would love to welcome you back to our Casa.

Summary Heading: Not quite the anniversary get away I was hoping for.
Summary: The Roxy Room was great. Just the right size with a beautiful tub and shower. The included breakfast was nice, especially when taken upstairs to the roof deck. Unfortunately, the roof deck gets very busy--especially on the holiday weekend. The only time we were able to enjoy the deck was one breakfast and late on a cold Sunday night.   Many reviews here mention that guests can reserve space on the deck for sunset with adequate notice. I found out the day we arrived that this policy was suspended for the weekend since it was a holiday. If you are looking for a romantic getaway on a holiday, this is probably not the place to stay.   The main floor restaurant is very nice with excellent food. And the music and bar area in the lobby is enjoyable if a bit noisy coming and going from
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your recent review. I see you enjoyed some aspects of your stay but were disappointed by others which in effect disappoints us. I hope we get a second opportunity to make a lasting positive impact on your experience at our hotel. It is true that you can request a reservation for the rooftop as a hotel guest but due to the holiday weekend, that practice was suspended and we should have notified our guests ahead of time of this change, we apologize for our misstep. If you do decide to try us again for another stay, please feel welcome to contact us directly to set up your reservation. We sincerely hope to see you again for a future stay.

Summary: My wife and I have stayed here twice and loved it both times.  It is located on the beach and close to restaurants.  The staff is wonderful.  Check-In was easy.  Our room was nice.  We enjoyed the refrigerator.  The free breakfast is even better than before and we enjoyed taking our breakfast to the rooftop to enjoy the ocean view.  We asked for an ice bucket with ice for some wine we had in the room, and the guy at the desk immediately went to the restaurant and obtained our ice each time.  Very good service!  The restaurant is good.  The bar is fun and has live music.  We had a great time.  They also provide free parking at a lot across the street.  On Valentine's Day they brought us a half bottle of prosecco and two champagne flutes.  What a nice touch!  We walked a few steps
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your recent review! We are absolutely delighted to hear that you enjoyed your second visit to our property. We hope that you continue to enjoy your visits here in Laguna Beach and at our property. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This is an older hotel with a lot of character - some of it rather "funky" as is the case with older buildings. But they have made good use of all the space & kept the character of the old building, which we appreciate. The roof top deck is awesome. The hotel is very clean, and the staff friendly & helpful. The breakfast was good, and enough can't be said for the helpfulness & friendliness of the young lady attending to the breakfast. An excellent example of genuine customer service. We had a room with a "partial ocean view", which we would recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your most recent stay! We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay and appreciated the character of our historical property. La Casa del Camino is going onto it's 86th year boasting original architecture from the day it was established. We are very fond and proud of our property which we do our best to let show through our service and upkeep of the hotel. Thank you for acknowledging our efforts and choosing to stay with us during your visit to Laguna Beach! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This place was charming. The doorman ran and got are luggage he was awesome. marylin and her husband got us in the right parking space they were great. Damien was great got us in the restaurant on Valentine day night amazing. Food good. rooftop view nice. we enjoy a nice free breakfast in morning and went up to rooftop with are coffee and look at the ocean view. are bed was very comfortable and the bathroom was huge. Walk  in bathroom. overhead shower side shower and a wade handle. Was great! They made you feel comfortable right at home. At the downstairs restaurant naltina  made us feel right at home. Though we are non-drinker she gave excellent suggestions on great non-alcohol drinks.  we wish it would of had a pool. We really had a wonderful time!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel! We are all delighted that you enjoyed your visit and the service we provided while you were here. It's so nice to see that you also remembered a lot of our staff members names because that truly shows that we made a positive impact on your stay. Please feel welcome to contact us for future reservations anytime! We hope to see you again on your next visit to Laguna Beach!

Summary: This hotel has all the charm of a vintage 1930's-1940's Hotel. And the service is fantastic. Great place to go for a weekend getaway. Everyone was really friendly and helpful especially Damien! Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel! Damian really appreciates your kind words about him especially since we noticed you created a tripadvisor account just to write this review! Again, thank you for staying with us while in Laguna Beach! We hope we see you again in the near future.

Summary: We stayed one night - Friday, Feb. 13.  "Partial ocean view queen."  Tiny room - 165 sq. feet.  Felt smaller than a small cabin on a cruise.  Service was fine.  Place seemed packed - a bar in the first floor reception area and the rooftop.  Breakfast buffet included scrambled eggs, sausage, oatmeal and over cooked bacon.  Nothing special. We'll try another hotel next time.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our property. I really do hope you reconsider staying at our hotel again when you take another trip to Laguna Beach. I understand that the size of the room may have been uncomfortable for you but we really try to focus on the overall experience of your stay through our service and I hope we get another opportunity to really impress you. In any case, we hope to see you again even if it's just to stop by and enjoy a drink at the rooftop lounge or dinner at K'ya bistro.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel right on the beach
Summary: We stayed here for a night, and it was great.  The place was clean, the service was great.  The room is a little tiny, but great otherwise.  You can walk out the door right to the beach.  The resort fee includes parking, water, and a breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your most recent stay! I'm extremely delighted that you enjoyed your stay. Tustin isn't very far away so I hope we get to see you again if it's even just for drinks at the rooftop or dinner at our K'ya Bistro! Should you decide to stay in Laguna Beach again, we hope that you choose our property for your getaway. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Fabulous staff, good location, great views
Summary: Late review but stayed October 28-30. Fabulous location on the coast highway. Direct beach access with your private small beach. Tide was high but I was still able to sit down there and Luis (I think) was great about getting a beach chair set up for me and a new towel. There are tons of places to eat near by, a corner story just a block away to buy wine or what not. Check in was a breeze and the front desk staff always very helpful. Delicious flavoured water in the lobby 24/7. I also used the Art of Fitness about 2 blocks away that is free for hotel guests. Nice little gym with friend staff. The room was cramped, but for one or two people all you need. Bed was SUPER comfortable. If you don't mind staying in old hotels and the smell of mildew, I would recommend. It's 100+ years
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your most recent stay with us in October. We appreciate your kind comments and are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your time. It seems like you definitely made the most of your stay by utilizing most of the offered amenities here such as beach service and access to the Art of Fitness gym! I'm sorry for the issues you experienced with the shower and lights in your room, however, I am glad that we were able to promptly take care of that issue for you. I'm certain that your future stays with us will only continue to get better as we are constantly working on ways to enhance our guests stay. If you have any more feedback to share, we are happy to hear them! You may contact us at the hotel at any time to discuss any questions you may have or to simply make future preparations for another stay. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Kind of on a last minute mini vacation we chose this hotel.  We frequent Laguna Beach and never noticed this hotel until now.  We loved that the rooms were super clean and the staff was helpful.  They were really nice.  Our room was next to the breakfast area and an exit to outside.  It was distracting at times.  The breakfast food woke me up, but it was a wonderful smell.  Walls are a little thin, but I know that the building has been around a long time.  Would I come back?  YES!  The beach is right there and K'Ya had great food.  Having breakfast was a treat and there was a lot to choose from.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your most recent stay with us. We appreciate your comments and are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your time. I could understand how being near an exit can be distracting so I apologize for any discomfort this may have caused you.  We are curious to know what we could have done to make your stay even better so please feel welcome to contact us at the hotel at any time with suggestions/feedback. Again, thank you for your time and for choosing the Hotel La Casa del Camino.

Summary: The location is great - on the cliff right on the shoreline facing PCH.  The room was average, but very clean.  Not a lot of frills or extras.  There was no coffee maker in the room (something we love first thing in the morning), but since the breakfast room was right next door to our room, we had easy access to quick coffee.  The breakfast buffet that is included with the room was top notch.    The highlight was the roof top bar and lounge, but since it is also open to the public, it was near impossible to find a table.  It is the perfect place to enjoy and glass of wine and watch the sunset!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your most recent stay with us. We appreciate your comments and are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your time. The rooftop lounge is one of Laguna Beach's top locations to watch the sunset so it does get filled up with people from all over to enjoy the view. Please know that for future stays as a hotel guest, you're welcome to make a request for a reservation at the rooftop lounge at no charge. All we require is at least 2 hours notice of your request for a reservation so that we may try to accommodate you. Feel welcome to contact us at any time if you have any questions, comments or would like to set up your next reservation. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great time at Casa del Camino
Summary: We just returned from spending New Years Eve at the hotel and we had a wonderful time.  The staff is so very nice and accommodating.  We had a large group and changed a few of our hotel reservations and dining reservations a couple of times, and the staff was so very nice about it, they just made the changes and rolled with it.  Thank you!!  We had a total of 5 rooms and other people that joined us for the celebrations. So, about 20 of us total.     I visited four of the rooms and they were all nice. We had a Spanish King room on the ground floor, room 107 and it was my favorite, it had wood floors instead of carpet like the ones I saw on the third floor and it also had easy access to a side door to get to the beach.  It was right across from the breakfast room but we didn't
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your most recent stay with us. We appreciate your comments and are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your time during the New Year's Eve celebration. You and your entire crew are a bunch of fun individuals that we enjoy having at our hotel every time. Please always feel welcome to contact us for your future reservations so that we may do our best to accommodate any of your requests. We look forward to your next visit! Until the next time! Cheers!

Summary: What a hotel! My wife and I celebrated New Year's Eve here.   I am from Laguna Beach. I expect to get ripped off. Not here. The service was fantastic and the food was great. On top of that, the hostess offered free appetizers as New Year's approached - with complimentary champagne...and it was great.   We will return to the Rooftop Lounge when the weather is warmer. We will also return to the restaurant. The view is fantastic. I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your most recent stay with us. We appreciate your comments and are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your time during the New Year's Eve celebration! We certainly look forward to seeing you again to enjoy our restaurants and hope that you decide to stay another night at the hotel for whatever occasion brings you our way.

Summary: Beautiful property amazing views the room was pleasant the rooftop bar happy hour mojitos amazingly good and the K bistro was awesome and the breakfast selection really good.  this place has beautiful sunset view and happy great combination. Enjoy my anniversary with my boyfriend it was nice weather great restaurants and great walks.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay! I'm delighted that you were able to enjoy the convenience of our rooftop lounge and K'ya restaurant during your anniversary getaway. I hope your special day together was filled with memories to last a lifetime! If there was anything we could have done to make your stay more enjoyable, please feel welcome to reach out to our hotel management team. We would love to hear more feedback from you about your stay!

Summary: We just had our second stay at this charming, boutique hotel. I'm sure we will stay again. Lots to commend it: helpful friendly staff who seem genuinely happy to see you, great location with stairs to the beach and easy walk to downtown, good bar and good restaurant on site and many more close by, live music at night, free breakfast, free parking, comfy bed, modern bathroom, unbelievable flourless chocolate cake.  And of course, the roof. The roof top bar is crowded at sunset because it's one of the best views in Laguna, but after the bar closes at ten, it's only available to hotel guests. So here's the tip: nothing says romance on a budget like watching the moon over the surf huddled together under a blanket sharing a bottle of wine from the liquor store next door and a bag of
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for your review on your recent stay with us! It's so wonderful to get reviews from guests who visit for their second time and enjoy themselves as much as they did on their first visit. I love your story about your romantic night on a budget at the Rooftop after it closed to the public; it's extremely heart warming. I hope you continue to enjoy your visits at our hotel! We genuinely look forward to seeing you in the near future.

Summary Heading: Two visits -- with dog -- love this place!
Summary: My friend and I love staying here -- first, it's one of the few places that take dogs, and the staff actually seems to enjoy welcoming our rescue mutt here!  We don't have that many choices of rooms because of our 4-legged roommate, but our room is clean, large and accommodating for we 3.  Although this isn't the W, we love both the rooftop restaurant and K'ya Bistro Bar -- both of which are very popular with the locals, which is saying something, as Laguna has lots to offer.  Also, beach access is great for the dog in the evenings and early morning.  Kudos to the staff for making this a great pet friendly hotel with wonderful accommodations.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are so happy to hear that you love our little casa especially because we are pet friendly. We believe that it's important to be able to share experiences with your four legged friend. It pleases us to know that your stay was enjoyable and it sounds like you found a lot of comfort through the friendliness of our staff. We absolutely appreciate you choosing to stay with us for a second time and hope that you continue to choose us for your accommodations in the future.

Summary: Wasn't too sure about this hotel initially but fell in love on day two,   Breakfast buffet is great. For me that means tons of fresh fruit and for my husband its about crisp bacon, french toast, pancakes and coffee.  There is also eggs, sausages and pastries, oatmeal bagels and muffins.   We had a "la petite" room on the first floor as we needed a pet friendly room.  Yes it was tiny but we knew that going in. Comfortable bed and staff are very friendly.  The view from the rooftop patio is amazing and it is nice to be able to have   your dog able to join you while enjoying a meal!  A small secluded beach is steos away and we spent an afternoon warching the surfers.  Hotel staff will take chairs to the beach for you.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind remarks! We are thrilled you enjoyed our buffet breakfast. I would like to also just mention that our guest are allowed to take their breakfast up to the rooftop to enjoy the views. We appreciate your approach to our petite room; it is our smallest room type but it certainly does not take away from the lovely experience of Laguna Beach as you are less then 5 minutes walk to the beach and just a couple steps away from the rooftop. We are delighted you brought your four legged friend to share such a remarkable experience. We are pleased to know our staff has left a lasting impression on you. Hope to see you in the near future

Summary Heading: Just Enough Funk to Remind you This Was Once an Artists's Colony
Summary: I was there on business, after staying on previous trips at more upscale places.  I wanted to fall in love here, and while I didn't do that, I want another date.  The staff is very friendly and warm.  The room I was was seaview, over the roofs of several small houses and I could hear the waves on the beach as I drifted off to sleep.  The beer at the rooftop bar was good, as was the sunset view.  I liked dinner in the restaurant very much.  The drawbacks?  Breakfast in the cellar cafe is annoying due to the television playing The View (I'm kidding, right?) and no where nice to sit and drink a cup of coffee away from the loud conversations of the self important early birds who torment those of us slower to welcome the day.  The carpet and decor are obviously worn, but they carry
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for writing a review about your recent stay with us! I'm glad that you found our place to be a perfect get away while on business. I'm sorry that the breakfast setting was not pleasant for you and that you weren't informed that our hotel guests are actually allowed to take their breakfast to the rooftop to enjoy a more private dining experience away from the lower level which can get a pretty heavy with traffic. It pleases us to know that your overall experience was enjoyable and that you do look forward to coming back to our little casa. We look forward to that next visit as well! Please feel welcome to contact us at the hotel when you plan your next trip so that we can help personalize your experience.

Summary: This is a great hotel for couples seeking that unique experience away from home that we all deserve from time to time. I made my reservation with Norma a few months before our stay and she was very polite and helpful and answered all my questions which really set my expectations in motion. I believe this is where many guests have issues with the La Casa Del Camino because they don't ask questions and show up expecting it to be a Ritz Carlton when that it is not. This is a truly unique property that was built at the turn of the century so some of the rooms are small. But with that being said if you a person that loves a hotel that breaks you away from the cookie cutter establishments offered in every city in the US, I believe you will fall in love with this property like I have.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about your experience at our property. I'm extremely delighted to hear that your visit here was outstanding! It's especially nice to hear that our team provided great service and exceeded your expectations. We truly appreciate all of your kind words in regards to our property.  The hotel La Casa del Camino has been an historical landmark in Laguna Beach for 85 years, attracting guests from all around the world with its beautiful Spanish style decor and stunning views of the Pacific. Our popularity reached new heights with the addition of the 10 surf themed rooms bringing a modern feel to a classic hotel.  We realize that Laguna Beach is a highly sought out location for travellers looking to get away from the usual cookie cutter properties so the uniqueness that you described about our property is very important to us and we thank you for sharing that information in your review. It's a daily goal of ours to make sure that your visit to Laguna Beach is not only a wonderful stay, but an experience to last a lifetime.  Again, thank you so much for writing your review and for choosing our hotel for your visit. We truly look forward to welcoming you back for another stay in the future.

Summary: I stayed at La Casa del Camino last week while on a business trip and I left with mixed emotions.  La Casa del Camino is an old, semi-historic hotel, very close to the beach and is right downtown in Laguna Beach, close to shopping, bars and restaurants. In fact, there are two bars in the hotel, including a roof-top bar with awesome views. I view this as the high point of the hotel(no pun intended). Seriously, if you like bars with a view, this would be one reason to stay here. At the very least you should stop in for a drink  and check out the views of the coastline. Be forewarned, the drinks here are expensive. I paid $16 for a glass of Wildhorse Pinot Noir. Ack! I believe that vino normally retails for about $8-$10 per bottle.  There's also a yummy Mediterranean restaurant in
Manager Response: Dear guest,   We truly appreciate you taking the time to write a review about your most recent stay, thank you. Our hotel is indeed an historical landmark in Laguna Beach having been established in 1929 as one of the most popular places along the coast. Today, the hotel remains one of the most popular places in Laguna Beach with the addition of the rooftop lounge being opened to the public in 2006 which as you mentioned has amazingly breathtaking views of the Pacific.  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your meals at our hotel from K‚Äôya Bistro and the breakfast buffet which comes included in the hotel room rate. K‚Äôya Bistro in fact has been rated number one by the locals. The buffet breakfast has been compared to the likes of five star resort buffet breakfasts.  We are sorry that we under delivered your expectations of a king ocean view room. We try to be competitive yet reasonable being laguna is such a unique gem. We do take our guest comments into serious consideration as we continue to improve the aesthetics of our hotel and hotel rooms.   Again thank you for choosing to stay at la casa del camino and for taking the time to write a review. We do hope you reconsider staying at our property to allow us another opportunity to impress you.

Summary: Just had a wonderful one night stay at La Casa Del Camino...  As a part time travel critic for certain publications, I have to say I personally enjoy the feel of smaller resorts, in exchange for many of the larger chains.  It was a little frustrating trying to make a reservation, as I was forced to have a leave a voice mail twice instead of getting a live person, which although I am not every traveler, if I hadn't specifically chosen to stay there I may have opted to find somewhere else that did answer if I had been in a rush.  That aside, I was finally able to book my reservation with the front desk and checked in without a hitch.  The front desk people were totally amicable as well as the overall staff.  It' gets quite busy as the rooftop terrace is the main draw-or at least
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We truly appreciate you taking the time to write such a detailed review on your experience at our hotel. We‚Äôre absolutely delighted to hear that you think of our place as ‚Äúunique, different and refreshing‚Äù because that‚Äôs the exact image we aim to create. Our idea of unique, different and refreshing doesn‚Äôt just end with the style/themes of our hotel rooms as we believe this also applies to our team of employees. Each member of our team, from the hotel to the restaurant and lounge above, share a common goal of making sure our guests are comfortable while still maintaining their unique character as an individual which we believe helps with making our guests feel relaxed as if they are at home.   We are excited that you enjoyed your room; the Billabong surf room. All of our rooms are very nice and have a unique quality to them but the Billabong room has proven to be a favorite for return visitors because of the gorgeous sweeping views of the Pacific. If you choose to stay with us again in the future, we urge you to explore our other types of rooms as we believe you would enjoy any room as equally as you enjoyed the Billabong room.   There are many perks to look forward to as a guest of the hotel including the breakfast buffet and 24 hour access to the rooftop. One perk you may not be aware of is the ability to request a reservation for the rooftop lounge given we have the availability to accommodate on the day of your request. This is extremely beneficial as we normally charge a fee for reservations at the rooftop lounge and as you know, it gets really busy due to it being such a popular hangout for its stunning views.   Again, thank you for all your kind words about our hotel. It was a pleasure to have you here and we look forward to your next visit! Please feel welcome to contact us directly when you make plans to head back to Laguna Beach.

Summary Heading: A lovely old hotel, but needs some TLC.
Summary: This is such a beautiful old hotel,  but sadly it really does need a bit of love and redecoration. We stayed in one of the cheaper rooms, but I was shocked on how small the room was - especially by U S standards and  how dowdy it was too. It needed brightening up to stop it from looking so sad. The staff were lovely there and every Friday, Saturday and Sunday they have live musicians in the bar that were fantastic. So it was nice to just sit there with a nice drink and listen to these  talented people. The hotel doesn't have a pool, but it has very easy access to a small stretch of beach, and they will carry beach chairs and umbrellas down there for you. The roof bar is a great feature, but it was so busy that we hardly ever used it. Apart from the fact that the cheaper rooms
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review on your most recent experience at our hotel. Your input and opinions are very much appreciated as we continuously look for ways to improve the aesthetics of our property. It gives us great pride to hear that our services had such a positive impact on your stay as the deciding factor on your return to our property. Please note for your future visit that our hotel guests are welcome to request a reservation for the roof top lounge given the availability; we would love for you to take advantage of this perk as a hotel guest. Again, thank you for taking the time to write this review and thank you for choosing La Casa del Camino for your stay in Laguna Beach. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Oh my. The room (Spanish Room) was so tiny we couldn't even place our luggage on the floor. The whole thing felt like we were in a church. Courtyard view was actually a view on the lobby (and visa versa). so we had to keep our blinds closed. Parking lot across the street has extremely narrow spaced. Not suited for larger cars. Perfect location for beach access. The hotel has a very nice rooftop bar with amazing sunset views.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We appreciate you taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel. It‚Äôs very important to us that our guests feel completely comfortable at our hotel so you can imagine our disappointment in hearing that your experience was less than exceptional. We are glad that you enjoyed the roof top lounge with the amazing views but our goal is for you to enjoy your entire stay from the room to the amenities offered. If you ever plan on visiting Laguna Beach again we hope that you consider us for your hotel lodging so that we may have a more positive impact on your stay.

Summary: Stayed here because we had family getting married close-by. We were a bit surprised at check-in because the lobby bar and restaurant area were so loud we could barely hear the man checking us in. Thankfully, our room was on a different floor (lower level) so we couldn't hear any of the bar noise. I have to say, the rooms must have been well insulated for noise because our friend was staying next door and said their baby was crying for hours and we didn't hear a thing.   Rooms aren't massive, but for 2 of us it was plenty of space. Bathroom was pretty small and the lighting was a little weird, but was not a big deal. Breakfast is not bad and there is a lovely woman who can help you with anything you need.   Rooftop bar is great, and as a guest, you can reserve tables. It gets
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay back in July. We‚Äôre delighted to hear that you were able to enjoy some of the amenities our hotel has to offer such as breakfast and 24 hour access to the roof top lounge for hotel guests. Your input and opinions are very much appreciated! We hope to welcome you back to enjoy a full La Casa del Camino experience.

Summary: Have stayed here numerous times in the past, inc. the surf suites. Had to recently stay elsewhere but came here to have some drinks and still a great place to catch the sunset. Hit it if you get a chance.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your recent post! It‚Äôs always a pleasure to hear that our repeat guests continue to enjoy themselves at our property. We look forward to welcoming you back to our Casa in beautiful Laguna Beach whether it‚Äôs for a night stay, dinner or drinks.

Summary: We had our small destination wedding reception on the Rooftop at La Casa del Camino and it was honestly the best time ever. We rented the South Pointe extended area to host our 20 guest, it was set up perfect for that number. The food and cocktails were excellent, as well as the amazing views, everyone raved about the tenderloin crostini.  We had the best servers ever..Thank you Donna and Rebecca for the amazing job! We felt like they friends from the start. Melissa was so helpful from day one with all the planning, and was very patient with all the back and forth questions. We would highly recommend La Casa del Camino for the perfect wedding!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post about your most recent wedding and stay at our hotel ! We are so delighted you chose the Rooftop for you big day.  Thank you for your shout-out to Donna and Rebecca - their dedication to our guest's happiness does not go unnoticed :) We hope to see you both again (possible first anniversary trip) should your travels bring you back to beautiful Laguna Beach!

Summary Heading: Boutique Hotel, Charming  Early California Style & Fun in Laguna Beach
Summary: Stayed three nights at this quaint and yet totally 'current' hotel less than a block from the beach. They will even carry beach chairs down for you upon request!  Restaurant food on a busy Saturday nite was excellent as was our waiter. The rooftop lounge is quiet on an early Sunday morning with great views of the water. Get your complimentary buffet breakfast on a tray (eggs, bacon, sausage, fruit, yogurt, muffins, coffee, tea, juices) and go up to the roof  as it will get really busy later.  Afternoons & eves the rooftop is hopping with guests and visitors of all ages enjoying the food (appetizers) and cocktails, wine & beer. It can be busy so you may have to wait a bit for a seat with the best view. But the whole place is very cool. There was a guitar player/singer on Sunday
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your most recent stay. We are so delighted that you have shared your wonderful experience and knowledge of our hotel. We appreciate your kind and helpful words! It would be an absolute pleasure to welcome you back to our Casa to enjoy a night of relaxation, dinner and/or drinks!

Summary: We were in Laguna Beach celebrating our daughter's birthday and chose this hotel because of price and proximity to the beach.  Althought the hotel is aging, it is a short walk to the beach, the rooms are quiet and well appointed.  The service was friendly and personnel, helpful.  I loved the shampoo, lotion, and bath gel.  Breakfast was good, coffee was great, and the server was warm and gracious.   Also, parking is a challenge in Laguna Beach, and this hotel arranged for free parking 1/2 block away.   I would definitely return to this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay for your daughter‚Äôs birthday. We are truly pleased that you had a great experience at our hotel from our amenities to our service. It‚Äôs great to hear that you plan to return to our property for another visit in the future! Please always feel welcome to contact us to help personalize your stay! We look forward to your next visit. ÔÅä

Summary: I read lots of good reviews of this hotel and had high expectations but I was disappointed. Service was cold and even rude. Room was dark and Tiny. Housekeeping was poor. No hairdryer, no refill of shampoo and soap. Breakfast was quite good but coffee finished every morning and it took way too long to brew more! Only good thing was complimentary beach umbrellas and chairs and nice location.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your recent post regarding your stay at our Casa del Camino. It‚Äôs a great disappointment for us to hear that your experience was not what you expected and quite frankly, it‚Äôs not what we expect our guests to experience either. Although there were some aspects of your stay that you found pleasant, we are always determined to provide a fully satisfying stay from the moment you arrive to the day you check out. Please feel welcome to reach out to our hotel management team to discuss your stay in more detail. We hope you give us another opportunity to EXCEED your expectations.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Property that can fit all needs!
Summary: La Casa del Camino was one of many stops I made during a recent 2 week vacation of Souther CA. The hotel has a charming, boutique feel and was a perfect choice for us. We were traveling as a couple and booked into a Spanish Petite. The room was small...I mean really small. I had an idea prior to arriving that the room would be small but it was even smaller than that. If you're looking for space,I'd recommend booking at least a Queen Room. The price couldn't be beat though. Daily breakfast was included and the service was top notch.   We ate at the Rooftop Patio and found the prices of beverages a bit expensive but the pour was definitely on the generous side. One glass of Sangri and I was already feeling it. Unfortunately the patio gets extremely busy and it seemed like people
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your kind and generous words regarding your recent stay. We‚Äôre glad you found our hotel to be the perfect spot for your stay as a couple. The Spanish Petite rooms are ideal for couples looking for an intimate get away. We are sorry that you were not able to enjoy an optimal view on the roof top though but please note for future stays that as a hotel guest you have the ability to book a reservation as long as we are given at least a few hours‚Äô notice based on availability. Please be sure to visit us again on your next trip to beautiful Laguna Beach!

Summary: I stayed here on business recently. It's not your typical business hotel but I was at a local conference. I had one of the surf suites, it was excellent. The room was really fun, very cool and different and I am so glad I was there. If you get the chance I recommend you stay in a suite. Parking is tough for this hotel, it's the one downside. I arrived late at night and could not find the lot. It is across the street, which is inconvenient when you are lugging bags and cases.it is also small! I have a small car, I dread to think how parking would be in a 4x4. The hotel is well situation, the beach is literally steps away. During the day there are towel rentals from the front desk and beach chairs and umbrellas set up on the beach. I found this out by accident, the hotel could do
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at our hotel. We‚Äôre glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us during your time in town for work. Providing a fun yet relaxing environment is definitely what we aim to offer our guests! Your concern about the efficiency of check in has been noted and we are addressing our check in process to include more information about the amenities we offer. Please feel welcome to contact us on your next planned visit to Laguna Beach! We would be delighted to welcome you back for another stay at La Casa del Camino!

Summary Heading: Fantastic boutique hotel with great customer service
Summary: My mom and I stayed in a partial view Spanish Queen bed room. The room is a bit small, but the partial view made it worth it.  It's in a great part of town, but we loved the Rooftop bar. It has the best view in Laguna Beach. We came everyday to the Rooftop for Happy hour. The ginger mojito and champagne mojito is a must!  The hotel's customer service was super friendly and accommodating. You can also take advantage of their complimentary umbrella and chairs for a day at the beach.  The hotel offers complimentary breakfast and parking (which is included in the daily resort fee $14).  I will definitely be coming back here!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at our hotel and restaurant outlets, Sherry. Our guest service team remembers you and your mom and enjoyed having you here as much as you enjoyed being here. If recollection serves us right, you had to stay somewhere else for the last night of your stay in Laguna Beach right? We hope the next time you come to visit Laguna Beach that you are able to stay with us for your entire visit. Please reach out to us next time your plans bring you out our way, we would love to welcome you back to our Casa!

Summary: I was expecting a lot after reading the reviews, but I have to say it was a an average stay at an expensive price. The room was tiny, really hot with a portable air con unit. The carpet was damp, I think they must have shampooed it before we arrived and the bathroom the smallest I have ever seen. The Service was okay but overall nothing was exceptional. Would I stay again, probably not.   I don't get very much time off, so what I do get is precious and I like to stay in nice places. They don't have to be 5 star resorts but somewhere that makes you feel special and that they want you to come again. Casa Laguna doesn't do this.We asked the front desk for directions to a popular restaurant the 18 year old working didn't know where it was. He looked it up on the computer, then gave
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your review on your experience with our hotel. We‚Äôre sorry to hear that the value of your stay did not go beyond your expectations. Our lack of service in your case is very disappointing for us as we do genuinely strive to provide quality guest service. We continually train and equip our team members with knowledge of the local area so that we can better inform our guests of the perfect places to visit based on their tastes. Please feel welcome to contact our hotel management team to discuss your stay in more detail. We would love for you to stay with us again and allow us a chance to exceed your expectations.

Summary: Great hotel, great amenities esp the beach things, (chairs, umbrella and towels) the roof top is nice but I recommend you reserve if you plan on getting a table there. The staff is very friendly and helpful, i had a flat tire in my rental car and they helped me a lot in changing that tire, they provided towels and water even after we check out. Great place to be and I surely recommend it to friends going to laguna beach.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at our hotel. We are absolutely delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay! We pride ourselves on our service so it brings us joy to know that our staff was helpful in assisting you with your flat tire issue. Please note for future reservations that for hotel guests, we do take requests for reservations on the roof top and we do our best to accommodate those requests if there‚Äôs availability. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: First the room was small, but we asked to upgrade and we were able to. Great suite! Great service! Only thing I wasn't happy about was every time we'd go up to the restaurant upstairs it was full! Didn't realize till the last night that we could have reserved a table. We know that for next time . Great location! Great place. Will go back.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your recent post regarding your stay at our hotel. We are pleased that you enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to your next visit to Laguna Beach! Don‚Äôt forget to take advantage of the perk for requesting a table on the roof top!

Summary Heading: Very dog friendly older hotel with gorgeous roof deck
Summary: We got married at La Casa del Camino 15 years ago and came back for our anniversary this year.  We brought our dog, so we had to have a first floor room which unfortunately has no view and was VERY NOISY due to an in room air conditioner.  The hotel knew it was our anniversary and gave us a bottle of wine upon check-in.....  very nice indeed.  Despite this, we love the hotel for it's gorgeous roof top deck and the delicious breakfast.  The people were very friendly and they provide chairs and an umbrella for the beach.  The hotel is pricey for the small room, but everything in Laguna Beach is.  All in all, we love this hotel and would come back.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   First of all, congratulations on your 15 year anniversary again! It‚Äôs always a great pleasure to see guests who return to our hotel for their special day! We appreciate your feedback on the A/C unit and have since then resolved the issue with the noise. Thank you for celebrating your special day with us! We look forward to your next visit to La Casa del Camino

Summary: My husband and I love this hotel! It's dog friendly and so cute and clean! It's old, but clean and so cute! The restaurant is amazing so delish! We already have our next reservation scheduled!  They have access to a gym down the street free parking and they will bring a lounge chair down to the beach for you!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your most recent stay! We‚Äôre extremely delighted that you enjoyed your visit. We look forward to seeing you and your dog again!

Summary: Positive: they gave us a bottle of Chilean wine to celebrate our anniversary.  Negative, smallest room ever, and i have travelled all over the world.  Four stories down stairs to the beach.  No wifi. Posting from my phone.  Cannot work.  Must leave. Sucks.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay. It‚Äôs disappointing that you were unable to fully enjoy your stay due to the size of the room and the issues you had with the wireless internet. We have looked into our wireless network since your stay and have enhanced the connectivity. We really hope that you choose to stay with us again on a future visit to Laguna Beach. We would love to have a second opportunity to impress you.

Summary Heading: Love this place.  I stay here a lot.
Summary: I've stayed here many times in the hotel and in the "Casita" which is the free standing house.  The staff is super friendly.    I do only stay in the off season because it is very pricy in the summer.  The rooms are cool though they are starting to show some signs of age.  The beds are comfy the linens could be better.   The restaurant "Kai" is delicious and has a great happy hour.  It's walking distance to everything AND right at the beach.    The lobby is very dark and cozy with a huge fireplace which is extra cool at Christmas.    Our family stayed several years in a row at Christmas, in the Casita which was super fun.  It's big, has a full kitchen, two beds and baths.  But the prices have gone up so we opted for another location this year.    All in all, it's perfect for a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review, it is always a pleasure to hear that our repeat guest enjoyed their time with us. I am sorry to hear that you are unable to stay with us in La Casita again for the holidays, we did recently completed a total remodel of the entire house and added a third bedroom. Next time you are in town please contact us so that you may stop in a see it, I think you will be pleasantly surprised!  Again thank you for your input we hope to see you again for the holidays this year.

Summary: Stayed a couple weeks ago, and although the room was small, we weren't in it long enough to matter.  I just wish the lighting in it was better, it was too dim.    A tasty breakfast in included.  The beach is right there, and they provide towels, chairs and an umbrella.  Perfect place to relax, not overcrowded.  We'd stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us back in August. We are so delighted to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and you were able to enjoy some of our amenities such our wonderful breakfast. We look forward and appreciate all our guest feedback, so thank you for your input regarding the lighting.  It is great to hear that you plan on returning to our property for another visit in the future! Please do not hesitate to contact us directly so that we may help to personalize your stay.

Summary: Stayed here for a friend's wedding and the rooms were small but the location and service were great.  Rooftop bar is really nice and you can actually go up there and hang out after they have closed it down.  If you want to go to the beach just tell the front desk and they will setup chairs and umbrellas.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your most recent stay for your friends wedding. We are truly pleased to hear that you had a great experience at our hotel and were able to enjoy some of our great amenities such as our Rooftop Lounge. We appreciate your kind words, and we hope to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary: We go here every year.  The rooms are small but the accommodations are nice.  Your stay includes breakfast which is nice, eggs, meat, fruit, bread items, juice   The beach is close and the hotel has a service that gives you chairs, towels and an umbrella.  The free trolley stops across the street and it takes you all the way to the festival.  It is a nice walk too.  The resturant on the roof has a great view and the food is good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your most recent post! Its' always a pleasure to hear that our repeat guest continue to enjoy all the amenities of our hotel and Laguna. We look forward to welcoming you back to our Casa in beautiful Laguna Beach.

Summary: It's an older, but well maintained hotel with nice furnishings. Granted, the rooms are a little small by modern standards. Customer service was superb in that they anticipated our needs -- extra towels, extra pillows, extra blanket were already in the room. We told the front desk staff we were headed to the beach and they gave us nice beach towels and brought down chairs and an umbrella for us. The rooftop deck has an amazing view; it's one of  the best in Laguna Beach. Reasonably-priced drinks and appetizers, combined with good service, make this a must-do on any Laguna trip.  Hotel guests can reserve a roof-top table, which is nice because the was busy at sunset. Only issue was the garbage truck that picked up trash at 7:45 am on a Tuesday right below our ocean-view window. It
Manager Response: Thank you for your taking the time to write a review about your stay, we are thrilled to hear that  you were able to enjoy all the great amenities of the hotel, in addition to exploring "downtown" Laguna Beach. My sincere apologies regarding the trash truck noise, we understand how important sleeping-in maybe to our guest, so we have ensured a much later pick up schedule. We greatly value your input and opinions, so thank you again.  We hope to welcome you back to enjoy a full La Casa del Camino experience very soon.

Summary: This hotel has a global feel that made me feel like I was not only in beautiful Laguna Beach, a mere walk down steps to the Pacific, but the Mediterranean architecture gave my senses a European experience, and the delightful breakfast in the morning room was a total mental transport to New Orleans. Noise? I didn't notice any noise. You're at one of the world's most stunning beaches on America's famed Pacific Coast Hwy.  Expect signs and sounds of life! This hotel is life at the beach with small but perfect rooms, (you can book larger rooms), the most personal and genuine service from all personnel, the K'ya Bistro is a must, and spectacular Roof Top view of the Pacific is amazing...the reason you came in the first place. Enjoy this boutique hotel and life in Laguna.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay back in July. We are delighted to hear that you were able to enjoy some of our amenities our hotel has to offer such as, our wonderful breakfast served out in or romantic courtyard and our 24 hour access to the Rooftop Lounge. Your input and opinions are very much appreciated! We hope to welcome you back to the enjoy a full La Casa del Camino experience again.

Summary: I created a tripadvisor profile just so I could post about this hotel. It is the perfect location, has the perfect rooftop bar, they will lend you a beach chair and towel, and although the rooms are super tiny, they are beautiful. I will be back. And I cant wait.
Manager Response: Thank you so much on your recent posting, we are so delighted to hear your stay with us was so memorable it prompted you to write about it!! We here at La Casa del Camino strive to create memorable experiences for all our guest, so I am thrilled you were able to enjoy some of our  amenities such as beach service and the breathtaking views at the Rooftop Bar.  Again thank you, we looking forward to welcoming you back to Hotel La Casa del Camino very soon.

Summary: We stayed in this fabulous town, and chose La Casa after friends checked it out for us. The Bistro is fantastic and the roof bar a real 'must see'. We did note some negatives when checking reviews, and it is true the hotel can be noisy at times and the room we had, a Queen partial view, was small. We are Europeans and used to this but if you want plenty of room check out other rooms. Staff were friendly and helpful and we enjoyed our stay. Short 10 minute walk to the centre and a quiet beach nearby. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Hotel La Casa del Camino... We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay!   Thank you for checking out our delicious K'ya Bistro, and our wonderful Rooftop Lounge - They are the pride of our hotel!  Your review is very much appreciated. We look forward to seeing you both again, when your travels bring you back to Laguna Beach!

Summary: My wife and I stayed here one night during our honeymoon last week. It was an unforgettable experience from the service we received, to the room itself, to the amazing view and lunch on The Rooftop. It was an amazing location and we can't to go back again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are thrilled to know you had a great Honeymoon night with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here last year during my spring break (which is early march) and I just booked my second stay for August. The location was great; stairs leading down to a secluded beach, good restaurants and coffee shops with all sorts of selections, shopping was not far as well as galleries. We thought the walk to go hiking just north of town was not to far either, but yet again I'm from NYC and walk everywhere. I advise you to wake up early enough to grab some complimentary breakfast since it has such a nice variety. While in laguna we went kayaking and got a cheap taxi down to dana's warf to go whale watching. They also have local buses which we took back but I had too much anxiety about the timing heading there. Even though there is no pool (who needs it with an
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear you will be returning for a repeat stay in August! Thank you for posting your review of your previous visit... We are looking forward to seeing you both again. If you have any questions or special requests for your upcoming stay, please feel free to contact our concierge for assistance - 949-497-2446. See you soon!

Summary: My girl friend and I shared our 5 year Anniversary here at La Casa del camino, Which is an amazing place. Right away the customer service was on point. They made everything easy and run smoothly. We were greeted by DAMIEN at the front desk. Very nice gentleman. He let us know everything about the place and surrounding eateries. This hotel is 100 feet from the ocean. Also when we wanted to go to the beach, they set up chairs, Umbrella and towels for us right on the sand. Perfect! I would definitely come here again. Thank you Damien and staff for making our stay pleasant.
Manager Response: We are so happy you chose to celebrate your anniversary with us! Thank you for your kind words and your shout-out to Damien... very much appreciated. We look forward to welcoming you both again soon!

Summary Heading: Fabulous attention to detail - loved our stay!
Summary: I am very excited to write this review for La Casa del Camino. We only stayed there one night (a Friday night) but we wished we had spent our entire vacation there. We were greeted by two extremely helpful young gentlemen at the check-in desk and advised of all of the amenities. We had a queen bed room on the third floor with a balcony and partial view of the ocean (one of the spanish style rooms). It was fabulous! We loved the romance of the room (lots of dimmer switches on the candle-lights) and I personally loved the sealed welcome envelope with my name printed on the outside. Such a nice touch. There is also a lovely bathroom with a stone shower, copper sink, etc. that we loved and we sat out on the porch and watched all of the cars/people go by as it was a very active
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review... We are delighted to read about your enthusiasm for your recent stay with us! Thank you for choosing to stay at Hotel La Casa del Camino :) Your kind remarks are very much appreciated.

Summary: Stayed here Wed through Sunday and this hotel has a lot of great things going for it. The rooms are basic but they're clean and the beds are comfortable. We did receive excellent service from all the staff.  The hotel is very close to the steps down to the beach and they will bring chairs, towels and umbrellas down to the beach for you. The rooftop deck bar is amazing and it is the hot spot in town.  You'll have to wait for a table but it's worth it for the view.  If you're a guest of the hotel they can sometimes reserve you a table. Location is perfect as most everything in Laguna Beach is within walking distance.  They have a free breakfast in the morning which is quite good.   The hotel can be a little loud at night so if you're an early to bed kind of person this might not
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your thoughts. We appreciate your kind words and recommendations, and we look forward to the opportunity to host you again.

Summary Heading: Laguna social scene for a visit
Summary: Check in was a bit messy ( as they had a wedding being set up) ,but after 3 hours our room was ready.Quit expensive but very quaint.Rooms ( ours was an Ocean view suite).Staff very,very friendly and nice.Rooftop bar was the major draw to people watch.Everyone up there talks to you ,Bartenders Pete,Ian and Brian ( could be Ryan) are all great and happy to include you in with other bar patrons.Lots of locals hang there.This property is just steps from the beach so early morning walks are perfect. Breakfast is included in the room price and very good.Driving there from Palm Springs was under 2 hours,but the toll roads in/out are a nightmare to pay...you must buy a pass in advance as they are not manned..took 45 mins on line and phone calls to pay when we got home ( $17.50)..if we
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your recent stay. We are sorry to hear of your toll-road frustrations on the way to visit Laguna Beach! They are certainly a little faster than the regular freeways, but if you call our concierge, we can help you find a route to Laguna Beach that does not require you to use the toll roads! Thank you for choosing to stay with us... we hope to see you both again soon!

Summary: This was the perfect spot for my sisters and I to stop for a night in Laguna on our road trip up the California coast! The walk to the beach was short and the views were amazing! The staff was really helpful as well! The rooftop bar was the place to be around sunset and with views of the Pacific it was no question why. It is a cozy and quaint hotel. The location was in the heart of town too!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review! We are so happy to hear that you had a great time during your short visit, and we hope to host you and your sisters again.

Summary Heading: Great location, hit or miss service
Summary: Stayed here last weekend, biggest draws to this place are great location and awesome rooftop  bar. Rooms (well, at least the one we stayed in) are very basic, but clean, so not complaining. Staff is mostly very helpful and knowledgeable, but the biggest drawback were few rotten apples with the staff : one confirmed and reconfirmed rooftop opening at 6pm - well, at 5.58pm it was all packed with no tables avail. Best part was to complain to the person up there, who made it abundantly clear that he couldn't care less - for attitude like that I won't step into this place again. All it would have taken is to apologize for their mistake...
Manager Response: I am so sorry to hear your experience with our Rooftop Lounge. I understand your frustration at not being able to find a table just before sunset. It was true that day, our Rooftop re-opened to hotel guests and the public at 6pm (after a wedding), however it sounds like the event attendees had decided to stay for the sunset after their event was over.  We appreciate your candid comments, and hope to have the opportunity to turn your negative Rooftop Lounge experience around, should you return to La Casa del Camino.

Summary Heading: Europeon feel in busy Laguna Beach, ca
Summary: This hotel used to be known as the Firenze Hotel, sits on PCH, old style building, 1/2 block from the beach.  It has been remodeld but retains an old world feel.  Baths are new, rooms very spare but esthetically pleasing.  Quite of bit of stone, occasional road noise, be aware.  Some ocean views.  But we loved it. Great cocktail lounge on the roof, very hip and busy, and a wonderful restaurant, with a small bar in the main lobby.  They kept all that was good.
Manager Response: We're so happy you enjoyed your stay :) Thank you for your kind and informative remarks. We hope to see you again, next time you visit Laguna Beach!

Summary Heading: From 6-10 pm, the sound from the bar/music played below was horrific.
Summary: Let's start with the good things. The location is perfect. Beachside & access nearby. The lobby is clean & we had eaten breakfast at the motel before and it was excellent. During this trip, we aye dinner there. The waitress & service was top notch. There was a small bar area in the corner of the lobby, but otherwise it seemed very normal. (Little did we know this would become a nightclub in the evenings.) It was 100 degrees out and there was a portable conditioner in the room which was a life saver. The staff was courteous.  The rooms are quite small, but that's okay. However, I noticed on the way up a lot of construction in the hallways. We not only had to lug our suitcases up stairs but also around cords and personnel. The room was a little dirty in that I noticed the bathroom
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your experience. We are so sorry to hear that our hotel may not be a good fit for you. It is true, we are a very popular location for early evening entertainment, which most guests and locals find to be a favorite part of their experience at our hotel. We take a lot of pride in our positive vibe, and we do our best to be up front about our energetic atmosphere and popular venues. We are happy know you were able to find a more remote hotel to suit your needs, and invite you back to enjoy the Rooftop Lounge or K'ya Bistro any time you return to Laguna Beach.

Summary: Got a room with no room number. People running around and hanging at the corridors. Complained about the noise and i politely called the front desk if they would have another room available. All I got is "no, we don't have other rooms. Bye'
Manager Response: This review is a bit baffling to us, as none of our 36 guest rooms are without a room number! We typically try to do everything possible to ensure our guests have a wonderful experience, including offering different room options. It is unfortunate to hear we must have been fully committed the night you stayed as our guest, as we were unable to offer an alternative. It is never our intent to allow a guest to leave feeling unappreciated or uncared for. We would like to invite you to contact our General Manager directly to discuss and resolve your experience on a more personal level.

Summary: Wow! It took me a while to write a review but I'm finally here! I came here last summer with 3 of my girl friends and we absolutely loved it!! And we are thrilled to come back this summer again! EVERYONE NEEDS TO STAY HERE! The front desk girls were absolutely amazing help us with all our needs and told us of amazing places to go and visit. Ivan was an absolute delight he brought us out chairs and umbrellas down to the beach! The rooms were super cute and it brought me back in time. The breakfast was AMAZING a little bit of everything. Veronica was such a delight to see early in the morning super friendly also helped us with anything we needed even helped us book reservations for dinner at k'ya and informative about places around the area! Major kudos to her!! Can't wait to
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review! We appreciate your shout-outs to our friendly and helpful team; Ivan and Veronica are most grateful for your compliments! We are looking forward to hosting you and your friends again this summer... Thank you for your loyalty!

Summary: From the moment you walk in to the smiling faces at the front desk and how close you are to "paradise" (the ocean) this is the hotel to stay at in Laguna Beach.  We had an ocean view room which was awesome.  We left the windows open (no bugs!!!) while we slept and heard the ocean at night which was wonderful.  We also enjoyed eating our free breakfast (which was a fantastic breakfast) upstairs at the rooftop which offered fantastic views.  If you go on the weekends its hard getting up to the rooftop bar at night to look at the sunset.  However, if you walk about one block or less you can sit on the steps by the beach and watch the sunet and it's just spectacular.  You should note it is a bit of walk to the main downtown area and if you go on a weekend, very crowded in the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your review! We are so happy to hear how much you enjoyed your recent stay, and we are grateful for your kind remarks. Your comments and suggestions to future guests are so valuable... thank you for your candid comments. We look forward to hosting you again, next time you visit "paradise!"

Summary: Great place along the ocean.  Wonderful, friendly service and very uniquely decorated room.  The favorite part of my room was the ultra deep bathtub.  My brother stayed in an amazing room that had a skateboard theme.  Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and recommendation!

Summary Heading: Cute and unique, great rooftop bar and other perks
Summary: Starting from check in, we were treated really well. We were given a quick tour of their available room, and chose the partial view. Yes, the rooms are *very* small. It's an old hotel, a little creaky, but full of character. Parking is included in a lot across the street. The restaurant downstairs looked good and was reasonably priced. The breakfast: awesome. A free and fully hot breakfast that you can take upstairs to the rooftop deck. This hotel charges an additional resort fee of $14/ night which covers parking, breakfast, wi-fi, beach services, and use of a gym down the street. Beach access is directly outside. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review! We are so glad you chose to stay with us, and we're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and all our great amenities. We hope to have the opportunity to host you again. :)

Summary Heading: Great location & friendly staff, but lots of foot traffic!
Summary: Booked this hotel for my boyfriend & I based on the old world charm, proximity to the beach and reasonable price for Laguna Beach. Upon arrival, we were greeted by Norma who was very hospitable and let us know about our awesome upgrade from the Spanish King to the Riveria Suite, which has a partial ocean view. The room had a very comfortable bed & the most amazing bathroom - marble from floor to ceiling and a large shower with a rain shower head.   We had a reservation at 7:00pm at K'ya, the onsite restaurant, but cancelled last minute to order room service instead. I highly recommend other couples do the same to avoid the cramped space and amount of noise.   La Casa del Camino is located in a great location, literally steps away from a quiet beach. Complimentary parking and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your upgrade to the Riviera Surf Suite. Thank you for your compliments to Norma and our friendly team! We are very sorry to hear that you were disturbed by the foot traffic in the evening by the Rooftop Sunset crowd. We have become quite well-known for our wonderful view and it is typically busy from late afternoon until about 30 minutes after sunset. We do have many rooms located away from the staircase leading to the Rooftop, and our quietest rooms are definitely the Spanish Kings.  We look forward to welcoming you as guests again soon!

Summary: Hotel is very boutique-y and bar in lobby is packed every night of the week. Room is tiny...maybe 10x15 including bathroom but well appointed. Bathroom is small but is well done with limestone. The rooftop deck is a must see with an amazing view of the ocean. We enjoyed our free breakfast on the deck. Yes, free breakfast & free parking...pretty rare in Laguna!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Your compliments to our nicely appointed rooms, Rooftop Lounge, and our convenient amenities are appreciated. Please note, we have many different guest room configurations and we encourage you to give us a call if you would like to learn about our larger room types. Thanks again for your compliments and feedback.

Summary Heading: Elegant hotel with a rooftop deck for watching sunsets
Summary: Of all the places we priced in Laguna Beach, La Casa del Camino was either the same or cheaper and what a beautiful hotel!  The room was amazing, the rooftop deck was wonderful, and the staff were very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing La Casa del Camino! We appreciate your kind review :)

Summary: They don't make 'em this this anymore!!   Like other 'era-esque' early 1900's style -hotels; reminds me of San Francisco. on a cliff between The coast and busy Hwy.1 (PCH) at Cress:  with an awesome- inspiring vista, of the Laguna Beach tidepools and Pacific Ocean. Beautifully!!! decorated and maintainted rooms. Do not expect a" lot " of space; (rooms were smaller in the late 1920's.) also... now-a-days, 'post probitition'   The Bar is a popular rooftop adult-beverage/Lounge, very busy and lively.. up on the 3rd level.. panoramic 360 view of the Laguna hillscape, and Coastline. The Restaurant, and Bar -reception- salon: outstanding! !!!!!!  The 'bar snacks" delicious, Salad, Entree, Desert. "Freaking Great " Red Wine selection, and The most amazing employees, and real warm &
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review! We are thrilled to hear your rendition of our historic hotel, and we hope to have the opportunity to host you again soon.

Summary: We recently held our wedding at La Casa del Camino.  They were more than accommodating with everything and paid attention to the details.  We stayed in the house/cottage for four nights and it felt like home away from home.  They helped make our day perfect!
Manager Response: We are so happy that you chose to be wed at our lovely hotel. It was such a pleasure to host you all during your special weekend! Thank you for your kind words. We hope to see you next year for your anniversary!

Summary: So my then new girlfriend and I stayed several months back, around Sept 19th and I have procrastinated on writing this until now.  The room, the location, the premises, staff, breakfast, etc. were outstanding!  The original room they brought us to on the ground floor we weren't really feeling so we went back to the desk.  They offered an upgrade at a very fair price and we were so glad we made the change.  It was a fantastic room and we had such an amazing trip and stay!  The way they carry the umbrella/chairs down to the beach for you adds such a classy touch.  The first time, I believe the young man's name is Ivan, he was prepared to walk clear down to San Diego to get us the exact spot on the beach we wanted.  What a nice and accommodating guy.  Then at the free breakfast,
Manager Response: Justin and Marketta, Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of your past stay! We are thrilled to read about your experience. Thank you for your shout-out to Ivan and Heather - their dedication to our guest's happiness does not go unnoticed :) We hope to see you both again, should your travels bring you back to beautiful Laguna Beach! Warm Regards, Charlotte, Guest Services

Summary: First impressions are always important. Booked the hotel via a relatively new phone app.  The price was too good to pass up, so I was suspicious. I called the hotel and was greeted over the phone by a warm bubbly Norma. Man it was late at night and she was happy, happy to be there happy to help out.  I couldn't wait to meet her.  When we arrived we met Gonzolo who was so professional. He helped us out the next morning with our wonderful breakfast, man it was delicious! Norma and Gonzolo were both there the next day in the morning when we had to check out. Wow these two are dedicated and so a pleasant surprise to find in a boutique hotel.   Oh the staff was awesome and our room was wonderful!  I loved the cleanliness and overall feel of this hotel. Places like this are hard to
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review! We're so happy to hear of your great experience with both Norma and Gonzalo.. Your compliments have been passed along. We look forward to hosting you both again soon!

Summary: I just stayed here for two nights with my mother. We enjoyed everything--the location, the ambiance, the staff, the beds, the FREE breakfast! It was great. The staff were very helpful, and even brought us our own beach chairs and towels when we went down to the beach. The hotel restaurant and bar are nice...and they close by 10 PM (even on weekends), which means that there was never any noise trouble. The hotel is within walking distance of downtown LB, and several great restaurants and shops. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: none

Summary: It all depends on what you are looking for to decide to stay at La Casa del Camino.  If you're looking for big rooms, quiet peaceful (spa like) conditions, this is not the place.  If you want a unique atmosphere, excellent service, great location and a fun atmosphere, than this is the place.  I was actually on business but decided to try something different instead of the standard Hilton, Marriott.  I could not have made a better choice.  The staff is extremely friendly and engaging, the rooms have a very European feel (nice but very small).   The lobby bar is very active and fun.  You can walk to a number of restaurants and boutique shops.  The beach is only a block away.   Not sure why anyone is complaining about the breakfast.  The $12.00 resort fee includes parking, Wi-Fi,
Manager Response: Mister M, Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your recent experience. We are thrilled to hear that we have won your loyalty! We look forward to hosting you again soon. Warm Regards, La Casa del Camino staff and management

Summary Heading: Really want to love it, but...
Summary: There's a lot of great things about this hotel. It's a great older building, with unique rooms. Rooms were clean and well decorated. The staff is AMAZING. Maybe the best ever. Prices are good for what you get. The rooftop bar is out of this world - well the view is out of this world - the drinks suck. Location is fantastic for enjoying Laguna Beach by foot. They'll even deliver chairs to the nearby pocket beach to you.   The reason I can't wholeheartedly recommend the hotel is that they can't make up their mind whether to be a party place or a hotel, and both don't work in an old building with thin walls.
